Hotels: Majestic 4BR/4BATH apartment in Sagrada Familia area
Full_Descriptions:
Situated in Barcelona, 800 metres from Sagrada Familia and 1.6 km from La Pedrera, Majestic 4BR/4BATH apartment in Sagrada Familia area features spacious air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property has city views and is 2.7 km from Passeig de Gracia and 2.8 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.3 km from Casa Batllo.

This apartment has 4 bedrooms, a kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 4 bathrooms fitted with a bidet.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 3.2 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 3.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 15 km from Majestic 4BR/4BATH apartment in Sagrada Familia area, and the property offers a free airport shuttle service.

Situated in Barcelona, in the Gracia district, 1 km from Park Güell, Sonder l Le Palacete features an interior garden and courtyard.

Rooms come with a flat-screen TV. Some units feature a seating area and a private terrace. You will find a coffee machine in the room. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom. Sonder l Le Palacete features free WiFi throughout the property. The property offers contact-free check-in and 24/7 virtual support which limits in-person interaction.

Sagrada Familia is 1.3 km from Sonder l Le Palacete, while La Pedrera is 1.4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Sonder l Le Palacete.

Situated 5 minutes' walk from the Sagrada Familia, this stylish, modern hotel offers a 24-hour reception desk and free Wi-Fi access available throughout. Monumental Metro Station is 200 metres away.

Rooms at SM Hotel Sant Antoni feature parquet floors, a safe, work desk and flat-screen TV. Decorated in white, black and red tones, they have air conditioning and heating, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and toiletries.

The Sant Antoni offers a continental buffet breakfast, and drinks and snacks are available from the vending machines. A wide range of cafés and restaurants can be found within a 5-minute walk.

SM Hotel Sant Antoni is 900 metres from L’Auditori Concert Hall and the National Theatre. Glòries Shopping Centre and Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard can both be reached within a 20-minute walk. You can reach Plaza Catalunya in 10 minutes by bus or metro.

Hotel del Mar is set in a listed building just 800 metres from the seafront and Barceloneta Metro Station. It is a 5-minute walk from the trendy Born neighbourhood and Ciutadella Park.

The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel del Mar have flat-screen satellite TV. There is a private bathroom with a hairdryer and amenities, and some rooms have a private balcony. A safe is also available with a surcharge.

Hotel del Mar has a 24-hour front desk. Barcelona’s França Train Station is a 5-minute walk away, and you can walk to Barcelona Cathedral and Maremagnum Shopping Centre in 10 minutes. Parking is available 5 minutes' walk from the property.

Situated in Barcelona, 1.4 km from Sagrada Familia, Golden Hotel Barcelona is a sustainable property with the Biosphere certificate. It provides a rooftop terrace with outdoor swimming pool, jacuzzi and bar. 1.5 km from Port Olympic, the property is also 1.7 km from Sagarda Familia and 1.9 km away from Picasso Museum. There is a gym, a restaurant and a shared lounge.

 All guests staying at the Golden Hotel Barcelona get 1 free entry for person and stay to the spa at Hotel & Spa Villa Olimpic@ Suites complex (subject to availability and with prior reservation), located 450 meters away.

A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the property.

Speaking Spanish, Catalan, German and English at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock.

Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Hotel Lloret Ramblas is situated on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, just outside Plaza Catalunya Square. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

Each functional room at the Lloret Ramblas Hotel features a work desk and a private bathroom with amenities. Some rooms also have a private balcony.

Breakfast is served in Hotel Lloret Ramblas’s beautiful lounge-dining room, which dates from the early 20th century. The reception area has a free PC with internet and a free safe.

Barcelona Cathedral and the MACBA Modern Art Museum are both around 500 metres from Hotel Lloret. Catalunya Metro Station is a 1-minute walk away, and direct airport buses stop within 100 metres.

Hotel Concordia Barcelona is situated 800 metres from Plaza España and the Fira de Barcelona Exhibition Centre. It features a sun terrace with an outdoor swimming pool, hot tub, cocktail bar and solarium.

The Hotel Concordia Barcelona’s bright, spacious rooms feature contemporary décor and air conditioning.  Each room includes free WiFi, a flat-screen TV, safe, minibar and a private bathroom with a range of amenities.

The Concordia Barcelona’s modern, elegant  Bistro Triple Sec Restaurant serves typical Mediterranean cuisine. The varied breakfast buffet includes healthy options. There is also a café and cocktail bar open daily. Private parking is available on site for an extra cost and electrical cars charging station is available.

Located next to Poble Sec Station, the hotel is a 5-minute Metro journey from Barcelona Port and La Rambla. You can also walk to the Rambla in 15 minutes. Direct airport buses stop in Plaza España, a 15-minute walk away.

Private parking is available on site for an extra cost.

This modern hotel is located 200 metres from Barcelona’s Monumental Bull Ring and 12 minutes from the Sagrada Familia. The rooms all have air conditioning and heating, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

Monumental Metro Station is just 3 minutes’ walk away from Hotel Glòries, and offers a direct service to Plaza Catalunya in around 5 minutes.

The hotel is well located for the 22@ high-tech area, as well as the Agbar Tower. The National Theatre of Catalunya and the Auditori Concert Hall are just 400 metres away.

The Hotel Glòries’s 24-hour front desk offers car and bike hire. They can also exchange currency and reserve tickets.

Located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, this 19th-century building offers stylish modern interiors and free WiFi. It is just 300 metres from the designer shops and Gaudí buildings of Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard.

The Catalonia Eixample 1864 is housed in one of the Eixample’s oldest buildings, and its painted façade gives it the Speciality Monument status.

All soundproofed en-suite rooms sleek wooden floors and furniture, air conditioning and all rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.. Some rooms have a private terrace and pool.

A buffet breakfast with show cooking is offered every morning at the Sala Minerva; while the hotel's Les Finestres de Llúria restaurant serves traditional Catalan food with a creative twist. Room service is also available.

Catalonia Eixample 1864 boasts a rooftop swimming pool, sundeck and bar; as well as a gym.

The Catalonia Eixample 1864 is ideally located just a 5-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia Station. Plaza Catalunya Square is a 10-minute walk away.

The hotel offers private parking on-site for an extra cost and an electric vehicle charging station.

Located in the quiet San Gervasi district of Barcelona, this elegant hotel offers modern rooms with free internet connection. The Silken is just 8 minutes by train from Plaza Catalunya.

The restaurant at Silken San Gervasi offers traditional cuisine with modern influences. A breakfast buffet is served in the cafeteria, and drinks and snacks are also available throughout the day.

Functional rooms include a free safe and central heating and air conditioning. The marble bathroom is complete with a hairdryer.

Silken St. Gervasi is a 15-minute walk from Park Guell, with impressive structures, mosaics and architecture by Antoni Gaudí. El Putxet Station can be found 50 metres from the hotel with direct access to the city centre.

Allegro Barcelona is a futuristic design hotel, situated 100 metres from Barcelona’s Diagonal Metro Station. Its stylish rooms include free Wi-Fi, digital radio and LCD TV with satellite channels.

Each room at Allegro Barcelona features elegant white décor with colourful touches. Rooms are air-conditioned and come with an electronic safe. Bathrooms include a hairdryer and toiletries.

A continental breakfast buffet is served until 10:30 each day at Allegro Barcelona. Numerous tapas bars and pavement cafés can be found on Rambla de Catalunya, a 5-minute walk away.

Other facilities include portable WiFi for no charge.

The famous Gaudi buildings and designer shops of Passeig de Gracia are just 500 metres from the hotel, while Plaza Catalunya is a 15-minute walk away. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about Barcelona, recommend excursions and arrange airport transfers.

Hotel Alimara is a modern hotel located in Barcelona’s Horta district. It has a central garden, several meeting rooms, rooms with flat-screen TVs, and a fitness centre.

All rooms at the Alimara Hotel have both air conditioning and heating. They all have a private bathroom with hairdryer.

The Alimara’s restaurant serves Mediterranean food with a modern twist and there are children’s menus available. The hotel bar, SUMMUM, features a terrace and serves food, drinks and snacks.

The hotel is located 1 minutes' walk from Mundet Metro Station, and it is a 12-minute journey into central Barcelona. Gaudí’s iconic Parc Güell is 4 Metro stops away from Mundet.

Ibis Barcelona Plaza Glòries 22@ is located in Barcelona’s Glòries district, 500 metres from Torre Agbar. It offers a fitness centre, 24-hour bar and soundproofed rooms with a flat-screen TV.

All rooms at the Ibis Plaza Glòries have air conditioning and heating. They also have a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi is offered throughout.

The Hotel Ibis Plaza Glòries has a restaurant which serves a buffet breakfast. Rates with breakfast included does not include breakfast for children. Children under 12 can enjoy breakfast for 4 euros per person

Llacuna and Glòries Metro Stations are within 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel. From here you can reach Plaza Catalunya or Barceloneta Beach in under 10 minutes.

Catalonia Gran Via BCN is set on Gran Vía and within 5 minutes’ walk of Urgell and Universitat Metro Stations, and beside the airport bus stop. It features an outdoor swimming pool, a gym and free Wi-Fi.

Each of the modern rooms at Catalonia Gran Via BCN is themed around a different city and air travel. All rooms have flat-screen TVs with satellite channels and an iPod docking station.

You can enjoy breakfast in Catalonia Gran Via BCN, while à la carte options are offered in the Gourmet Corner.

You can walk to both Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas in 10 minutes. Plaza de España, the Magic Fountains and the FIRA are just 2 stops from Urgell Station.

The Aparthotel Senator Barcelona is situated on Via Augusta, in a pleasant residential area, a 2-minute walk from Muntaner Train Station. It includes air conditioning, heating, and free Wi-Fi in hotel rooms.

All rooms and apartments have a TV, telephone, and a private bathroom with a bathtub or a shower. The apartments also include an equipped with kitchenette.

A 6-minute train ride will take you to Plaza Cataluña and Barcelona city centre. Sagrada Familia Cathedral is 3.3 km away.

Just 3 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s famous Ramblas, Hostal Levante Barcelona offers free WiFi and a 24-hour reception. Air-conditioned and heated rooms have a private bathroom, fan and work desk.

Hostal Levante Barcelona guest house has a vending machine where drinks are available. Many cafés and restaurants can be found in the immediate surroundings.

Luggage storage is offered and there is a safe for guest use. The multilingual staff can help with things to see and do in Barcelona. Lively Plaça Reial is just 100 metres away.

Set in Barcelona, 400 metres from Nova Icaria, Unite Hostel Barcelona offers accommodation with a restaurant, private parking, a bar and a shared lounge. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hostel features family rooms.

At the hostel, all rooms are fitted with air conditioning and a private bathroom.

The accommodation offers a terrace.

Popular points of interest near Unite Hostel Barcelona include Somorrostro, Bogatell and Port Olimpic. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 18 km from the hostel.

Hostal Fernando is set in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, 100 metres from Las Ramblas and the historic Plaça Sant Jaume. It offers air-conditioned rooms and dormitories with free Wi-Fi.

The basic rooms at the Hostal Fernando come with a TV, safe and a private bathroom.

Fernando guest house has a simple restaurant and bar. There are many bars and restaurants within a short walk.

The guest house has a tour desk, and bicycle and car rental are offered. Barcelona Cathedral, the Picasso Museum and the famous Boquería Market are all within a 10-minute walk.

Set at the foot of Montjuic Hill, this design aparthotel is a 10-minute walk from Plaza Espanya Metro Station and the Airport Bus Stop. It offers free WiFi and a rooftop terrace with a solarium and a seasonal swimming pool.

The BCN Montjuic is a 5-minute walk from Las Arenas Shopping Centre and a short walk from the Olympic Stadium. Barcelona city centre can be reached in 15 minutes by bus or Metro.

All modern rooms at the Montjuic have air conditioning and heating. They include a flat-screen TV, a seating area and a kitchen with a fridge and microwave.

The apartments also include a living area with a sofa bed, a private bathroom and an equipped kitchen with a washing machine. Bed linen and towels are provided.

The Aparthotel Bcn Montjuic has a TV room, as well as a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk, where guests can arrange to visit local attractions. Laundry service is also available.

Hotels: Leonardo Boutique Hotel Barcelona Sagrada Familia
Full_Descriptions:
Leonardo Boutique Hotel Barcelona Sagrada Familia is located just 15 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s famous Sagrada Familia. It has a rooftop sun terrace with panoramic views of Barcelona and rooms with free Wi-Fi.

All modern, outward-facing rooms at theLeonardo Boutique Hotel Barcelona Sagrada Familia are equipped with air conditioning and heating. They have a flat-screen TV and the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

Leonardo Boutique Hotel Barcelona Sagrada Familia serves a daily buffet breakfast, and gluten-free meals are available on prior request. In summer, breakfast can be enjoyed on the terrace. There are also vending machines with snacks and drinks.

Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. Clot Metro Station is 200 metres away, allowing you to reach the city centre in 10 minutes.

This spacious and modern hotel is located in Eixample district, built in 2004, the Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Gran Via, features wide-open public spaces covered in marble.

Rooms include flat-screen TV, Wifi, safebox, desk, minibar, private bathrooms with toiletries.

A good location for tourism, you can easily walk to the Gothic Quarter and Ramblas, or up to the attractions of Montjuic. The city’s major business districts are also nearby.

Rooms include satellite TV, free Wi-Fi access, air conditioning and a bathroom with free toiletries.

Parking is available on site at an additional cost.

Featuring a sunroof terrace with a pool and views over Barcelona, Catalonia Park Putxet offers tranquil rooms and a modern fitness centre onsite. There is free WiFi available throughout.

The Park Putxet has simple, bright décor. Each air-conditioned room comes with a mini fridge with complimentary water, a satellite TV and a fully equipped bathroom with a hairdryer.

You can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast with Show Cooking. Light meals are prepared at the hotel snack bar; and room service, including sushi room service, is available.

The hotel is located in a residential area. There is a wide selection of cafés, bars and restaurants in the neighbouring district of Gràcia, which is just 15 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Gaudi's famous Park Guell is just 600 metres away. The closest metro station is Lesseps, 600 metres away.

Well set in Barcelona, Hotel Raval House provides air-conditioned rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a garden. 2.5 km from Sant Sebastian Beach and 2.5 km from Sant Miquel Beach, the property offers a terrace and a bar. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.7 km from Barceloneta Beach.

At the hotel, every room comes with a wardrobe. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, certain units at Hotel Raval House also provide guests with a city view. All units at the accommodation are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are willing to help at any time of the day.

Popular points of interest near Hotel Raval House include Boqueria Market, Passeig de Gracia and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from the hotel.

Barcelona House Hotel is in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, 80 metres from the Ramblas. The hotel offers modern, air-conditioned rooms with wooden floors, free wired internet and a flat-screen TV.

Barcelona Cathedral and the Boquería Market are 500 metres away. The port and Maremagnum Shopping Centre are a 10-minute walk from the hotel. You can walk to Barceloneta Beach in 20 minutes or take a bus.

Rooms are also heated and have a safe. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

There are many bars, restaurants and galleries near the Barcelona House. The Picasso Museum and fashionable Borne district are a 10-minute walk away.

There is a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage is available.

Hotel Turin Barcelona is located just 50 meters from the famous Ramblas in Barcelona. It offers free Wi-Fi, 24-hour reception, free luggage storage and a lovely sun terrace. There is free water, coffee and tea in the lobby lounge.

It features stylish rooms with wooden floors and furnishings. They are equipped with a private bathroom, hairdryer, safe, Smart TV and minibar.

The Turin Hotel is located just 150 meters from the Gothic District, 3 minutes from the Liceu metro and a 20-minute walk from the beach. In the area there are several restaurants, shops and supermarkets open until late.

The hotel offers a fabulous breakfast buffet. Most of the food items come from La Boquería Market, located 2 minutes' walk away.

Pere IV is situated in the Poble Nou District, 10 minutes’ walk from the lively Port Olimpic area and Barcelona's beaches. This hotel features a free spa, free Wi-Fi and 24-hour reception.

Each of the spacious rooms comes with a minibar, and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The à la carte Garum Restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine. The hotel serves a daily, buffet breakfast.

Guests enjoy free access to the Pere IV's spa, which includes a Finnish sauna, a hammam, indoor pool and sensation showers.

The Pere IV is a short walk from the beach and the new marina. Nearby Bogatell Metro Station offers easy access to the beach and the city centre, which can both be reached within 15 minutes.

Situated in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, Hotel Catalonia Port has a modern gym and a sun terrace with a small seasonal outdoor pool. Each air-conditioned room has free WiFi, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The hotel’s contemporary El Racó del Port restaurant opens from Monday to Saturday, serving seasonal Mediterranean cuisine. A varied buffet breakfast, available until 12:00 at the weekends, is offered in the dining room, and there is also a lobby bar.

The Catalonia Port Hotel offers stylish rooms with hardwood floors. They all include a safe, a minibar and a private bathroom.

Catalonia Port is just 250 metres from the bottom of the famous Las Ramblas, and Port Vell Harbour is 400 metres away. Drassanes Metro Station is a 5-minute walk away.

SM Hotel Teatre Auditori is located opposite the Catalan National Theatre, close to Glòries and Monumental Metro Stations. This stylish hotel features rooms with satellite TV.

The Auditori has bright, attractive décor. Each air-conditioned room has a desk and a safety deposit box.

Breakfast is served in the hotel café.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information on Barcelona’s attractions, as well as arrange bicycle and car rental.

Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia is just 15 minutes’ walk from the hotel, while Glòries Metro is just 4 stops from Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas.

The chic H10 Casanova Hotel is centrally located on Barcelona’s Gran Via, a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and the Rambla. There is a garden spa with whirlpool and steam room.

Featuring contemporary boutique-style décor, the H10 Casanova offers air-conditioned rooms with a satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. There is a minibar and safe, and the modern private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities. Room service is also available.

The on-site Despacio Spa Centre has a Vichy shower, a  steam bath and hot tub; massages as well as facial and body treatments are available on prior request according to the price list.

The hotel has an à la carte restaurant and a trendy café-bar. There is a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car or bicycle from the tour desk.

Urgell and Universitat Metro Stations are 300 metres away. You can walk to Paseo de Gracia’s designer shops in 10 minutes.

Hotels: TWO Hotel Barcelona by Axel 4* Sup- Adults Only
Full_Descriptions:
Offering a rooftop pool with a large sun terrace, TWO Hotel Barcelona by Axel is located in the heart of the gay district of Barcelona, 2 km from Barceloneta Beach.

The hetero-friendly hotel offers on-site private parking. There is also a  24-hour reception and guests can get information on the gay scene and the city at the on-site tour desk. On the rooftop guests will also find the Sky bar, gym, steam bath and a massage room.

Each room here will provide you with air conditioning and a minibar. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer. A safety deposit box and a universal phone charger are also provided.

Guests can sample a drink at the rooftop bar, whilst taking in stunning city views or enjoy the delicious cocktails served in the Lounge Bar. A buffet breakfast is available and free high-speed WiFi access is provided throughout.

Staff can give information about the surrounding area, which is known as "Gayxample" because of its lively gay nightlife.

The hotel is 2 minutes' walk from Rocafort Metro Station and Plaça d'Espanya, with direct buses to Barcelona Airport, is a 10-minute walk away. Paral·lel, with bars, restaurants, clubs and theatres is 1.3 km from TWO Hotel Barcelona by Axel.

Located in Barcelona, 900 metres from Port Olympic, ibis Styles Barcelona City Bogatell features private parking and free WiFi access. The hotel has an outdoor pool and children's playground, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar.

A TV is available.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

You can play table tennis at the hotel. The hotel also offers bike hire. Picasso Museum is 1.5 km from ibis Styles Barcelona City Bogatell, while La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 1.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from ibis Styles Barcelona City Bogatell.

Set in a 19th-century building in Barcelona’s El Born district, Catalonia Born offers a rooftop pool, an attractive central courtyard and free Wi-Fi. Arc de Triomf Metro Station is 250 metres away.

The classic rooms at Catalonia Born Hotel come with an elegant marble bathroom. They also include a satellite TV and centrally controlled heating or air conditioning, depending on the season.

A buffet breakfast is served, and the snack bar is open for lunch and dinner. There is also a bar in the lobby.

Located minutes from França Train Station, the hotel is well-connected to the rest of the city and its surroundings. Car rental is also available from the tour desk.

Situated just off famous La Rambla Boulevard in central Barcelona, Hotel Rialto occupies a historic building where the artist Joan Miró was born. It offers air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TV.

Each room at the Rialto Hotel Barcelona has wooden floors and a simple, functional design. The modern bathrooms include basic toiletries. Safes are available to rent.

Guests can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast and delicious Mediterranean meals at the Rialto’s Miró restaurant. There are also many restaurants and lively bars in the surrounding streets. 

Hotel Rialto’s 24-hour reception offers information about the city. The Boquería Market and Barcelona Cathedral are both within 400 metres. Liceu Metro Station is only 300 metres away, and Plaza Catalunya is a 10-minute walk from the hotel.

The stylish Catalonia Rigoletto is set 500 metres from FC Barça’s Camp Nou stadium and 5 minutes’ walk from Maria Cristina Metro Station. It offers an outdoor pool and rooms with free WiFi and flat-screen TVs.

The Rigoletto’s spacious rooms are air conditioned and decorated with dark woods and luxurious fabrics. All rooms have satellite TV, free smartphone, a minibar and safety deposit box.

A buffet breakfast is on offer in the dining room and Mediterranean cuisine is served in the stylish La Traviata restaurant. There is also a bar in the hotel featuring attractive art work.

Sights including Las Ramblas and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló can be reached in 15 minutes, by Metro. Sants Railway Station, where there is an airport train connection, is just 1.5 km from the Rigoletto.

Located 300 metres from Barcelona’s Nova Icaria Beach, Hotel SB Icaria offers a gym, sauna and outdoor pool with sun terrace and hot tub. Rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

The Hotel SB Icaria’s stylish modern rooms feature wooden floors and adjustable lighting. Each room has a minibar, safe and private bathroom with a hairdryer.

The hotel’s elegant restaurant serves Mediterranean market cuisine. There is also a bar and a garden terrace.

Hotel SB Icaria is located in the Olympic Port area, a 10-minute walk from Ciutadella Park and Barcelona Zoo. Ciutadella Metro Station is 800 metres away, and is just 2 stops from Barcelona Cathedral and the historic Gothic Quarter.

This minimalist hotel is situated in the Poble Nou district of Barcelona, 15 minutes’ by foot from Bogatell Beach. It offers a seasonal outdoor pool surrounded by wooden decking and loungers.

The suites at Hotel & Spa Villa Olimpica Suites feature monochrome decoration and a flat-screen TV. They also include air conditioning and a modern bathroom.

The Hotel & Spa Villa Olimpica Suites complex offers a stylish café-bar and restaurant. Guests can enjoy Mediterranean cuisine from the á la carte and daily menus. In summer meals can be enjoyed on the terrace by the pool.

Guests have access to the hotel's large spa for an additional cost. It includes an indoor treatment pool, Finnish sauna, Turkish baths, jacuzzis, hot tubs, several types of shower and an ice fountain. There is also a gym.

Barcelona Port is 15 minutes' walk away and Bogatell Metro Station is 100 metres from the hotel. Guests can walk to the lively Villa Olimpica area in 5 minutes.

All rooms include 1 complimentary access per person per stay to the hotel spa (subject to availability and upon reservation).

Free Wi-Fi and a rooftop swimming pool are offered at Catalonia Park Güell. It is set in a residential area just outside Barcelona’s historic centre, 600 metres from Parc Güell.

Rooms at the hotel are simple and comfortable, with air conditioning or heated and satellite TV. There is also a restaurant, bar.

The Catalonia Park Güell is just 300 metres from Vallcarca Metro Station. This gives access to the city centre within 10 minutes. Stops for buses V19 and 22 are nearby. The sun terrace offers views over the city.

The hotel is close to some of Barcelona’s most famous medical centres. These include the Delfos and Quiron Clinics.

There are many sports clubs and parks around the hotel. The popular Gràcia district is also a short walk away. It has lively squares with bars and restaurants.

The Streets Apartments Rambla provides accommodation within less than 1 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, a microwave and a toaster. Featuring a lift, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. When staying at the apartment, guests can use private entrance.

At the apartment complex, all units have a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units are air conditioned and include a seating and/or dining area. The units include a wardrobe.

Sightseeing tours are available near the property.

Popular points of interest near The Streets Apartments Rambla include Sant Sebastian Beach, Sant Miquel Beach and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

Hotels: Four Points by Sheraton Barcelona Diagonal
Full_Descriptions:
Four Points by Sheraton Barcelona Diagonal is situated 350 metres from Glòries Shopping Centre, in the modern 22@ district of Barcelona. It offers an elegant restaurant and soundproofed rooms with free Wi-Fi and TV.

Rooms at the Four Points Barcelona Diagonal are bright and spacious, with wooden flooring. Each room has a stylish bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries. Rooms on higher floors offer great views, some of the Sagrada Familia.

La Avenida Restaurant serves traditional Spanish cuisine. A varied buffet breakfast is offered daily, and free coffee is available from 05:00 until 07:00. Taste local crafted beers, snacks and enjoy the best sports projections at 4Taps Bar.

The Four Points Diagonal is 600 metres from the colourful Agbar Tower, designed by Jean Nouvel. There are many bars and restaurants on nearby Rambla del Poblenou, and Bogatell Beach is within a 15-minute walk. Poblenou Metro Station is only 500 metres away.

Located just 50 metres from the famous Las Ramblas in Barcelona, Gaudi Hotel features a shared terrace with views of the Palau Güell and the city. Free WiFi is available.

The hotel is 300 metres from Liceu Metro Station. You can visit many of the city’s attractions on foot. The Boqueria Market is 450 metres from the hotel. The Port and Maremagnum Shopping Centre are a 10-minute walk away.

All air-conditioned rooms at the Gaudi Hotel have a private bathroom and a TV. Some have a private balcony and safe. Rooms are modern, with wooden floors, and some offer excellent views of the city or Palau Güell.

A continental breakfast is served in the Gaudi’s restaurant. There is a bar and a snack bar.

There is a 24-hour front desk, and a laundry and ironing service are available. Guests also have free use of the hotel's 2 computers with internet access.

Featuring free WiFi and air conditioning, Apartamentos DV is located in Barcelona, 800 metres from Camp Nou. Palau Sant Jordi is 2.8 km from the property. Free private parking is available on site.

Offering views over a patio, each apartment comes with a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen including a microwave, kettle and kitchenware. Apartments come with a bathroom with a double ended bath and hairdryer is available on prior request. Apartments are cleaned every day and bed linen and towels are provided. Superior apartments have a spa bath.

Plenty of restaurants, bars and shops are within 5 minutes' walk.

Montjuïc is 2.9 km from Apartamentos DV, while Casa Batllo is 3.9 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 9 km from the property.

The Caledonian has an ideal setting on Barcelona's Gran Vía, just 5 minutes' walk from Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas. Its rooms include free Wi-Fi internet access.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Caledonian feature simple, attractive décor with wooden floors. Each has a minibar and some rooms offer views of Gran Vía.

The hotel serves a daily buffet breakfast in its dining room. There is a good selection of restaurants within 10 minutes’ walk of the Caledonian.

Universitat Metro Station is just 100 metres from the hotel and connects guests to sights such as Gaudí’s La Perdrera and the Sagrada Familia within 15 minutes.

Guests can make use of services such as the 24-hour front desk and express check-in and check-out. The hotel also has luggage storage.

Located just 300 metres from Parallel Avenue and metro station, Barcelona Fifteen central Aparthotel offers modern, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen cable TV.

The stylish rooms include a private bathroom, coffee making facilities, and a breakfast bar. The property also has studios with a kitchenette.

The property has a rooftop terrace where you can relax. There is also a communal washing machine, drier and microwave, which guests can use for free.

There is a wide range of restaurants and bars in the surrounding area and Parallel’s many theatres are also near to the guest house.

Las Ramblas Avenue is a 5-minute walk away and Barcelona’s Port Vell just 12 minutes’ walk. Airport buses leave from Plaza Espanya and Plaza Catalunya, which are both 20 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Fifteen Luxury.

Set in the heart of Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, Aparthotel Arai 4* Superior features an outdoor swimming pool, a gym with a sauna, and a rooftop terrace with city views. from its two terraces with jacuzzi.

The Arai is set in an 18th-century building and features stunning frescos on the façades, which are part of the architectural Heritage, historical and artistic of Barcelona, which gives it the Speciality Monument status.

Rooms feature a stylish, rustic décor with exposed stone walls and large windows. The air-conditioned rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV. They have a sofa and a small kitchenette with a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. Private bathrooms include free toiletries and a hairdryer.

Aparthotel Arai features Restaurant Palosanto, a classic tavern offering  tapas and Kokka, the first Peruvian bar in Barcelona.

Las Ramblas Avenue and Liceu Metro Station are just 5 minutes’ walk away. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, 950 metres away. Barcelona’s Port Vell is 10 minutes’ walk from Aparthotel Arai 4* Superior.

Acta CITY47 is 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Sants Train Station and 15 minutes from the Fira Exhibition Centre. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi.

The rooms at Acta CITY47 feature simple, modern décor and a private bathroom. Each one comes with a TV, free safe, and a work desk. Guests have free access to an ironing room open 24 hours.

The hotel’s modern Nass City restaurant serves international food and a gluten-free breakfast is available on prior request. There is also a bar where you can get a snack or a drink.

The Acta CITY47 is 20 minutes’ walk from Barcelona FC’s Camp Nou Stadium. Sants Metro Station connects you with the centre of Barcelona in 15 minutes.

Fisa Rentals Gran Via Apartments are stylish apartments set 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas. They have free Wi-Fi access and a flat-screen TV.

Each spacious Fisa Rentals apartment offers contemporary décor and chic wooden floors. All apartments are air conditioned, but there is one bedroom that doesn't have air conditioning. All the apartments have a spacious seating area with satellite TV. The well-equipped kitchens also have a washing machine.

The apartments have easy access to the centre of Barcelona and are within 10 minutes’ walk of a selection of shops, bars and restaurants.

Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard is 300 metres away and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera can be reached in 15 minutes, by foot. Passeig de Gràcia and Urquinaona Metro Stations are around 200 metres away.

Centrally located in Barcelona, just 900 metres from Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia, Bed and Bike Barcelona offers private and shared rooms with free WiFi. Tetuan metro Station is 5 minutes’ walk away.

Air-conditioned rooms at this hostel come with a wardrobe and a private or shared bathroom. They include bed linen and lockers. Guests can make use of the shared kitchen and TV area. Bed linen and towels can be rented on site for an additional charge.

Bed and Bike Barcelona offers a bicycle rental service. There is also a 24-hour front desk, a tour desk and a ticket service.

The hostel is 900 metres from Arc de Triomf and a 20-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from Bed and Bike Barcelona.

Aparthotel Napols is centrally located, 350 metres from Barcelona’s Arc de Triomf Metro Station. Air-conditioned rooms feature a well-equipped kitchen, and a living room with sofa and TV.

Estació de Nord Bus Station is 5 minutes’ walk away, and has direct connections to Girona Airport. You can walk to Plaza Catalunya and the Rambla in 15 minutes. There is free WiFi in the apartments.

Soundproofed rooms at the Napols have a safe and minibar. The private bathroom comes with amenities.

The modern kitchen has a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. There is a dishwasher and dining area.

The complex has a 24-hour reception and a shared terrace. You can hire a car, and Napols offers a laundry service and luggage storage.

Astoria is just off Barcelona’s Diagonal Avenue, a 5-minute walk from Diagonal Metro Station and Paseo de Gracia Avenue. It features a rooftop pool with views, and a gym.

The Astoria Hotel combines original Art Nouveau features with modern facilities. Air-conditioned rooms have satellite TV, a safe and minibar. They feature wooden floors and free Wi-Fi, and the modern bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

The restaurant at the Astoria offers traditional Catalan cuisine, and room service is available. There is also a terrace and a bar.

There is a 24-hour front desk

Ideally located, 10 minutes’ walk from both Gaudi’s masterpieces La Pedrera and La Sagrada Familia, Yeah Barcelona Hostel offers free WiFi and 24-hour reception.

All rooms at Yeah Barcelona Hostel come with a private bathroom with shower and bed linen.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning and a dinner including a set menu, is prepared at night at the on-site kitchen. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar.

Many supermarkets are in the surrounding streets; and trendy bars, restaurants and shops can be found on the many public squares in the Gracia District, 15 minutes’ walk away. The closest metro station is Verdaguer, 500 metres away.

Offering air-conditioned rooms, free WiFi and an on-site restaurant, Hotel Nouvel is located on a pedestrianised street just 100 metres from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya Square and the Ramblas.

The hotel features ornate ceilings, cast bronze and crystal lamps, and marble floors, in the style of its 19th-century building.

All rooms come with a flat-screen TV, double-glazed windows and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. A safe is available to rent.

The hotel’s La Lluna Restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine. Vending machines with snacks, ice, and drinks, are also available.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can help you arrange car hire, a laundry service and tickets for shows. You will also find luggage storage and a reading room with two computers.

Portal de Angel shopping street is just 2 minutes’ walk away, while Barcelona Cathedral and the Gothic Quarter are a 10-minute walk from Hotel Nouvel.

Situated 200 metres from Las Ramblas in central Barcelona, Catalonia Avinyo features a rooftop pool and gym. It offers chic, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms are decorated in a modern, minimalist style with large wall photos. They include a minibar, safe and telephone. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app. The modern bathrooms have a shower and a hairdryer.

Barceloneta Beach is a 15-minute walk from Hotel Catalonia Avinyo. The Liceu and Jaume I Metro Stations are just 300 metres away and Barcelona Cathedral is 4 minutes' walk away.

The Avinyo’s central location means there are many shops, bars and restaurants close to the hotel. Bicycle and car hire can be arranged at the tour desk.

Hotel Boutique Mirlo Barcelona features a garden, shared lounge, a restaurant and bar in Barcelona. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. A spa and wellness centre comprising a sauna, an outdoor swimming pool, a hot tub, as well as a terrace can be used by all guests.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. The rooms are fitted with a kettle, while selected rooms will provide you with a patio and others also have city views. At Hotel Boutique Mirlo Barcelona all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a buffet or à la carte breakfast.

Park Güell is 2 km from Hotel Boutique Mirlo Barcelona, while La Pedrera is 3.6 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from the hotel.

Open since 1840, Sant Agustí is set in a restored convent just 150 metres from Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas. It offers free Wi-Fi and functional air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV.

Each room at Hotel Sant Agustí has simple, modern design and wooden flooring. Rooms come with a safe and a bathroom with toiletries and a hairdryer. Some rooms have a private balcony.

The Sant Agustí serves a daily continental buffet breakfast.

Downstairs there are computers which guests can use for free. Reception is also open 24 hours a day.

Set in a quiet square, the hotel is a 2-minute walk from Liceu Metro Station and La Boqueria Market. Plaza Catalunya is within 700 metres and offers various bus and train connections, including direct airport buses.

Occidental Barcelona 1929 features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a terrace and bar in Barcelona. Each accommodation at the 3-star hotel has city views and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 600 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Occidental Barcelona 1929 all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help.

Sants Railway Station is less than 1 km from Occidental Barcelona 1929, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 10 km from the hotel.

Catalonia Magdalenes Hotel is set in  Barcelona, 200 metres from the Cathedral of Barcelona and offers a terrace with an outdoor pool with views of the Cathedral and a spa. Portal de l'Angel is 200 metres away.

Each room at this hotel is air conditioned, soundproofed and features a flat-screen TV and a Nespresso Coffee Machine. The bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property, There is also a spa with a hot tub and a gym. The hotel offers show-cooking during breakfast.

Plaça Catalunya is 400 metres from Catalonia Magdalenes Hotel, while Picasso Museum is 600 metres away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Hotel Santa Marta is located just 100 metres from Barcelona’s fashionable Born area and França Railway Station. It offers simple, air-conditioned rooms with TV, tiled floors and private bathrooms.

Barceloneta Metro station is about 200 metres away, while the bars of Barceloneta can be reached in 5 minutes’ walk. The Gothic Quarter is also within 500 metres.

Hotel Santa Marta offers vending machines of drinks and snacks. There is a car park 5 minutes' walk from the property.

MH Apartments Sant Pau are located just 7 minutes’ walk from Gaudi’s famous Sagrada Família, in Barcelona. These modern, air-conditioned apartments feature free WiFi and a flat-screen TV.

MH Apartments Sant Pau have parquet floors. There is also a washing machine and dishwasher. Bed linen and towels are provided.

There are various restaurants, bars and supermarkets located in the streets around the apartments. The charming Bohemian district of Gràcia is just 5 minutes' walk away.

The amazing Hospital de Sant Pau, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is just 8 minutes’ walk from the apartments. Located a 7-minute walk away, Joanic Metro Station connects you with Barcelona City Centre and the Gothic Quarter in under 10 minutes.

Private parking is available 300 metres from the property, for an extra cost.

This modern hotel has 250 spacious and fully equipped rooms, a Snack-Bar open 24 hours where clients can enjoy a buffet breakfast, as well as light meals for lunch and dinner. It also has vending machines and private paid parking. All its facilities are perfectly adapted and accessible for people with reduced mobility.
It is a hotel with free and unlimited high-speed Wi-Fi in the common areas. Wi-Fi internet is available in the rooms at an extra cost.
Travelodge Barcelona Poblenou is a pet-friendly hotel that will be happy to offer you and your pet the best experience.
It is located in the traditional Poblenou neighborhood, within streets full of restaurants, bars and shops. One of the most charming neighborhoods in the city, and 600 meters from the Bogatell beach. Barcelona city center can be reached in 10 minutes by metro and Barcelona’s Port Olímpic, with its vibrant night life, is just a 20-minute walk away.
This is considered the most innovative neighborhood in the city. It´s in the heart of the 22@ District and concentrates a multitude of technology and R+D companies. Therefore, thanks to its location and facilities, it is also a perfect accommodation for business trips.
Travelodge Barcelona Poblenou offers all you need to have the best experience in Barcelona city.

Featuring a seasonal rooftop plunge pool with views and a solarium, Room Mate Anna is set in Barcelona City Centre. The hotel features cutting-edge and modern design as well as personalized service. The hotel serves a daily hot and cold buffet breakfast until midday.

Each stylish, air-conditioned room comes with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day as well as a balcony with views over Casa Batlló. Extras include a wide variety of free toiletries, a hairdryer and safe box.

Other facilities include a portable WiFi and meeting and conference rooms.

On the eigth floor of the hotel the bar Terraza de Anna by Vida Mona offers views over the city, cocktails and mediterranean tapas.
 The restaurant Vibra Speakeasy, inspired by the style of 1920, offers live music, food and cocktails from that time.

The Room Mate Anna is set in the heart of L'Eixample, just 100 metres from Casa Batlló. You will find a wide range of shops, restaurants, and cultural spots. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Conveniently located less than 10 minutes’ walk from Hospital Clinic Metro Station, Hotel Viladomat by Silken is located in Barcelona. This property features free WiFi and an on-site bar.

Each room at this property is air conditioned and has satellite TV, safe, desk, and minibar. The private bathroom includes a bath, shower, hairdryer, and free toiletries.

Hotel Viladomat by Silken has a 24-hour front desk and offers a ticket service. A shuttle to the airport is available for an extra charge, and there is luggage storage on site.

Plaza Catalunya and Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas are 20 minutes away by foot. The friendly staff are happy to provide information on the city and its main points of interest. Sants Station is 1 km away from Hotel Viladomat by Silken, with direct links to Barcelona Airport.

This stylish boutique hotel offers colourful, modern rooms in the historic city centre, just 4 minutes’ walk from Las Ramblas and Plaza Catalunya. There is a rooftop hot tub and terrace.

Guests at the Ciutat Vella enjoy free coffee. There is also a free internet terminal, and free WiFi is available throughout the hotel.

The rooms in the Ciutat Vella have large windows and flat-screen TVs. The bathrooms are modern and have showers.

Ciutat Vella’s central location makes it ideal for exploring Barcelona’s historic heart. Many great bars, cafés and restaurants are less than 10 minutes’ walk away. Universitat Metro Station is just 3 minutes away.

A 15-minute walk from Gaudí's Sagrada Família, Catalonia Sagrada Familia is just 300 metres from Clot Metro and Train Station. It features a restaurant, a seasonal outdoor pool and a gym.

The Catalonia Sagrada Familia features traditional, bright décor and its rooms are have a desk, a mini fridge with complimentary water and a safety deposit box. Free Wi-Fi access is available.
All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.

The restaurant serves a range of Catalan and Mediterranean cuisine, as well as a buffet breakfast. The café-bar offers a selection of drinks and snacks throughout the day and there is also a bar.

Car hire is available on site, and staff at the Catalonia Sagrada Familia’s 24-hour reception can provide information on Barcelona and its many attractions. The hotel is 200 metres from the Torre Agbar Tower.

Clot Metro Station connects guests to the city centre in 4 stops and the airport train also stops here.

This stylish design hotel is located 150 metres from Rocafort Metro Station in Barcelona. It offers a trendy rooftop bar and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and plasma satellite TV.

The soundproofed rooms at Hotel Villa Emilia feature parquet floors and modern décor. Each one has a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

Hotel Villa Emilia Barcelona’s restaurant serves creative Catalan food, and there is a weekly barbecue. The Villa Emilia Bistrot offers live music.

Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. There are also car and bicycle rental services at the front desk.

Hotel Villa Emilia is just 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza Espanya, where you can find the Fira Convention Centre. Sants Station is 15 minutes’ walk away.

This elegant hotel is set in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, in an impressive, colonial, stone building with a clock tower. It is a 10-minute walk from Barcelona Cathedral and Barceloneta Beach.

Hotel Colonial’s bright, air-conditioned rooms feature wooden floors. They are soundproofed and have a flat-screen TV and minibar. You can hire the safe, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

A buffet breakfast is served in the Colonial Hotel café. Guests can relax with a free newspaper in the stylish lounge, with its white leather sofas, where Wi-Fi is free of charge.

Barcelona Hotel Colonial has a tour desk. Barcelona Marina and the boutiques of the trendy Born district are 5 minutes’ walk away. Parking is also available within a 5-minute walk of the property.

Offering free WiFi access, Free Hostels Barcelona is located in central Barcelona, 700 metres from Hospital Clinic Metro. Gaudi's La Pedrera Building is a 23-minute walk away.

Rooms here will provide you with memory foam mattresses, air conditioning, sockets, reading lights, lockers, and a safe. A shared bathroom with free toiletries is located inside the dormitory. Bed linen is included, and towels can be hired for a surcharge.

At Free Hostels Barcelona you will find a 24-hour front desk, a shared TV lounge and a shared kitchen. The property can provide a ticket service and a tour desk.

Camp Nou Stadium is a 30-minute walk from the property and La Rambla is a 25-minute metro ride away. Barceloneta Beach can be reached in 45 minutes on public transport.

Zenit Borrell is located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, 15 minutes’ walk from the stylish Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers modern, soundproofed rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV.

The Marés restaurant offers Mediterranean and international cuisine, and has an elegant outdoor terrace. There is also a bar with a large TV screen.

All rooms at the Zenit Borrell have air conditioning and a minibar. The private bathrooms come equipped with a hairdryer.

The tour desk can provide useful information on Barcelona and the surrounding area. The hotel is 12 minutes from Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas by metro, while the Hospital Clinic Metro Station and hospital are 200 metres way from the hotel.

Wilson Boutique Hotel is situated on Barcelona’s Avinguda Diagonal, 12 minutes’ walk from La Pedrera in Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers free Wi-Fi, stylish décor and a rooftop terrace with impressive city views.

The Wilson Boutique Hotel has soundproofed rooms with chic, contemporary design. All rooms are bright with large windows. Each has a flat-screen TV and air conditioning.

The hotel is within walking distance of Plaza de Catalunya which features a range of shops and restaurants.

The Wilson Boutique has excellent transport links. Many buses, including the sightseeing bus, stop opposite the hotel.

The hotel offers free use of the PC and printer in the lobby. There is also a tour desk, where guests can receive information on Barcelona’s tourist attractions, including Gaudí’s Casa Batlló which is around 20 minutes’ walk from the Wilson. Diagonal Metro Station is 750 metres away.

Located next to Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia Boulevard, Catalonia Passeig de Gràcia 4* Sup offers an outdoor pool, a free gym, a terrace, free Wi-Fi and paid private parking.

All the rooms at Catalonia Passeig de Gràcia 4* Sup has a smart TV with Chromecast app.

The restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine with a selection of dishes from the "Gourmet Corner" menu. Gluten-free menus are available on request.

There is also a gastrobar and a bar with a cocktail menu. An electric vehicle charging station is available.

The property is 500 metres from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló, 200 metres from Passeig de Gràcia Metro Station, 13-minute walk from La Pedrera and 7-minute walk from Palau de la Música Catalana. Airport buses can be reached within 350 metres.

Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, located 350 metres away.

You Stylish El Born Apartments offer different locations within 15 minutes’ walk of Passeig de Sant Joan and Passeig de Gràcia. The nearest Metro Stations are Tetuán and Girona.

Each striking, modern apartment at You Stylish El Borne has minimalist, contemporary décor. There is free Wi-Fi, air conditioning and a spacious lounge with a flat-screen TV. The kitchen includes a microwave, fridge, a ceramic hob, oven, toaster and a coffee maker.

Several shops, supermarkets and cafes can be found in the surrounding streets. Passeig de Gràcia offers boutques and a range of restaurants.

Sights including La Sagrada Família, Las Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter can be reached easily by Metro.

Hotels: Ofelias Hotel 4Sup by Bondia Hotel Group
Full_Descriptions:
Set just off Gran Vía and a 2-minute walk from Plaza Espanya Metro Station and the Fira Exhibition Centre, Ofelias Hotel offers stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi. It features a roof terrace with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool.

Each bright, air-conditioned room at Ofelias Hotel has a flat-screen TV. Each one comes with a private bathroom. A free bottle of water is provided upon arrival.

The hotel has an on-site bar where you can get a drink. There is a range of cafes and bars around Plaza Espanya. Restaurants can be found on Las Ramblas and in the Gothic Quarter, just 4 Metro stops away.

Staff at the reception can give you information about different Slow Travel activities .These include free bicycles on request, allowing you to discover hidden places and enjoy local cultures. .

The Magic Fountains and Montjuïc Park are less than 1 km from the Ofelias, and Las Arenas Shopping centre is just opposite the hotel. The airport bus stops just 200 metres from the hotel. Bicycle rental is available on request from reception.

Inside Barcelona Apartments Sants offers modern, great-value accommodation. These apartments are conveniently located on a quiet street near Barcelona Sants station.

These stylish apartments have a full kitchen, a bathroom and comfortable living rooms. They all have free wired internet access.

Plaça Espanya and Montjuïc are just a short walk from the apartments. The famous Camp Nou football stadium is also nearby.

The Inside Barcelona Apartments Sants have excellent public transport links to travel around the city. The airport train stops at Sants station, just 400 metres away.

The apartments are 12 minutes' walk from Plaza Espanya and the Fira Exhibition Centre. Just beyond is Montjuïc Hill, where you can find the MNAC Modern Art Museum and Miró Foundation.

Featuring a rooftop swimming pool and hot tub with views of Barcelona, Sunotel Central is set in the centre of Barcelona, just 10 minutes' walk from Plaza Catalunya.

Modern rooms at Sunotel Central include free high-speed WiFi, satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and amenities.

Universitat Metro Station is just 200 metres from the hotel. The Ramblas, famous for its street performers, can be reached in 10 minutes by foot.

In the morning guests can enjoy a varied, fresh and healthy full buffet breakfast.

The hotel’s 24-hour reception offers a ticket booking service and luggage storage. There are computers in the lobby which guests can use for free. Meeting rooms are also available.

Attractively set in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, Barcelona Centric is situated 2.5 km from Sant Miquel Beach, 2.6 km from Barceloneta Beach and 600 metres from Boqueria Market. The property is set 600 metres from Plaça Reial, 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.2 km from Plaça Catalunya. The property is less than 1 km from the city centre and 2.5 km from Sant Sebastian Beach.

With a shared bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the hostel also boast free WiFi, while certain rooms come with a balcony. At Barcelona Centric rooms have bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Santa Maria del Mar, Picasso Museum and Cathedral of Barcelona. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Barcelona Centric.

Hotel Market is located next to Barcelona’s San Antonio Market, 10 minutes' walk from MACBA Gallery. Its chic rooms have rain showers and free Wi-Fi, and there is a popular restaurant.

The Market Hotel’s modern rooms have dark wood beams, white walls and large windows. Each one has a private bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony or terrace.

The hotel is 15 minutes’ walk from both Plaza Espanya and Plaza Catalunya. Sant Antoni Metro Station is about 200 metres away, and an airport shuttle bus stop can be found 2 minutes’ away.

The Market Hotel’s elegant restaurant offers a range of modern Catalan dishes, and specializes in rice.

Situated next to Gràcia FGC Train Station, Hotel Via Augusta has a rooftop terrace with views of Barcelona. It offers functional, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

The Via Augusta is a historic building with a beautiful original foyer. Rooms have simple, modern décor and wooden floors. They include a work desk, a safe and a bathroom with a hairdryer.

A varied breakfast buffet is served in the hotel, and drinks are available from the vending machine. A wide range of bars and restaurants can be found in the popular Gràcia district, within a 5-minute walk.

Hotel Via Augusta is 400 metres from Fontana Metro Station, and Parc Güell is just 1 Metro stop away. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are a 5-minute journey from nearby Gracia Station.

Located 15 minutes' walk from Las Ramblas and Plaça Espanya, Hostal Barcelona has rooms with air conditioning, TV and free Wi-Fi. Famous for its theatres, Parallel Avenue is 100 metres away.

Hostal Barcelona can provide tourist information, assist with ticket reservations including the Barcelona Tourist Bus, and help arrange car/bike rental. There is an internet terminal in reception. A luggage storage service is available and all rooms have a safe. Reception is available 24 hours.

A continental breakfast buffet is served from 07:30 to 10:30 It offers different kinds of bread, butter, jams, cornflakes, yogurt, cheese, ham, salami, croissants, chocolate croissants, muffins, biscuits, gaufres, Nutella, fruit, juice, coffee, milk and tea. Cold and hot drinks and pastries are available 24 hours a day. Guests also have access to a microwave. There is a supermarket in the same building, restaurants and bars in the surroundings.

Parallel Metro Station and many bus routes are 100 metres from Hostal Barcelona. The Fira Convention Centre is 12 minutes away by public transport. Montjuïc is a 5-minute walk from the guest house, and the Old Harbour can be reached in 20 minutes on foot.

Blanc Guest House is 8 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s famous Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers an attractive terrace and smart rooms with free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV.

The rooms at Blanc Guest House are decorated in white, with parquet floors and white furniture. Each one comes with air conditioning, heating and a fan, and some have a private bathroom.

Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. Car rental is also available from the front desk.

The Blanc is 8 minutes’ walk from Diagonal Metro Station, connecting you with the rest of the city with ease. Plaza Catalunya is just 2 stops away.

Barcelona Travel is located in a Modernist building from the XIX century in the centre of Barcelona, a little over 5 minutes' walk from Gran Vía Avenue and Plaça Universitat Square. Free WiFi access is available.

Each modern, air-conditioned room features parquet floors and a 40-inch flat-screen TV. Featuring a bath or shower, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Bed linen and towels are provided.

Tourist information can be provided at the reception, and bikes and car rental are also available. Transportation to Barcelona El Prat Airport, located 20 minutes away by car, can be arranged.

The guest house is 850 metres from Passeig de Gracia Station, and Plaça Catalunya is 10 minutes away on foot.

Casa Gràcia is a modern hostel at the top of Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia, 300 metres from Gaudí’s La Pedrera. It offers air-conditioned rooms and free Wi-Fi in all areas.

Shared and private rooms are available, as well as apartments. Facilities at Casa Gràcia include a communal terrace, lounge, kitchen, dining area and a 24-hour front desk.

The hostel arranges daily walking tours of the city.

Casa Gràcia is situated just metres from Avinguda Diagonal and within 300 metres of Diagonal Metro Station, which offers access to the Sagrada Familia.

Passeig de Gràcia is full of exclusive shops, restaurants and bars. Gaudí’s Casa Batlló is within a 10-minute walk,  as well as the popular Gràcia neighbourhood. There are a number of beautiful Modernist buildings in the area.

Hotels: Serennia Cest Apartamentos Arc de Triomf
Full_Descriptions:
These modern apartments are located 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Arc de Triomf. Each air-conditioned apartment includes a flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

The apartments at Arc de Triomf Apartments feature parquet floors and light wood furniture. The modern kitchen has an oven, hob, washing machine and dishwasher.

There are plenty of bars, restaurants and supermarkets within a 2-minute walk of the apartments.

Arc de Triomf Apartments are just 200 metres from Estació del Nord Bus Station, and you can walk to Plaza Catalunya in 15 minutes. Ciutadela Park is a 10-minute walk away.

Hotel Balmoral is within 5 minutes' walk of Barcelona’s Diagonal Metro Station and Passeig de Gràcia boulevard. This boutique hotel offers free access to its wellness area and free Wi-Fi.

Each modern, air-conditioned room at the Balmoral Hotel Barcelona features elegant, functional design. All rooms come with a flat-screen TV and a minibar.

The hotel has a small wellness area with a sauna, experience shower and fitness machines. It also includes massage cabins and a sun terrace.

Guests receive a free welcome drink between 12:00 and 18:00. You can enjoy a drink in the hotel’s bar, or try bars and restaurants in the popular Gràcia district, a 5-minute walk away. In the morning, a breakfast buffet is served in the hotel.

Hotel Balmoral Barcelona has a TV lounge where you can enjoy sports events on the big screen. There are also 2 computers with internet access.

Gaudí's famous La Pedrera is just a 5-minute walk from the hotel, and the iconic Sagrada Família is 2 km away. Nearby bus and metro connections offer direct access to Plaça Catalunya, the historic city centre and to FC Barcelona's Camp Nou Stadium. Private parking is available in the hotel at an extra cost.

Offering a year-round outdoor pool with city views, Ohla Eixample is a stylish boutique hotel located 10 minutes’ walk from two of Gaudi’s major works, La Pedrera and Casa Batlló. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout and a Clef d’Or Concierge service.

Each well-designed room comes with a large bed and a private bathroom with bath or a rainfall shower. There is a 55-inch flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar with local delicatessen and a free safe for laptops. A turndown service is also available.

The on-site Michelin-starred Xerta Restaurant serves traditional recipes from the Ebro Region; and a complete breakfast is also served every morning including a huge selection of local products. The hotel also has the Lobby Bar, a meeting point for both locals and hotel guests; and the Sky Bar, a creative cocktail bar.

Guests can enjoy a selection of high-tech fitness equipment at the on-site gym; and beauty treatments and fashion services such as personal shopper are available on prior request.

Ohla Eixample is conveniently located in the Eixample District, in the modernist area locally known as Quadrat d’Or - Golden Square; within 5 minutes’ walk of the emblematic Diagonal Avenue, Rambla de Catalunya and Paseo de Gracia shopping boulevards. This urban building has an eye-catching ceramic façade, made from over 1000 carved pieces that represent Vivaldi’s Four Seasons.

Hotel SB Diagonal Zero Barcelona is opposite Barcelona’s International Convention Centre and Barcelona's Forum Auditorium. It has a spa, a gym, a seasonal panoramic pool and a solarium on the hotel rooftop.

There is free access to the hotel gym. The spa is only for guests over 14, and includes a Turkish bath and Finnish sauna. Beauty and massage treatments are available at a surcharge.

All air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel SB Diagonal Zero Barcelona have flat-screen satellite TV, free WiFi and a laptop safe. The soundproofed rooms have facilities to connect iPods.

All rooms have ironing facilities, tea and coffee making facilities, and a kettle. There is a touch-screen control for lights and temperature. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer, and bathrobes and slippers can be provided upon request.

Located in Barcelona, 1 km from Bogatell Beach, Hotel Paxton Barcelona provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Certain rooms at the property include a terrace with a city view.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hotel Paxton Barcelona each room comes with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. At Hotel Paxton Barcelona you will find a restaurant serving Italian and Spanish cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and gluten-free options can also be requested.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Mar Bella Beach, Nova Icaria Beach and Port Olimpic. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from Hotel Paxton Barcelona.

Catalonia Diagonal Centro is set in the heart of Barcelona’s Eixample district, 300 metres from Diagonal Metro Station. It features a seasonal outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.

At the Catalonia Diagonal Centro, you can enjoy modern, comfortable accommodation next to some of Barcelona’s most popular sights. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app

Only 300 metres away on Passeig de Gràcia is La Pedrera, one of Gaudi’s famous creations. Take a stroll past the Modernista buildings to reach Plaça Catalunya and the lively Ramblas area.

Back at the hotel, relax in your stylish bedroom with contemporary wooden furniture and marble en suite bathroom. Watch satellite television or take advantage of the free wireless internet connection.

A short stroll from the hotel takes you to trendy Gràcia, with its bohemian shops and leafy squares, and a huge selection of bars and restaurants. Nearby metro and bus lines make it easy to see the whole of this cosmopolitan city.

Situated in Barcelona, 1.5 km from Palau Sant Jordi, Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira features air-conditioned accommodation and a bar. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant and an outdoor pool. Camp Nou is 2.9 km away and Boqueria Market is 4 km from the hotel.

At Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira offers a terrace.

Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 2 km from the hotel, while Montjuïc is 2.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 8 km from Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira.

Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, H10 Cubik offers accommodation in Barcelona. The hotel has a seasonal outdoor pool and terrace, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar.

Rooms come with a flat-screen TV. Some units include a seating area for your convenience. Every room comes with a private bathroom.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Sitges is 35 km from H10 Cubik, while Calella is 47 km from the property. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 13 km from the property.

This modern hotel offers free WiFi and spacious, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV. NH Barcelona Eixample is 400 metres from Hospital Clínic Metro Station, in the Eixample district.

The NH Barcelona Eixample is a 15-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard and Plaza Catalunya Square. Barcelona Sants Train Station is within 2 Metro stops, and Gaudí’s Sagrada Família Church is 3 stops away.

Rooms at the NH Barcelona Eixample feature simple, functional décor and wooden floors. They all include a minibar and a selection of pillows. The marble bathrooms come with a hairdryer and a range of toiletries.

The hotel’s breakfast buffet includes typical pastries, fresh fruit and Spanish cured ham.

Situated on Barcelona’s Las Ramblas, this guest house is less than 200 metres from Liceu Metro Station. It offers simple, comfortable rooms and has free Wi-Fi access available throughout.

The Hostal Boquería’s functional rooms feature air conditioning and cable TV, as well as heating and a safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Rooms with views of the Ramblas are subject to availability.

The Boquería has a 24-hour reception. Guests can also make use of its luggage storage.

The central location makes visiting Barcelona’s sights easy. The Boquería Market is just across the Ramblas. Barcelona Cathedral and the surrounding Gothic Quarter are within 5 minutes’ walk of Hostal Boqueria.

The Catalonia Catedral is set in a traditional Modernist building, just 100 metres from Barcelona Cathedral. It offers free use of Smartphones, Wi-Fi access, a rooftop seasonal pool and a Japanese-style terrace and garden.

The Catedral has stylish rooms, which have contemporary décor. Each has a flat-screen smart TV equipped with Chromecast app, air conditioning, a minibar, a Nespresso machine. A smartphone is available for guests during their stay free of charge.

The hotel’s Ascent Restaurant by Eboca serves Mediterrean cuisine and offers views of the nearby Palacio Pignatelli Art Gallery. There is also a bar in the hotel lobby where guests can use the computers with internet access and printers for free.

The Catalonia Catedral is around 10 minutes’ walk from landmarks such as Las Ramblas and Plaza de Catalunya Square. Barcelona’s Old Port and Marina are less than one kilometre away. Jaume I Metro Station is 5 minutes' walk away.

The stylish apartments at San Antoni Market are less than 5 minutes’ walk from Sant Antoni Metro station in central Barcelona. They offer smart accommodation with free Wi-Fi, just 200 metres from the market.

The spacious apartments at Sant Antoni Market combine modern décor with original features such as beamed ceilings or French doors. The living room has a sofa and a flat-screen TV, while the kitchen comes with a microwave, fridge, oven, a toaster and a coffee maker.

There is a range of shops, bakeries, bars and cafés in the streets surrounding the apartments. The famous Las Ramblas and Plaza de Catalunya are within 20 minutes’ walk.

The MACBA Museum is less than 1 km from the apartments. Sant Antoni Metro Station is just 5 stops from the Sagrada Família. The airport bus stops on Comte d’Urgell and at Plaza Universitat, both within 15 minutes’ walk.

VIU BARCELONA BERTRAN, a property with a terrace, is located in Barcelona, 3.4 km from La Pedrera, 3.6 km from Casa Batllo, as well as 4 km from Passeig de Gracia. The property features mountain and garden views, and is 1.5 km from Park Güell. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available nearby.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 4.1 km from the apartment, while Sagrada Familia is 4.2 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from VIU BARCELONA BERTRAN.

Vivo Barcelona Apartments Jordi offers modern and good value for money accommodation. The apartments are located in a quiet street, close to Plaza España.

It offers well-appointed apartments with full kitchens and air conditioning. There is free WiFi, Smart TV, washing machine and dishwasher. The building has been completely renovated in September 2021.

The accommodations are spacious and have a kitchen, bathroom and living-dining area. Here you can relax after a long day of sightseeing and prepare your own meals.

The apartments are located in a well-connected area of the city, Plaza España and the Fira fairgrounds are between 2 and 10 minutes' walk away. A little further afield, you can find the Montjuïc mountain, which houses the National Art Museum of Catalonia and the Miró Foundation.

Our clients say that this part of Barcelona is their favourite, based on independent reviews.

Vivo Barcelona Apartments Jordi has been receiving Booking.com clients since 14 Oct 2008.

Aparthotel Bertrán is located in a quiet part of Barcelona, 5 minutes’ walk from Avinguda Tibidabo FGC Station and Vallcarca Metro. It offers spacious accommodation, a gym and an outdoor pool.

Each air-conditioned Bertrán apartment has a living room with satellite TV and a sofa. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer, and there is a kitchenette with a fridge, microwave and coffee maker.

Some apartments have a private balcony with table and chairs. All apartments have free Wi-Fi.

A continental breakfast is available at the Bertrán, and you can have breakfast in your apartment. There is a supermarket 2 minutes’ walk away.

There is a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. On-site parking is available for an extra charge.

You can reach Barcelona city centre in 15 minutes by train, Metro or bus, and there is a night bus stop nearby. Parc Güell is just over 1 km away.

Situated conveniently in the centre of Barcelona, Yurbban Ramblas Boutique Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant. Popular points of interest nearby include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Casa Batllo. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.5 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a wardrobe, a TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Every room has a safety deposit box, while selected rooms will provide you with a balcony and others also have city views.

Speaking English, Spanish and French, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help you plan your stay.

Popular points of interest near Yurbban Ramblas Boutique Hotel include Boqueria Market, Passeig de Gracia and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

Hotels: Hotel Balmes, a member of Preferred Hotels & Resorts
Full_Descriptions:
Balmes is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes’ walk from the famous Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers a swimming pool, a gym/fitness center and modern rooms with satellite TV.

The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Balmes feature parquet floors and smart, simple décor. They all come with a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi.

B Bar, like the rest of the hotel, is decorated with works of African art.

Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception can help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. There is a computer in the lobby which guests can use for free.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are both under 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel. You can walk to Las Ramblas and Barcelona’s charming Gothic Quarter in around 15 minutes.

This stylish hotel offers a gym and free Wi-Fi. It is set on a quiet street just 6 minutes’ walk from Bogatell Beach and 300 metres from Llacuna Metro Station.

The bright, air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel 4 Barcelona hotel are modern and elegant, with wooden floors. All have flat-screen satellite TV, and some have views of the sea or city.

The Hotel 4 Barcelona’s restaurant offers Mediterranean dishes, and there is also a stylish bar. The surrounding area has several popular restaurants and bars.

The hotel offers a sauna and steam baths, available for an extra cost. The gym is available for an extra cost, and massage can be arranged. It also has a 24-hour reception with bicycle rental

Hotel 4 is set in the 22@ Technological District, 1 km from Ciutadella Park and 600 metres from the Olympic Port.

This hotel, located in the Gothic heart of Barcelona near the Cathedral, enjoys an ideal location for visiting the sights of this exciting city.
