Hotel Suizo has modern facilities and comfortable rooms with satellite television and air conditioning. Watch the world go by from the bedroom with a balcony overlooking the streets of Barcelona’s Gothic quarter, or relax in the Suizo’s lounge.

Wander in the labyrinth of narrow streets surrounding the impressive Barcelona Cathedral, just 200 metres from the hotel. A short walk takes you to the famous Ramblas, with its colourful street performers and pavement cafés.

Walk down to the old port or the beach, or take the metro to visit other areas of the city. A metro station next to the Hotel Suizo makes public transport connections easy.

Located in Barcelona’s Eixample District, beside Rocafort Metro Station and 15 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya,  Chi Hotel offers rooms with air-conditioning and heating (depending on the season) and free WiFi.

The modern rooms include a flat-screen TV, minibar, safe and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Staff can help with tourist information and car hire.

You will find many shops, restaurants and bars in the surrounding area.

Ideally located, 6 minutes’ walk from both Paseo de Gracia and central Plaza Catalunya, Midtown Apartments offers stylish, modern décor apartments with a seasonal pool and solarium in the building’s rooftop.

Set in the same building, all the soundproofed apartments have a smart TV in each bedroom and a living-dining room with a bluetooth speaker and a free safe. The kitchen is equipped with ceramic hobs, oven and dishwasher; there is a washing machine, a dryer and cleaning products are provided.

Numerous bars and restaurants serving local and international cuisine are within walking distance, and supermarkets open till late can be found nearby.

The apartments are also well connected by bus and metro to all main tourist attractions in Barcelona. A private parking is available on site.

08028 Apartments are situated next to Les Corts Metro Station and 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Camp Nou Football Stadium. The modern apartments share a rooftop pool with views of Barcelona.

Apartments and suites at the 08028 feature contemporary design and free Wi-Fi. Apartments include a balcony, lounge area and a fitted kitchen.

The Taberna Lizarran at the 08028 Apartments serves traditional Spanish cuisine, including tapas.

The 08028 Apartments are a 15-minute walk from Sants Train Station. Plaza Catalunya and the famous Las Ramblas can be reached in around 20 minutes, by Metro.

Generator Barcelona is located 500 metres from the fashionable Passeig de Gracia Avenue. The hostel offers a 24-hour reception, free private lockers in shared dormitories and free Wi-Fi in public areas.

Diagonal and Verdaguer metro stations are within 5 minutes’ walk from Generator Barcelona. The Gràcia district, which has plenty of boutique shops and bars, is only 200 metres away.

Both private rooms and dormitories have air conditioning and heating, as well as individual power sockets and reading lamps for each bed. Female-only dormitories include hairdryers and other amenities.

They also feature an en suite bathroom, a sink and a mirror. Bed linen is included, while towels can be rented at the reception. Dormitories are available for guests over 18 years old.

Guests can have a daily breakfast for an extra cost. Generator Barcelona also has a communal lounge and a luggage storage service.

Set in a Modernist building on Barcelona’s Diagonal Avenue, You Stylish Diagonal Apartments is located just 120 metres from Francesc Macià Square. These modern apartments offer free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV.

The air-conditioned, soundproofed apartments feature stylish décor with design furniture and parquet floors. Each one has a lounge-diner with a sofa, and the kitchens include a hob, oven, microwave and coffee maker. The bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

A swimming pool and small gym are located nearby, and surcharges are applicable.

A cleaning or babysitting service, as well as breakfast and other catering, are available for an extra charge. There are many shops, bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk of You Stylish Diagonal Apartments.

You can walk to the top of the prestigious Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard in 13 minutes from You Stylish Diagonal Apartments. Located 10 minutes’ walk away, Hospital Clinic Metro Station connects you with Sants Station in 2 stops and Barcelona FC’s Camp Nou Stadium in 4 stops.

Set beside Barcelona's Francesc Macià Square, Vincci Mae features a terrace with a plunge pool and fantastic views of Diagonal Avenue and Tibidabo Mountain.

Vincci Mae boasts an on-site restaurant and bar, it also has a 24-hour front desk and offers free WiFi throughout the property.  An assorted buffet breakfast is offered everyday.

Stylish rooms feature a simple and bright décor, air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV, kettle, and minibar. The fancy private bathroom includes a shower, free toiletries ,and a hairdryer.

Casa Batlló is 1.6 km from Vincci Mae, while La Pedrera is 1.3 km away. You can reach Plaza Catalunya in 20 minutes in public transport.

Situated 300 metres from L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre, the Derby is a 20-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou stadium. Each air-conditioned room offers flat-screen satellite TV and free internet access.

The stylish Derby Hotel has an impressive collection of Catalan art, including pieces by Miró and Tàpies. Rooms have functional design and parquet flooring. They all include a safe and a minibar.

Hotel Derby features Italian pizzeria Santa Napoli and cocktail bar with Peruvian nuances Lima Bruja.

Located just 10 metres away, the Gran Derby Hotel allows guests access to its gym and swimming pool. Hospital Clinic Metro Station is 800 metres away, while the Feria Trade Fair in Plaza Espanya can be reached in a 20-minute walk.

These stylish apartments are located in Barcelona’s El Born district, 3 minutes' walk from the Picasso Museum. Each apartment offers free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

Inside Barcelona Apartments Esparteria are bright and air-conditioned. They all have a spacious seating area and a modern kitchenette with an oven, hob and fridge.

Inside Barcelona Apartments Esparteria has a communal terrace (open during office hours), where guests can enjoy views of nearby Santa María del Mar Church.

Staff at reception can help organise your trip to Barcelona. Bicycle rental and a ticket service are also available.

The Esparteria is within 100 metres of the popular Passeig del Born. Barceloneta Beach is a 15-minute walk away, and Ciutadella Park is 400 metres away. There are various restaurants, bars and supermarkets within a short walk.

Housed in a 19th- century modernist building, just behind La Pedrera, H10 Casa Mimosa offers an impressive chill-out terrace with a plunge pool and a sun lounger area with privileged views of Casa Milà’s terrace.

All rooms are outward-facing, with both views over Pau Claris Street or over the courtyard garden which has Gaudí’s chimneys in the background. All have smart temperature control and high-quality amenities including a Nespresso Coffee Machine and a digital safe box. Some rooms also have spacious terraces.

The on-site El Til•ler Restaurant serves a delicious breakfast with a buffet consisting of natural products and a selection of à la carte dishes. The Lobby Bar also offers light meals and is also an excellent meeting point for a drink.

The beautiful garden retains some former cabins which are located in a courtyard that is typical of the Eixample district; and has a large variety of Mediterranean greenery such as a century-old palm tree, an impressive lime tree and mimosas, which give the hotel’s name. In the garden there is also an elevated swimming pool and a sun lounger area.

From here, there is access to the Las Cocheras meeting room, a former garage with high-ceilings and a capacity up to 100 people.

Ideally located, H10 Casa Mimosa is 10 minutes’ walk from Casa Battló; Plaza Catalunya and Ramblas can be reached within 15 minutes’ walk. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout.

Offering a terrace with hammocks and swimming pool on the 7th floor, H10 Art Gallery is a modern hotel located in Barcelona, 350 metres from Rambla Catalunya. Free Wi-Fi access is available.

This design hotel showcases various pieces of art including paintings, lithographs and sculptures. There is a free business corner with computers, free national and international newspapers and a panoramic lift.

The elegant, air-conditioned rooms at the Art Gallery hotel come with a LED-screen TV with international channels, an iPod dock, a minibar and a laptop safe. The private bathrooms have a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast made of high-quality, natural products and a range of à la carte dishes, is served every morning.

There is a stylish garden with decorative sheets of water, a bar and a restaurant on the hotel's ground floor. At H10 Art Gallery you will find a 24-hour front desk where tourist information can be provided, as well as meeting and banquet facilities.

Private parking is available for an extra cost. Provença Railway Station is 2 minutes' walk away, while Diagonal Metro Station is 400 metres away. El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

THE NIRTC LICENSE NUMBER IS : HB-004616

Hotels: Labtwentytwo Barcelona, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel
Full_Descriptions:
Labtwentytwo Barcelona, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a terrace and restaurant in Barcelona. This 4-star hotel features free WiFi and a bar. Certain units at the property feature a balcony with a city view.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Labtwentytwo Barcelona, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel every room includes bed linen and towels.

Breakfast is available every morning, and includes buffet, à la carte and continental options.

Speaking German, English, Spanish and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the reception.

Nova Mar Bella Beach is 1.9 km from the accommodation, while Llevant is 2.1 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 17 km from Labtwentytwo Barcelona, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel.

Set on Parallel Avenue, Hotel Auto Hogar is just opposite Parallel Metro Station and 10 minutes’ walk from the Ramblas. It offers air-conditioned rooms with private bathrooms.

All rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and vanity mirror.

Some of Barcelona’s most popular theatres can be found within 5 minutes’ walk, while Montjuïc hill is 15 minutes' walk from the hotel. The Fira Exhibition Centre is just over 1 km away.

The Auto Hogar Hotel’s restaurant serves Mediterranean dishes, and is open 7 days a week. The hotel also has a café.

The hotel reception offers free newspapers, and can arrange bicycle and car hire.

This guest house offers free Wi-Fi in a location by Barcelona Port. Yomo Hostal BCN Port is just 100 metres from Las Ramblas and 400 metres from the Gothic Quarter.

Paral•lel Metro is a short walk away. This offers direct access to Plaça Catalunya, Plaça Espanya and the Sagrada Familia. The funicular to Montjuic also leaves from here.

The guest house is set opposite the Cruise Terminals, 10 minutes from Barcelona Beach. There are many buses and bicycle lanes nearby.

All rooms at the Yomo Hostal BCN Port have a TV, heating and air conditioning. Standard rooms are en suite and economy rooms have a shared bathroom.

Family rooms and rooms for disabled guests are available. Daily cleaning is provided.

Situated in Barcelona, 2.9 km from Somorrostro Beach and 800 metres from the centre, Casa Lolita features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a terrace. The property is set 2.9 km from Barceloneta Beach, 1 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana and 700 metres from Tivoli Theatre. The accommodation offers a lift, a shared kitchen and luggage storage for guests.

At the guest house, every unit is fitted with a wardrobe. Some units have a balcony and/or a patio with city or inner courtyard views. All units in the guest house are fitted with a flat-screen TV with streaming services and with satellite channels.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Passeig de Gracia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Casa Batllo. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Casa Lolita.

Hotels: Casa Consell Gran Via, Guest House
Full_Descriptions:
Casa Consell Gran Via, Guest House offers value-for-money and free Wi-Fi on Gran Vía, in Barcelona’s famous Eixample district. It is set 700 metres from Plaça Catalunya and Passeig de Gràcia.

The guesthouse is only 500 metres from Nord Bus Station. There is easy access to Tetuán and Girona Metro Stations.

The guesthouse is set in a historic building it has elegant décor and original features. Guests can enjoy a full equipped shared kitchen and complimentary coffee and tea during the stay.

Casa Consell Gran Via, Guest House is near many famous Modernista buildings. These include Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and the Sagrada Família. The Gothic Quarter and the Cathedral are also nearby.

Some rooms have a balcony or terrace with street views. They have an en suite bathroom, with typical ceramic tiles.

Hostal Operaramblas is situated less than 100 metres from Las Ramblas and Liceu Metro Station. This guest house features rooms with private bathrooms, a 24-hour front desk and free Wi-Fi.

The Operaramblas’ rooms offers simple décor with tiled floors. Each room has heating and a telephone.

The guest house has a drinks machine and sells snacks in the reception, where there is also a computer with internet access.

The guest house has an ideal location in the centre of Barcelona. It is 5 minutes’ walk from the Gothic Quarter, where there are a range of cafés, bars and restaurants. The city’s cathedral is 500 metres from the Opera and the Old Port is less than 10 minutes’ walk away.

Hotels: Hotel SOFIA Barcelona, in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Full_Descriptions:
Hotel Sofia Barcelona is set on Barcelona's Diagonal Avenue, a 5-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium. It features free WiFi throughout, on-site restaurants and stunning city views. Guests have free access to a bright, modern 24-hour gym with a variety of equipment.

Designer rooms at Sofia offer home automation technology, a 49-inch Smart TV, a safe, and air conditioning. Their private bathroom includes Natura Bissé amenities, bathrobes and slippers.

The hotel offers several gastronomic spaces, including SOFIA Be So restaurant serving traditional dishes, and Impar Restaurant, which serves fresh Mediterranean dishes prepared with international culinary techniques. It also features a spacious outdoor terrace.

Guests will also find a sophisticated book cafe, Philosofia, which serves confectionery and fresh pastries, to eat in or take away.

Sofia Oasis Wellness & Spa houses more than 1000 m² space for well-being, including water circuits, saunas and steam baths. You can relax with one of the range of treatments available onsite and coordinated by expert therapists.

Sofia Barcelona, in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt is 400 metres from Maria Cristina Metro Station and the central Plaza España Square is 3 metro stops away. L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre is 15 minutes away on foot

We only accept dogs up to 18 kg in weight, with a maximum of one per room. We do not accept any other pets

For pets.
Dogs classified as dangerous breeds are not allowed.
Pets must comply with current health regulations.
They must be supervised by an adult at all times and steady on a leash when going through public areas.
€100 will be charged for deep cleaning of the room at the time of departure. (Service dogs are exempt from said fee)
€25 per pet per day will be charged in addition to the room rate.

Hesperia Barcelona Barri Gòtic is in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, just 100 metres from the port and 500 metres from Las Ramblas.

Barceloneta Beach is a 15-minute stroll from the Hesperia Barcelona Barri Gotic.

Its bright, modern rooms offer free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. They also have air conditioning or heating and a safe. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and toiletries.

You can find a range of lively bars in the surrounding streets.

Barcelona Aquarium and Maremagnum Shopping Centre are 800 metres away.

This motorcycle-friendly hotel is 3 Metro stops from Plaza Catalunya and 15 minutes’ walk from the Barcelona’s beaches. There is free WiFi available throughout.

Capri by Fraser Barcelona offers chic air-conditioned and spacious suites and apartments with a flat-screen cable TV and a seating area. There is a fully-equipped kitchenette, a work desk and a safe, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

The property has a free self-service laundry room open 24 hours a day and a gym.

For guests coming by motorcycle, Capri by Fraser offers free indoor parking with direct elevator to the rooms and a “pit stop” service including complete toolkit for small repairs and chain lubricant, free suede, helmet visor cleaner, battery charger and compressor to check the pressure level of tyres.

Capri by Fraser Barcelona offers a buffet breakfast every day and a set menu at lunch time during week days. Room service is also available.

The hotel has a 24-hour front desk.

Located between the Gothic Quarter and the fashionable Born district, this stylish hotel has a fitness centre and free WiFi in all areas.

Barcelona Cathedral is just 200 metres from the Ilunion Almirante, and guests can walk to the famous Las Ramblas in less than 10 minutes. Jaume I Metro Station is 300 metres from the hotel.

Rooms feature wooden furniture and an en suite bathroom with marble finishes. They all include a large flat-screen TV with satellite channels, safe and minibar.

This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility, accessible rooms are available on request, also for people with auditory and visual impairment.

The Ilunion Almirante features a stylish breakfast room where an à-la-carte breakfast is served daily. Room service is available during limited hours.

This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

The Hotel Ronda Lesseps is a quiet and familiar establishment, with two beautiful interior terraces full of plants that allow our guests to relax during their stay in our city.

The Hotel is located in the metropolitan heart of Barcelona, with very good communication by public transport, very close to the historic district of Gràcia and just at a ten minutes’ walk from Antoni Gaudí's Park Güell.

License number: HB-004338

Hotel Cantón is situated in central Barcelona, less than 300 metres from Las Ramblas and the city’s Old Port. It offers 24-hour reception and rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access throughout.

The Cantón has brightly decorated rooms with private bathrooms. Each has a fridge, air conditioning and heating.

The Cantón serves a daily breakfast and has a vending machine selling hot drinks. Guests can make use of the hotel’s TV room, where there is also computer.

The Cantón has easy access to many of Barcelona’s tourist attractions and has a tour desk. Plaza Reial is less than 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel and there are several bars and restaurants within walking distance.

Drassanes Metro Station is under 500 metres from the Cantón and Sants Train Station is 5 stops away.

The AC Hotel Irla is located 200 metres from Diagonal and Francesc Macià Square. The hotel has stylish and comfortable rooms, a fitness centre and 24-hour reception.

Rooms at this hotel are spacious and feature contemporary décor. All rooms have air conditioning, minibar and private bathroom.

Facilities at the Irla include Turkish baths, café-bar and free Wi-Fi access in public areas.

Guests can enjoy breakfast in the Irla’s restaurant. There are also bars, cafes and restaurants in the area surrounding Francesc Macià.

Attractions such as Casa Batlló, Casa Mila and Plaça de Catalunya are within 30 minutes’ walk of the AC Hotel Irla. The hotel is close to bus and tram connections and is a 20-minute walk from the Metro station, Diagonal.

INNSiDE by Meliá Barcelona Apolo is located at the foot of Montjuïc, 7 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Ramblas. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with WiFi.

Refurbished in 2017, the rooms at INNSiDE by Meliá Barcelona Apolo feature smart décor and wooden floors. Each one has a flat-screen TV, minibar, work desk and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

The hotel serves a varied buffet breakfast every morning. There is also a snack bar serving light meals in the evenings.

Parallel Metro Station is next to the hotel, connecting you with the Fira Convention Centre in 2 stops.

MH Apartments Suites is located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, 500 metres from the prestigious Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers modern apartments with free Wi-Fi and international satellite TV.

The modern MH Suites feature smart décor and parquet floors. They all have a seating area with sofas, a flat-screen TV and DVD player.

The kitchens at MH Apartments feature an oven, hob and Nespresso coffee maker. There is also a washing machine.

Late check-out is available on request at MH Apartments Suites. There is 24-hour customer service, and check-in staff can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona.

Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló are under 10 minutes’ walk from the apartments. Girona and Verdaguer Metro Stations are both a 5-minute walk away, connecting you with the rest of the city.

Located next to the Fira de Barcelona Exhibition Centre, these bright modern apartments offer free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Plaza Espanya Square is just 50 metres away.

Each stylish Ding Dong Fira Apartment is decorated in light colours, with smart wooden floors. Apartments have a lounge with a sofa bed, and air conditioning and heating is available in the lounge only.

There is a well-equipped open-plan kitchenette with a washing machine, microwave, toaster, Nespresso coffee machine and utensils. Towels and bed linen are provided and there is a hairdryer.

A range of bars, restaurants and shops can be found within a 5-minute walk of the Fira Apartments by gaiarooms. The famous Magic Fountain and Las Arenas Shopping Centre are both within 100 metres.

Espanya Metro Station, 250 metres away, offers direct metro services within 10 minutes to Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas. Sants International Train Station is within a 500 metre walk of the apartments or can be reached by direct metro line. Buses to and from the airport, as well as city tour buses, stop 3 minutes' walk from the apartments.

Set just 500 metres from Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas,  BUHO Boutique Barcelona offers charming, air-conditioned rooms, individually decorated with antique furniture. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property.

Rooms feature artwork and large windows, as well as a flat-screen TV, DVD player and DVDs. The private bathrooms include a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have access to a pretty, shared terrace.

BUHO Boutique Barcelona also has a TV lounge. The guest house is surrounded by restaurants and bars.

Tourist information can be provided by staff, and both Barcelona Cathedral and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló are less than 10 minutes’ walk away.

Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya and luggage storage is offered at the property.

Located next to Fabra i Puig Station, Ibis Barcelona Meridiana is a 10-minute Metro journey from Plaza Catalunya. It offers a 24-hour bar and air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV.

Barcelona Meridiana’s bar serves a wide range of snacks and drinks.

Hotel Ibis Barcelona Meridiana is set next to the Heron City Shopping Centre, where you can find restaurants, cinemas and a gym. Indoor public parking is available at an extra cost.

Hotels: Casa Elliot by Bondia Hotel Group
Full_Descriptions:
The Casa Elliot by Bondia Hotel Group is located in the centre of Barcelona, less than 10 minutes’ walk from Plaça de Catalunya and Las Ramblas. This stylish hotel features free Wi-Fi access.

Rooms at the Casa Elliot by Bondia Hotel Group feature contemporary décor and balconies or windows, while some also have large private terraces. Each room has a flat-screen TV and air conditioning.

Breakfast is served in the hotel’s buffet-style restaurant. Guests can make use of the Casa Elliot by Bondia Hotel Group’s library, lounge and tour desk.

The Casa Elliot by Bondia Hotel Group is under 200 metres from Universitat Metro Station and is a 10-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia. El Prat Airport can be reached in 30 minutes, by bus.

The Petit Palace Boqueria Garden is set in a historic 19th-century building by La Boqueria Market, 10 meters from Las Ramblas, and offers free high-speed WiFi and free bicycle use (subject to availability).

Each room at the Petit Palace Boqueria Garden includes a flat-screen TV and laptop safe, and a private bathroom. The hotel also offers an electric scooter hire service, subject to availability.

The hotel's bar is set by a private courtyard and garden with hundred-year-old trees, a listed site of architectural heritage in Barcelona.

Petit Palace Boqueria Garden is located in Barcelona's Gothic Quarter, just a 1-minute walk from Liceu Metro Station, offering convenient transport around the city. Plaça Catalunya Square is 800 meters away, and you can walk to Barcelona Port in 8 minutes.

Royal Ramblas is located on Barcelona's famous Ramblas, 100 meters from Plaza de Catalunya. It offers elegant and modern rooms with air conditioning, plasma TV, free Wi-Fi, and private parking. Some  rooms provide magnificent views of the Ramblas.

The Hotel has a meeting room with magnificent views of the Ramblas.

It offers a buffet breakfast with various regional products and homemade pastries in the La Poma restaurant with impressive views of Las Ramblas where you can also taste Mediterranean food.

The Royal Ramblas Hotel is ideally located with access to all public transport and a 5-minute walk from the elegant Passeig de Gràcia, where you will find numerous restaurants and exclusive shops. The old town is within walking distance, as well as the Mercat de la Boqueria and the MACBA. The beach is 20 minutes away.

The Royal Ramblas Barcelona's tour desk offers useful information about the city and car rental services. It also manages the airport transfer service.

La Casa Gran is a traditional bed and breakfast set 10 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gràcia and Gaudi's La Pedrera. It offers suites with free Wi-Fi.

Set in a historic building declared Heritage of Barcelona, La Casa Gran Bed & Breakfast features rooms with private bathroom, private balcony with street views and plenty of natural light. They also have a ceiling fan.

There is a communal living-dining area with tea and coffee facilities. Breakfast is served in the dining room. The owners live on site and can provide assistance for guests 24 hours a day.

You will also find numerous bars, shops and restaurants nearby. The tourist bus stops within 50 metres of the property, and there is a bus with direct connections with the airport. Diagonal and Hospital Clinic Metro stations are less than 10 minutes’ walk from the property.

Attractively situated in the Horta-Guinardó district of Barcelona, Ilunion Bel-Art is situated 1 km from Sagrada Familia, 2.7 km from La Pedrera and 1.8 km from Park Güell. Featuring a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Private parking is available on site.

The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. At Ilunion Bel-Art rooms include bed linen and towels.

The daily breakfast offers buffet, vegetarian or vegan options.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area at the 24-hour front desk.

Casa Batllo is 3.2 km from the accommodation, while Passeig de Gracia is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from Ilunion Bel-Art.

Set on Avinguda Parallel, HCC Lugano is 500 metres from Plaza España’s FIRA Exhibition Centre, and the nearby Metro and railway stations. It offers a 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi.

Each air-conditioned room at HCC Lugano has simple décor. There is a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with free toiletries.

Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast in the Lugano’s café-bar. Restaurants can be found in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter and along Las Ramblas, 20 minutes’ walk away. Drassanes Metro Station, at the bottom of Las Ramblas, is also just 2 stops from Poble Sec Metro Station.

Montjuïc Park, the MNAC Museum and Pueblo Español Village are less than 1 km from the hotel. The city’s old port is just 2 km away.

Hotels: Claris Hotel & Spa GL, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World
Full_Descriptions:
Located just off Barcelona’s prestigious Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, this luxury hotel offers city views from its rooftop pool. It also has a unique art collection.

Built in a converted 19th century palace, Claris Hotel & Spa GL combines the classicism of the original place with modern materials and it has over 400 original pieces of art on display, giving it the Specialit Monument status. It offers free entry to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum, located next door.

The smart, soundproofed bedrooms feature stylish décor and hand-made furniture. Each one comes with LCD satellite TV, sofa and pieces of Roman, Egyptian and Hindu artwork.

The hotel’s Terraza del Claris Restaurant serves gourmet Mediterranean food on the roof terrace overlooking the characteristic rooftops of the Eixample quarter. The Os-kuro Sushi & Robata Restaurant offers classic recipes from Japanese gastronomy combined with Mediterranean ingredients and local produce.

All TV in rooms feature ChromeCast offering connectivity to platforms such as Netflix, Amazon Prime, Youtube, etc.

The Claris is just 5 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera. The Ramblas is around 10 minutes’ walk away.

Featuring a rootop pool, this boutique hotel is located in Barcelona’s historic centre, close to Palau de la Música Concert Hall, the Cathedral and the Ramblas.

Ohla Barcelona features rooms with contemporary décor and large windows. They all include a flat-screen TV and free WiFi. The modern bathrooms come with bathrobes and slippers. Some rooms have views over the historic Gothic Quarter.

Romain Fornell is currently the head chef for all the culinary spaces at hotel Ohla Barcelona: Caelis restaurant, Vistro49, and La Plassohla. This last restaurant is specialised in catalan cuisine, offers tapas and small dishes. Guests can also have a cocktail in the famous Ohla rooftop bar.

The rooftop swimming pool offers fantastic city views with a chill out terrace. Other facilities at this hotel include a gym and a wellness area with a sauna.

The Ohla Barcelona is 300 metres from Plaza Catalunya Square while Urquinaona Metro Station is only 200 metres away. Passeig de Gracia Avenue and Gaudi’s modernist buildings are 10 minutes’ walk of the hotel.

Located right opposite Barcelona Cathedral, this grand, neoclassic hotel is a 5-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya. It offers free WiFi, and some rooms have excellent views of the cathedral façade.

The stylish air-conditioned rooms at the Colón Hotel Barcelona have satellite TV and a minibar. There is a safe and work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a bathrobe, slippers and hairdryer. Superior rooms also have a Nespresso coffee machine.

The hotel boasts an outdoor terrace café in the square, facing the cathedral. The hotel’s elegant restaurant serves Catalan cuisine and international dishes, and room service is available.

Guests can also enjoy the roof-top terrace with views of the cathedral

There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. Parking is available nearby for an additional charge.

Hotels: Gran Hotel La Florida G.L Monumento
Full_Descriptions:
Set on Tibidabo Hill, the 5-star Gran Hotel La Florida G.L Monumento offers views over Barcelona and the Mediterranean Sea. Guests enjoy free access to the Spa.

Rooms at La Florida feature free Wi-Fi access and 37-inch interactive plasma TVs. The bathrooms come with l’Occitane amenities, a bathtub and shower. Some also have a private balcony.

Guests can admire the views from the La Florida’s panoramic terraces and gardens. The Spa by L'Occitane includes a stainless steel swimming pool, both indoor and outdoor. A hot tub, sauna, pressure showers and a range of fitness equipment are also available.

The hotel’s restaurant serves gourmet Catalan, Spanish and Mediterranean dishes. There are also 2 bars.

Set on Barcelona’s Diagonal Avenue, the Hesperia Barcelona Presidente offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs. There is a gym and a terrace offering city views.

This hotel has views of the city.

The Hesperia Barcelona Presidente is close to a shopping area, and the main sightseeing bus stops just 50 metres from the hotel. The popular Illa shopping centre is 15 minutes’ walk away.

Diagonal Metro Station is 10 minutes’ walk away, and offers a direct link to Plaza Catalunya. Gaudi’s La Pedrera and fashionable Passeig de Gracia can be reached in about 15 minutes on foot.

Catalonia Castellnou offers free Wi-Fi, a 24-hour reception and bright, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. It is located 250 metres from Tres Torres Underground Station, in a quiet residential area.

There are many cafés, bars and restaurants within a 10-minute walk, in the centre of Sarrià.

Hotel Catalonia Castellnou is close to some of Barcelona’s most important medical centres, including Clínica IVI, Clínica Corachan and Fertilab.

The Castellnou offers easy access to the C32 Ring Road and Vallvidrera Tunnel. It is within a 15-minute train journey of central Barcelona, and less than 2 km from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium.Diagonal Avenue, with El Corte Ingles Department Store and two shopping centres, is a 10-minute walk away. Real Club de Tenis Barcelona is 15-minute walk away.

Situated 150 metres from Barcelona’s Nova Mar Bella Beach, Occidental Atenea Mar - Adults Only offers sauna and gym, and a free WiFi zone. Each air-conditioned room features international satellite TV.

The hotel features a terrace with sea views and a seasonal infinity pool with hydromassage beds and seats. You can rent Balinese beds and sun loungers. There is also a seasonal snack bar, which is open from June to September.

Occidental Atenea Mar - Adults Only offers bright, functional rooms, many with views of the city or sea. They include a minibar, a free safe and a private bathroom with amenities.

The hotel’s Canela restaurant serves à la carte Mediterranean meals, and a varied breakfast buffet is available each morning. There are also many bars and restaurants on the nearby seafront promenade.

Regular bus services to central Barcelona stop outside the Occidental Atenea Mar - Adults Only, while Poble Nou Metro Station is a 10-minute walk away. The CCIB Conference Centre and Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre are just 1 km from the hotel.

Housed in a traditional 19th-century building, this hotel is located between Plaza de Catalunya and Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter. It offers free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool surrounded by painted murals.

The Catalonia Portal de l'Angel maintains much of its original design. It features comfortable rooms with air conditioning, satellite TV and coffee and tea facilities. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served daily from 07:30 to 11:00 at Catalonia Portal de l'Angel.

The famous Las Ramblas is less than 200 metres away, while Barcelona Cathedral is 100 metres from the hotel. The Portal de l'Angel is just a 5-minute walk from Catalunya Metro and Railway Station.

Located 10 minutes away from Bogatell Beach in the 22 district, the modern Ilunion Barcelona features a rooftop swimming pool, sun terrace, and a gym. The CCIB Conference Centre is 2 km away. Free WiFi is available.

Rooms at Ilunion Barcelona feature air conditioning, a desk and a TV. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. A safe and minibar are provided. Superior rooms also feature a furnished terrace with sea or city views.

This hotel is officially adapted for disabled guests. It has rooms adapted for people with reduced mobility or hearing/visual impairment, available upon request.

Ilunion Barcelona's restaurant serves breakfast and also offers an à la carte menu. The hotel has a bar and provides room service. A menu for guests with specific dietary requirements is also available.

Just a few minutes walk from the hotel is Rambla de Poblenou and Bogatell Beach, which are home to a wide variety of shops, bars and restaurants. The shopping centre is a 4-minute drive away and the Diagonal Mar shopping centre is an 8-minute drive away.

Ilunion Barcelona has pleasant, renovated common areas and free internet access. Private underground parking is available for an extra cost.

Llacuna and Poble Nou Metro Station is located less than 300 metres from the hotel. The bus stop of the line number 6 is located 50 metres from the hotel.

Gran Via is 15 minutes away by bus. There is a tourist bus stop near the hotel. Barcelona-El Prat airport is located 20 km away, with quick access to the Ronda Litoral.

Hotels: AC Hotel Victoria Suites by Marriott
Full_Descriptions:
Beautiful and stylish suites located in the heart of Pedralbes, one of the top residential areas of Barcelona and close to one of the city's main business districts.

AC Hotel Victoria Suites is ideal for business travellers due its location, for weekend breaks due its tranquil environment and excellent gastronomy offer as well for families due the spaciousness of the rooms.

It features a large terrace-bar, a high quality restaurant, friendly staff and many other details.

Hotel Millenni is a boutique hotel set 50 metres from Paral.lel Metro Station. It features a small roof terrace with a hot tub and impressive city views. All rooms are stylish and offer free Wi-Fi.

Accommodation at the Millenni is brightly decorated. The climate-controlled rooms feature satellite TV and a fully equipped bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served daily and there are several traditional bars and restaurants in the surrounding Raval district.

Guests can have access to the gym, the hot tub and the sauna. There are 2 computers which have internet access, as well as a small library with daily newspapers. There is also a lounge area where guests can watch the TV.

The famous Las Ramblas are just 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel. The funicular train to Montjuïc Castle leaves from the nearby Metro station.

Set in l’Eixample, Mercedes Heritage Apartments offers self-catering apartments in the centre of Barcelona, 2 km from Plaça de Catalunya. The Metro Stop Hospital Clinic is a 2-minute walk away.

Offering free Wi-Fi and a private bathroom with a bath or shower, apartments are spacious and modernly furnished. A fully equipped kitchenette with dishwasher and microwave is available, while superior apartments feature air conditioning.

La Rambla is a 25-minute bus ride from Mercedes Heritage Apartments, while Sagrada Familia is 4 Metro stops away.

Hotel Catalonia Plaza Cataluña offers an outdoor pool and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV. It is housed in a building 50 metres from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya. All hotel rooms have smart TVs equipped with Chromecast app.

The hotel serves a continental buffet breakfast with show cooking and it includes a wide variety of regional products and home-made cakes.

Catalonia Plaza Cataluña Hotel has a sun terrace with loungers, a gym and a pool. Guests can also enjoy the on-site spa and cabin for spa treatments and massages.

Hotel Catalonia Plaza is a 5-minute walk from Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter and the Palau de la Música Catalana. A regular bus service to the airport leaves from the other side of Plaza Catalunya, just 100 metres away.

Offering a central location, Barcelona Century Hotel is located in the Eixample district, just a short walk from the Ramblas and Passeig de Gracia. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout.

All air-conditioned rooms at this hotel are soundproofed and come with satellite TV, safe, minibar and a private bathroom with hairdryer.

The hotel offers buffet breakfast as well as a bar. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can provide tourist information about the area.

Barcelona’s main shopping district can be reach within walking distance of the hotel. You can visit Barcelona’s Cathedral or the Gothic Quarter.

Urgell, Hospital Clínic or Universitat Metro Stations are less than 7 minutes’ walk of Barcelona Century Hotel.

Featuring an impressive lobby, the stylish Hilton Barcelona offers free WiFi, access to its 24-hour gym and rooms with city views and plasma TV. The hotel is a 15-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium.

Each stylish, soundproofed room at the Barcelona Hilton features air conditioning, iPod docking stations and tea and coffee-making facilities.

Hotel Hilton Barcelona is just 100 metres from L’Illa Shopping Centre and 300 metres from María Cristina Metro Station. Plaça Catalunya and the historic city centre are 15 minutes away by Metro. You can drive to Sants Station in 5 minutes, and El Prat Airport is a 15-minute drive away.

Hilton Barcelona’s Mosaic restaurant offers Catalan and Mediterranean cuisine prepared using seasonal, local products. The Vibe Bar & Restaurant serves tapas and cocktails. Guests can enjoy live sport on the bar’s large TV.

Located 5 minutes’ walk from Les Corts Metro Station, this hotel offers modern accommodation in Barcelona. It has good access to the city's main attractions, such as the Nou Camp Football Stadium.

The air-conditioned rooms at the NH Barcelona Les Corts feature contemporary décor, free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a private balcony or terrace. The private bathroom has a hairdryer and toiletries.

The hotel operates a tour desk and a 24-hour reception. Helpful staff can organise bicycle and car rental, as well as provide information on Barcelona.

NH Les Corts is less than 10 minutes’ walk from Sants Train Station, providing access to Barcelona Airport. L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre is just 300 metres away. Barcelona Airport is 15 km from the property.

Located just opposite Arc de Triomf, BruStarr Gotic offers rooms in central Barcelona. It is a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and the Rambla.

The rooms offer a large flat-screen TV, a safe and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Some rooms have a balcony.

You can find a wide range of dining options, bars and shops in the area around BruStar Gotic-Centric.

Arc de Triomf Metro Station is 100 metres away and there are several bus stops nearby.

Set in Barcelona centre, Diagonal House Hostel features free WiFi and air conditioning. This hostel is just 300 metres from Passeig de Gracia and Gaudi's La Pedrera.

Fitted with parquet flooring, the property offers a shared lounge and games room. Guests can make use of the shared kitchen as well.

The shared bathrooms have a shower. Bed linen and towels are provided.

The area offers an array of shops, bars, restaurants and clubs. Diagonal Metro Station is a 3-minute walk from the bed and breakfast. Plaza Catalunya Square is 10 minutes' away by metro.

These Modernist apartments enjoy a very central location on Barcelona’s famous Ramblas, within 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Reial. They have full kitchens and free high-speed WiFi.

Ramblas Apartments all have air conditioning and a lounge and either 1 or 2 bedrooms. They have a bathroom and a kitchen with a hob, fridge and microwave.

The apartments are close to the Gothic Quarter, where you will find plenty of restaurants and tapas bars. You are also within a short walk of many of Barcelona’s main shopping areas, as well as the port. The nearest Metro station is Drassanes, about 5 minutes away.

Suite Place Barcelona Diputació has air-conditioned guest accommodation in Barcelona, 2.8 km from Nova Icaria Beach, 2.9 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2.9 km from Barceloneta Beach. Among the facilities at this property are luggage storage space and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The apartment features family rooms.

Each unit comes with a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

A baby safety gate is also available for guests at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Suite Place Barcelona Diputació include Casa Batllo, La Pedrera and Sagrada Familia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

Featuring free WiFi and air conditioning, 430 BCN Apartments is situated in Barcelona. Sagrada Familia is 600 metres away.

The accommodation has a flat-screen TV. There is also a kitchen, fitted with a microwave and toaster. A fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a kettle. There is a private bathroom with a bidet in each unit. Towels and bed linen are available.

Casa Batllo is 1.1 km from 430 BCN Apartments, while La Pedrera is 1.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the property.

Luggage storage is available and there is a car park nearby which offers special prices to guests.

The modern Hotel Aranea is a 5-minute walk from Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia. It offers free Wi-Fi, and a roof terrace with sun loungers and Barcelona city centre views.

Monumental Metro Station and Bullring are just 400 metres from Hotel Aranea. You can reach Plaça Catalunya and La Rambla in 10 minutes by bus or Metro.

Modern, air-conditioned rooms feature parquet floors and satellite TV. Windows are double-glazed, and there is a safe and minibar. The bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities, as well as a bath or shower.

The Aranea restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and Mediterranean buffet lunch. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona.

Pol & Grace Hotel is located just 100 metres from Barcelona’s Plaça Molina and Sant Gervasi Train Stations. It offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access.

This modern hotel features a library and an area displaying works by local artists, as well as a free work area. A free coffee and tea service is offered from mid-morning onwards.

Each soundproofed room at Pol & Grace Hotel has functional, modern décor and includes a small fridge, a free safe and a welcome gift. The fully equipped bathrooms come with toiletries.

A varied buffet breakfast is served every morning. Room service is also available. The hotel has a 24-hour reception with car rental service and a tour desk. Private parking is available on site.

Fontana Metro Station is 600 metres away, and offers direct access to Plaza Catalunya, Las Ramblas and Parc Güell. The popular Gràcia district is within a 2-minute walk of the property and has a range of shops, restaurants and lively bars.

Zenit Barcelona is 250 metres from Plaza Francesc Macià on Barcelona’s Diagonal Avenue. This modern hotel offers stylish air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms, with free Wi-Fi and a pillow menu.

The Zenit is a 15-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, where Gaudí’s famous La Pedrera and Casa Batlló can be found. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are a further 15 minutes’ walk away.

Rooms at the Zenit Barcelona feature satellite TV and a safe and minibar. There is a work desk and a kettle with free tea and coffee set; the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

Zenit Hotel’s restaurant offers gourmet Spanish and international cuisine. A special gluten-free breakfast and children's menus are available, and packed lunches and room service can be requested.

There is a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. A laundry, dry cleaning and ironing service is offered. Parking is available 10 minutes' walk away, for an extra cost.

Hotels: Grand Hotel Central, Small Luxury Hotels
Full_Descriptions:
Grand Central Hotel Barcelona is a design hotel offering fantastic views of the Gothic Quarter and Barcelona Cathedral from its rooftop infinity pool. It has stylish rooms and free high-speed WiFi.

The elegantly refurbished hotel is housed in an early 20th-century building and it is a clear example of the Catalan Noucentisme.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Grand Hotel Barcelona have a modern design. They are equipped with a 4K high-definition TV´s with Chromecast . Each one has a bathroom with a large, rain-effect shower and luxury toiletries.

The restaurant offers an authentic Spanish-style dining experience with small "platillos" to be shared, as well as a selection of over 150 local and national wines. An excellent culinary proposal that will make you feel like a local. La Terraza del Central, in the rooftop, is the perfect place to enjoy a dinner, a cocktail or both overlooking the city lights of Barcelona.

The hotel has a fitness centre and massage services are also offered. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona, and you can also hire a car or a bicycle.

The Born district, full of stylish shops and restaurants, is just 3 minutes’ walk from the Grand Central Hotel.

Hotel Cram Hotel is set in Barcelona’s central Eixample district, a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya. It features a rooftop pool with city views and the Two Michelin Stars Angle Barcelona restaurant. All rooms have free WiFi and large flat-screen TVs.

The Cram Hotel Hotel is located in a building that dates back to 1892 and features a modernist façade, and a modern, elegant interior. Rooms boast advanced lighting and access control technology.

The air-conditioned rooms at Cram Hotel Hotel feature a private bathroom with a hairdryer. A bathrobe and slippers are available upon request. Rooms feature beds by Treca de Paris, and elegant curtains by Gastón y Daniela. Some rooms have a private balcony.

The Two Michelin Stars Restaurante Angle Barcelona offers modern dishes using fresh produce. Hotel Cram Hotel Barcelona also has a cocktail bar and poolside bar, and room service is available.

The hotel has a tour desk and 24-hour front desk. You can hire a bicycle or car.

Set on Paral-lel Avenue, this modern design hotel is just a 5-minute walk from the famous Las Ramblas and Barcelona Port. Its stylish, air-conditioned rooms feature free WiFi and a satellite TV.

Hotel Serhs del Port´s modern rooms offer a safe. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

Montjuïc Hill is within a 10-minute walk of Hotel Serhs del Port. A funicular train connects Montjuïc with Paral-lel Metro Station, located 500 metres from the hotel.

Direct Metro services also connect Paral-lel to Plaça Catalunya Square, Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard and Gaudí’s famous Parc Guëll. Hotel Serhs del Port´s tour desk can provide information about the city.

Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Las Ramblas is situated in the centre of Barcelona’s Old Town, just 200 metres from Las Ramblas. It features a rooftop terrace with a seasonal swimming pool.

The hotel offers simple, attractive décor and rooms are spacious. Each has air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, as well as tea and coffee making facilities.

The Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Las Ramblas serves a daily, buffet breakfast. There are several bars, cafés and restaurants within walking distance of the property.

Guests can make use of computers with internet access, available in the hotel reception area. Staff at the tour desk can provide information on Barcelona’s tourist attractions and arrange car rental.

The hotel is 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Cathedral and the city’s Gothic Quarter. The Old Port is around 700 metres from the hotel, whilst Liceu Metro is a 10-minute walk away.

The modern Hotel Grums is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes' walk from Barcelona’s port, ferry terminal and cruise terminal. The Ramblas are 600 metres away, and Parallel Metro Station 300 metres away.

Hotel Grums Barcelona offers elegant, bright and spacious rooms with themed design décor and panoramic floor-to-ceiling windows. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout.

All our rooms have free RITUALS Cosmetics amenities.

The Hotel Grums Barcelona features a wellness spa which is not included in the room rate and can be accessed for a small surcharge. Guests can relax in the hot tub, Finnish sauna or steam bath. A selection of massage and treatments are also available at an extra cost.

Offering free Wi-Fi, MH Apartments Gracia offers  bright, soundproofed apartments located in Barcelona’s Gracia District, 10 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gracia.

Featuring wooden floors, each soundproofed apartment has a living room with a sofa and satellite flat-screen TV. A dishwasher, oven and washing machine are included in the kitchen. Some apartments come with 2 bathrooms.

Private parking and an airport shuttle service are available at an extra cost and there is luggage storage.

A large variety of bars and restaurants can be found in the area, There is a 24-hour supermarket 500 meters from the apartments.

Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia and La Pedrera can be visited within a 20-minute walk. Fontana Metro Station, with connection to Plaça Catalunya and Barcelona’s historic centre, is 400 metres away.

Hotel Atlantis can be found less than 100 metres from Plaza Catalunya and Universitat Metro Station in Barcelona. It offers attractive rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

The hotel features lounge areas with sofas where guests can relax. Car rental can be arranged at the 24-hour reception.

A hot and cold breakfast buffet is served in the hotel dining room.

The air-conditioned rooms at Atlantis include a spacious marble bathroom complete with a hairdryer. There is also a laptop safe.

The Gothic Quarter is less than 10 minutes’ walk from Atlantis Hotel. The Picasso Museum and El Born district are also within a short walk.

Located next to Plaza Catalunya Station, You Stylish City Center Apartments offers modern apartments with air conditioning and free WiFi. These luxury apartments are, and just a 1-minute walk from Las Ramblas.

Each apartment is spacious and bright, with heating and elegant contemporary décor. The modern kitchens include a ceramic hob, dishwasher and kitchenware.

Guests have access to a 24-hour concierge service.

There are numerous restaurants and shops within a 2-minute walk, including El Corte Inglés supermarket. The You Stylish tour desk provides visitor information, and there is a Tourist Office just 150 metres away. There is a swimming pool and gym nearby available for guests at an extra cost.

Direct buses to Barcelona Airport stop only 50 metres from the apartments. Plaza Catalunya Station offers direct Metro links to all areas of Barcelona, as well as trains to the Pyrenees and the Costa Brava.

This elegant hotel is 250 metres from Paseo de Gracia Metro Station and Boulevard. Plaza Catalunya is a 5-minute walk away. It offers free Wi-Fi.

Set in an attractive building, dating from 1888, rooms at the Acta Atrium Palace are modern and chic, with air conditioning and satellite TV. The private bathrooms offer free toiletries and a bathrobe.

The hotel has 24-hour room service.

Gaudí's famous Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are 10 minutes' walk away. There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car at the hotel tour desk. Public parking is available nearby.

Featuring a rooftop terrace with a seasonal swimming pool and city views, Well and Come Hotel is located right beside Verdaguer Metro Station and 10 minutes’ walk from Sagrada Familia.

This boutique hotel offers soundproofed rooms with free WiFi, a flat-screen TV and laptop safe. There is also a Nespresso coffee machine, kettle and minibar with free water in all rooms.

Rooms have individually controlled air conditioning and heating. They also come with a private bathroom which includes a rain shower, free toiletries, hairdryer and vanity mirror.

Some rooms come with a balcony, terrace or city views.

Hotel Well and Come features a 24-hour reception, a lounge area with a fireplace, an on-site bar and a fitness area.

The famous Passeig de Gracia Boulevard is 5 minutes’ walk from Well and Come hotel. Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló houses can be reached within a 15-minute walk.

Located just off Las Ramblas and La Boqueria Market, Rambla 102 offers soundproofed accommodation with free Wi-Fi. Central Plaza Catalunya, and Barcelona Cathedral are both 500 metres away.

Modern and bright apartments and lofts with air conditioning and balcony, some with views of the Ramblas. They have a living-dining area with a sofa bed and a flat-screen satellite TV; and come with an open-plan kitchen equipped with a dishwasher, ceramic hobs and kitchenware. There is a washing machine, a dryer, and bed linen and towels are provided.

There are plenty of bars and tapas restaurants within a 2-minute walk of Rambla 102.

Centrally located, you can walk to the main Barcelona tourist attractions within 15 minutes. A 20-minute metro ride will take you to Sagrada Familia.

Less than 1 km from Sagrada Familia, BcnStop Sagrada Familia is a sustainable property set in Barcelona and offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and private parking. There is a private entrance at the aparthotel for the convenience of those who stay. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a coffee machine. At the aparthotel, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available close by. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the aparthotel.

La Pedrera is 2.8 km from BcnStop Sagrada Familia, while Casa Batllo is 3.3 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 16 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Located just off Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia, Gallery Hotel offers a free sauna and gym, and a seasonal rooftop terrace with a pool and city views. Rooms include free Wi-Fi and free water on arrival.

This elegant hotel offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV. The modern bathrooms include amenities, a hairdryer and a bathrobe.

The Gallery’s restaurant has an attractive garden terrace where you can enjoy Mediterranean cuisine. The hotel also has a bar and a café.

Gallery Hotel is situated next to the gardens of Palau Robert, a gallery and tourist information centre. Gaudí’s La Pedrera is a 3-minute walk away, while nearby Diagonal Metro Station provides direct access to the Sagrada Familia. Regular airport trains stop 600 metres away at Passeig de Gracia Station.

Featuring a rooftop terrace with jacuzzi, a fully equipped kitchen and computers with internet access, Urbany Hostel BCN GO! is set in the heart of Barcelona, just 200 metres from Plaza Universitat Square.

Both shared dorms and private rooms are available, all with air conditioning, free Wi-Fi and bed linen. Each bed has a locker, a reading light, bedside table, a USB charger and 2 plugs. Laundry facilities and towels are available for an extra cost.

Urbany Bar serves drinks and food and there are also vending machines for snacks. A wide range of dining options and bars can be found in the surrounding area.

Staff can help with tourist information and also organize activities in the hostel and around Barcelona city. Luggage storage is available at the hostel.

Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, which is a 10-minute walk from Urbany Hostel.

Situated in Barcelona, 1.4 km from Llevant, The Social Hub Barcelona Poblenou features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities at this property are a shared lounge and a business centre, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel has a terrace and city views, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar.

All rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, the rooms at The Social Hub Barcelona Poblenou have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms are fitted with a seating area. At the accommodation rooms have bed linen and towels.

Speaking Catalan, Czech, English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are ready to help around the clock.

Nova Mar Bella Beach is 1.6 km from The Social Hub Barcelona Poblenou, while Mar Bella Beach is 1.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 17 km from the hotel.

Acta BCN 40 Hotel is centrally located 350 metres from Barcelona’s Plaza Universitat, and a 5-minute walk from the Ramblas. It offers modern rooms with flat-screen satellite TVs.

Rooms at the Acta are air-conditioned in summer and heated in winter, and have a free safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities, and you can request an iron at reception.

Guests can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast in the hotel’s stylish breakfast room. A gluten-free breakfast is available upon request. There are many bars, shops and restaurants within a short walk of the hotel.

The Acta BCN 40 has a 24-hour front desk and offers luggage storage. Parking is available nearby for an extra charge.

Hotels: Arcelon Hotel! New Opening! Nueva apertura 2023!
Full_Descriptions:
Set in Barcelona, 2.8 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach, Arcelon Hotel! New Opening! Nueva apertura 2023! offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers a concierge service, a tour desk and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.9 km from Mar Bella Beach.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Arcelon Hotel! New Opening! Nueva apertura 2023! all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Staff at the 24-hour front desk speak Catalan, German, English and Spanish.

Llevant is 3 km from the accommodation, while Sagrada Familia is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from Arcelon Hotel! New Opening! Nueva apertura 2023!.

Featuring an outdoor swimming pool and hot tub on its terrace, Sunotel Club Central is set in Barcelona’s elegant Eixample neighbourhood.

Each modern air-conditioned room has free, high-speed WiFi, a TV and a minibar. The private bathroom includes a bath, shower and hairdryer.

Sunotel Club Central features a cosy bar, serving snacks and drinks. There is also room service available. The hotel has a 24-hour reception, and free bicycles are available upon request and subject to availability.

Passeig de Gracia, with its Gaudi monuments and designer shops, is a 10-minute walk from Sunotel Club Central. The famous Las Ramblas Boulevard and Plaza Catalunya are a 15-minute walk from the hotel. Barcelona Airport is 15 km away, and you can catch an airport bus in Plaza Catalunya.

Hotels: Authentic flat2 in Poble sec - Paralelo
Full_Descriptions:
Authentic flat2 in Poble sec - Paralelo offers accommodation in Barcelona, 900 metres from Montjuïc and 1.1 km from Plaza Reial. The air-conditioned unit is 1.5 km from La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona.

The air-conditioned apartment features a kitchen equipped with a microwave. A TV is provided.

Plaça Catalunya is 1.6 km from Authentic flat2 in Poble sec - Paralelo, while Portal de l'Angel is 1.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from the property.

Situated 10 minutes' walk from the Arc de Triomf Metro and Train Station, the Ilunion Auditori features a rooftop swimming pool 3 m wide by 5 m long and gym. Free WiFi is available throughout.

All modern rooms at the Auditori have wooden floors, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a safe. The private bathrooms include a hairdryer and free toiletries.

This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility, accessible rooms are available on request, also for people with auditory and visual impairment.

The Ilunion Auditori serves a daily breakfast and offers à- la-carte dishes made with seasonal products. There is also a special menu for celiac and food intolerant guests. Room service is available during limited hours, and a snack bar is open during the evening. A range of restaurants and bars can be found in the nearby areas of the Eixample, Born and Gothic Quarter.

Guests can enjoy a work out at the gym, which is equipped with cardiovascular equipment. The seasonal rooftop pool, which is surrounded by sun loungers, offers the ideal place for relaxation with stunning views over the city.

Free internet access is available at the computers in the reception area. The famous Barcelona Auditorium is a 5-minute walk away, while the the Sagrada Familia and the Ciutadella Park are 1.5 km away. Underground private parking is available on site for an additional charge.

This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

This stylish hotel has an excellent central location, 50 metres from Barcelona’s Las Ramblas and just 100 metres from Plaza Catalunya. It offers a rooftop pool, sauna and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms at the Silken Ramblas are stylish, and are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV and a minibar. There is central heating and air conditioning according to the season. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer.

The Silken has a restaurant and bar. Room service is available. There is a also a pleasant terrace.

The Silken has a tour desk and the sightseeing bus stops nearby in Plaza Catalunya.

The Acta Antibes is set in Barcelona’s Eixample District, 10 minutes’ walk from the Sagrada Familia. This hotel features a 24-hour reception, buffet breakfast and free Wi-Fi.

Each of the Acta Antibes’s rooms has simple, stylish décor and wooden flooring. All air-conditioned rooms have a TV and a desk.

Whilst visiting the city’s tourist attractions, guests at the Antibes can make use of its luggage storage. A gluten-free breakfast is available upon request.

The hotel is ideally located for visiting sights such as Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera, which are around 20 minutes’ walk away.

Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are just over one kilometre away. The nearest Metro station, Monumental, is just 200 metres from the hotel.

Housed in an attractive 19th-century building, Grupotel Gravina is located just off Plaza Catalunya, Barcelona’s main square, 5 minutes' walk from Las Ramblas. It offers 24-hour reception and modern rooms with free WiFi and satellite TV.

The Hotel Gravina is just 5 minutes’ walk from the MACBA Modern Art Gallery and 15 minutes from Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló. Catalunya Metro Station, located 100 metres from the hotel, connects you with the rest of the city.

The air-conditioned rooms at Grupotel Gravina feature modern furniture and some have parquet floors. They are equipped with a work desk and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

The hotel has a smart bar where you can get a snack or a drink. There are numerous restaurants in the surrounding streets.

Hotels: Hotel Midmost by Majestic Hotel Group
Full_Descriptions:
Located in the heart of Barcelona, Hotel Midmost by Majestic Hotel Group is a few steps from the famous Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter. This stylish hotel features a roof terrace with a pool (not climatized) and views over the city.

The Hotel Midmost by Majestic Hotel Group has elegant interiors with all modern comforts. Relax in a sunny en suite bedroom, decorated in soothing soft colours and with air conditioning, free WiFi, satellite TV and a Nespresso coffee machine.

Treat yourself to a delicious meal in the hotel’s restaurant, or step outside to sample the huge range of regional and international foods in one of Barcelona’s many restaurants.

Take a stroll up the impressive Passeig de Gracia to visit the famous Modernista creations of Gaudi, or visit the colourful Ramblas and the mouthwatering food stalls of the Boqueria market.

Set in Barcelona’s vibrant Raval district, this design hotel offers free Wi-Fi, a gym and a roof terrace with pool and panoramic views. Some rooms include a Nespresso coffee machine.

Each bright, air-conditioned room at the Barceló Raval features a large plasma-screen TV with more than 70 channels. Rooms have a minibar and a modern bathroom.

Hotel Barceló Raval’s B-Lounge serves creative Mediterranean food, tapas and cocktails in stylish surroundings. You can also enjoy a drink on the outdoor terrace.

The Raval Barceló is only a 5-minute walk from the MACBA Modern Art Gallery. Liceu Metro Station, Las Ramblas and the famous Boqueria Market are all just 400 metres away.

Located beside Barcelona’s Montjuic Hill, Nuevo Triunfo is a 3-minute walk from Parallel Metro Station and 10 minutes from the Rambla. It offers a free Wi-Fi zone and 24-hour reception.

Featuring tiled floors and flat-screen satellite TV, air-conditioned rooms come with a seating area and work desk. The private bathroom is equipped with amenities.

A continental breakfast is available in the Hotel Nuevo Triunfo. There are vending machines for drinks.

Luggage storage is offered and you can hire a car from the tour desk.

Maremagnum Shopping Centre and the Marina are 15 minutes’ walk away. Barceloneta Beach is 10 minutes away by bus.

This central guest house is on Barcelona’s Las Ramblas, beside Liceu Metro Station, and 50 metres from La Boqueria Market. It offers air-conditioned rooms, with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs.

Public parking is available near the Hostal Las Flores Ramblas, but the great location means the city’s main tourist sites can be visited on foot.

Barcelona Cathedral is a 5-minute walk away, and Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia can be reached in 10 minutes by Metro or bus.

Las Flores has a 24-hour front desk, allowing you to make the most of central Barcelona’s lively night life. There is also a tour desk, and luggage storage is possible.

Situated 400 metres from Las Ramblas, Casa Lit Barcelona by Ona offers a rooftop terrace with city and sea views. The rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

The hotel has a courtyard, where you can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Each open-plan room has air conditioning.

Casa Lit Barcelona by Ona have a 24-hour reception, where staff can arrange restaurant bookings, tickets for shows or guided tours of Barcelona. Free city maps are also available.

The hotel is located at the bottom of the lively Raval district, just 700 metres from Barcelona Port. Drassanes and Paral•lel Metro Stations are both within 300 metres.

Barcelona Center is 400 metres from Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia Avenue, and a 15-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya. Guests have free access to the small gym and rooftop hydromassage tub.

The modern rooms at the Barcelona Center Hotel have satellite TV and free WiFi. There is a minibar and safe, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

The Center Hotel has a traditional Spanish restaurant. There is also a bar and a terrace.

There is a 24-hour front desk. Parking is available nearby for an additional charge.

Situated 200 metres from Barcelona’s Magic Fountain, the elegant InterContinental Barcelona, an IHG Hotel offers spacious rooms with a flat-screen TV and hydromassage shower.

Offering fantastic views over Barcelona, the hotel’s 173 Rooftop Terrace features an outdoor pool, sun loungers, and a dining area where guests can enjoy Mediterranean cuisine and a selection of drinks and cocktails.

Arrel Restaurant pays homage to the land and the produce it provides throughout all seasons of the year. The restaurant features an open kitchen serving small portions to share, buffet breakfasts and lunch and dinner service.

Quirat Restaurant is an exclusive space that will offer an interpretation of the land and its products through a menu of dishes that responds to the different seasons, designed exclusively for the restaurant by a Chef with 1 Michelin Star. Enjoy an unforgettable dinner in the most exclusive of our restaurants.

Gebre Cocktails and More and, in addition to the cocktail classics, it will offer a menu of artisan signature cocktails that will try to convey a very specific sensory experience connected to the world of the land that surrounds us.

There is free WiFi available in public areas and in rooms and the lobby area at InterContinental Barcelona, an IHG Hotel features a free internet point.

The spa has a water circuit, a dry sauna, a hammam, hot tub, gym, and 6 treatment cabins.

From the hotel, Barcelona’s historic centre can be easily reached by bus or metro. Poble Sec and Espanya Metro Stations are both 500 metres away. Poble Espanyol and the Joan Miró Foundation are 200 metres away.

Hotel Vilamarí is set 250 metres from Plaza de Espanya Metro Station and the Fira de Barcelona Exhibition Centre. This hotel features a terrace and a small gym with Turkish Bath.

The Vilamarí’s rooms have simple, elegant décor and dark wood furniture. Each room includes flat-screen satellite TV. The stylish bathrooms come with amenities and a hairdryer. The hotel features centrally controlled air conditioned or heating depending on the season.

Barcelona’s MNAC Art Museum and the Magic Fountains are within a 10-minute walk of the hotel. Las Arenas Shopping Centre is just 200 metres away. Barcelona Port is a 15-minute metro ride away and Barcelona Beach can be reached in 35 minutes.

These elegant, fully-equipped apartments are located in a new building just 4 minutes’ walk from Fontana metro station. They have a roof terrace with views over the Gracia neighbourhood and free Wi-fi.

Bonavista’s air-conditioned apartments have floor-to-ceiling windows and a modern décor with stone flooring and a neutral colour scheme. The kitchen features a vitroceramic hob, oven, dishwasher and toaster. The bathroom has a shower and includes a heated towel rail and hairdryer. Towels and bed linen are provided.

There are 2 food markets within less than 10 minutes’ walk of Bonavista Apartments. Visitors will also find many shops, bars, cafés and restaurants in Gracia.

Gaudí’s famous creations, such as Parc Güell, Sagrada Família, and La Pedrera are all within less than 20 minutes’ walk of the apartments. The number 39 bus to Barceloneta beach stops on Gran de Gracia, about 5 minutes’ walk away. Private parking is available upon request and at an additional cost.

Sunny flat, near ramblas, wifi incl. Has a balcony and is situated in Barcelona, within just 1.5 km of Plaça Catalunya and 1.7 km of Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. This property is located a short distance from attractions such as Portal de l'Angel, Cathedral of Barcelona, and Plaça Reial. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is 1.6 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. A TV as well as a computer are available to keep guests entertained throughout their stay. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Magic Fountain of Montjuic and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 12 km from Sunny flat, near ramblas, wifi incl., and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Hotel Brummell is a 20-room boutique hotel located a few steps from the Miró Foundation and The Grec theatre. Guests will benefit from free and unlimited yoga classes. A running club, for both guests and locals, is organized regularly.

The hotel features an outdoor pool, a garden and a sauna. T-training and boxing session are hosted at the well-being center The Loft.

All rooms boast modern furniture and artwork by young European designers. Each one is equipped with a safe, coffee and tea facilities and a yoga mat. The private bathroom has a rain shower, a high-powered hairdryer and free toiletries by MMLL. Suites have a private, furnished terrace with an outdoor bath.

Brummell Kitchen offers a seated buffet breakfast with homemade granola, local products and fresh orange juice. Guest will also have 24h/7 access to the our self service Honesty Bar, with a selection of drinks, tasty snacks and other delights.

You will also enjoy our on site restaurant Palo Cortao restaurant. A revisited taverna with twisted classic flavor and dishesm and a great wine menu.

Hotel Brummell is just a 15-minute walk from La Rambla and the closest metro station is Parallel Metro Station, 250 m away.

For guests who wish to explore the sights of Barcelona, Montjuïc is known for its parks and gardens and is within 10 minutes' walk. There is free WiFi available throughout.

Please note that the swimming pool will be closed for maintenance from the 1 till the 23 of December.

Set within 1.2 km of Santa Maria del Mar and 1.1 km of Picasso Museum, Àmfores Boutique Guest House provides rooms in Barcelona. Located around 850 m from Tivoli Theatre, the guest house with free WiFi is also 750 m away from La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is situated in the Ciutat Vella district.

All guest rooms in the guest house are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Each room comes with a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries.

Àmfores Boutique Guest House is set in a building of medieval origin, located next to the Palau de la Música and the city centre.

The accommodation offers a terrace.

Speaking Catalan and English, staff are ready to help at the reception.

Plaça Catalunya is 800 m from Àmfores Boutique Guest House. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 18 km from the guest house.

The accommodation offers a terrace with a small swimming pool (from may till october).

Hotels: RECENTLY RENOVATED 2 BEDROOM APARTMENT IN EIXAMPLE
Full_Descriptions:
Located in Barcelona, 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 1.1 km from Casa Batllo, RECENTLY RENOVATED 2 BEDROOM APARTMENT IN EIXAMPLE offers air conditioning. The property is set 1.6 km from Tivoli Theatre, 1.5 km from La Pedrera and 1.7 km from Portal de l'Angel. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is 1.4 km away.

The apartment features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.
