Popular points of interest near the apartment include Plaça Catalunya, Boqueria Market and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from RECENTLY RENOVATED 2 BEDROOM APARTMENT IN EIXAMPLE.

Hotels: Axel Hotel Barcelona & Urban Spa- Adults Only
Full_Descriptions:
The area around the Hotel Axel Barcelona is known as the Gay-xample because of its lively gay scene. The staff has knowledge of the local gay scene, and the hotel is hetero-friendly too.

Offering free Wi-Fi throughout, this design hotel is close to Passeig de Gràcia's exclusive boutiques. The Axel Hotel’s 500m² Spa Centre includes a hydromassage pool and saunas, and the modern rooms have flat-screen satellite TVs.

The Axel’s Sky Bar features a large swimming pool, a terrace with a hot tub and a cocktail bar. Here you will find parties, art exhibitions and shows.

The Axel Hotel Barcelona & Urban Spa offers easy access to the Ramblas, the Picasso Museum and Gothic Quarter. The hotel occupies an attractive 19th-century building.

Situated on the seafront in Diagonal Mar, the Hesperia Barcelona del Mar (formerly Hesperia del Mar) features stylish rooms with free WiFi and satellite TV. It is a 5-minute walk from the CCIB and Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre.

Air-conditioned rooms at Hesperia Barcelona del Mar come with flat-screen TV, safe, and a minibar. The private bathroom comes with a bath, hairdryer and free toiletries.

The Ramblas and Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter are only 5 km from the hotel. Poble Nou Metro Station is a 10-minute walk from the hotel.

Barcelona Universal offers free Wi-Fi, a gym and a rooftop pool with city ciews. Situated next to next to Parallel Metro Station, the hotel is just 600 metres from Las Ramblas.

The spacious, functional rooms at the Barcelona Universal Hotel feature wooden floors and air conditioning. Bathrooms include toiletries and heated towel rails.

The Barcelona Universal’s Medea serves a hot and cold buffet breakfast, including plenty of healthy options.

The hotel is situated a 20-minute walk from the Magic Fountain and MNAC Art Museum, in Montjuïc. Plaça Catalunya is just 3 Metro stops away, and the lively bars of the Raval district are just 500 metres away.

Located on the fashionable Paseo de Gracia, within 5 minutes’ walk from both Gaudi’s masterpieces Casa Battló and La Pedrera, Monument Hotel offers luxury services including a gourmet restaurant and a spa.

Elegantly decorated, all soundproofed rooms have a flat-screen TV with pay-per-view channels, Bluetooth sound system, and a safe deposit box with plug for charging laptop devices. Most of the room types have a private bathroom with a free-standing bath, velour bathrobe and luxury toiletries. Most of the rooms have a balcony with city views.

The 3 Michelin-starred restaurant, Lasarte, offers a range of options designed by the chef Martin Berasategui; while the on-site bistro-style restaurant, Oria, serves fresh cuisine following the Mediterranean gastronomy.

Monument Hotel is a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas; regular trains to Barcelona El Prat Airport leave from Paseo de Gracia Train Station, located 300 metres away. Free high-speed WiFi is provided.

The hotel is housed on Enric Batllo’s house, an architectural jewel of 19th century that constitutes one of the characteristic works of the Eixample Quadrat d'Or and which gives it the Specialty Monument status.

Situated in Barcelona in the Catalonia Region, 400 metres from Portal de l'Angel, Yurbban Passage Hotel boasts an outdoor pool and spa centre. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant.

All rooms include a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms feature a seating area to relax in after a busy day. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. Each room includes a private bathroom. Extras include bathrobes and slippers. Yurbban Passage Hotel features free WiFi throughout the property.

Guests can enjoy an authentic Catalan breakfast each morning.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

The hotel also offers bike hire. Plaça Catalunya is 500 metres from Yurbban Passage Hotel, while La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 500 metres from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Featuring an outdoor pool and a fitness centre, Catalonia Square is located in Barcelona’s historic centre. The 4-star hotel is only 100 metres from Plaça Catalunya and offers free Wi-Fi

Each air-conditioned room has wooden floors and modern décor and comes with a satellite flat-screen TV, minibar and a battery charger for iPhone/iPad. Featuring a hairdryer, private bathrooms also include free toiletries and towels. Private pool and terrace are available in some rooms. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.

Guests can enjoy drinks, snacks and traditional tapas at Catalonia Square Bar. The breakfast is served until 12:00. Room service is also available.

La Rambla and the Gothic District are only 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Within 300 metres, guests can find the metro stations of Passeig de Gracia, Plaça Catalunya and Urquinaona, offering connection to most parts of Barcelona.

Hotels: Via Sants Hotel Barcelona, Tapestry Collection By Hilton
Full_Descriptions:
Via Sants Hotel Barcelona, Tapestry Collection By Hilton features a garden, shared lounge, a terrace and bar in Barcelona. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is allergy-free and is located 500 metres from Sants Railway Station.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Via Sants Hotel Barcelona, Tapestry Collection By Hilton every room is equipped with bed linen and towels.

At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving American, Mediterranean and Spanish cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested.

Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.5 km from Via Sants Hotel Barcelona, Tapestry Collection By Hilton, while La Pedrera is 3 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from the hotel.

Located in a historic building in the heart of Rambla Catalunya, Mosaic Barcelona by Ona is situated in Barcelona, 10 minutes' walk from Plaça Catalunya and 5 minutes' walk from Casa Batllo and La Pedrera. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property

Every room at this hotel is air conditioned, and features a flat-screen TV and modern décor. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. The rooms include a private bathroom fitted with a shower.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. The hotel also offers car hire.

Due to its central location, several bars and restaurants can be found nearby.

The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Mosaic Barcelona by Ona.

Located in central Barcelona, Hostal Balkonis guest house offers a terrace, free Wi-Fi throughout. Sant Antoni Metro Station is just 80 metres away.

This property offers functional and modern rooms with a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries each. They all feature heating, air conditioning, flat-screen TV and a radio. Some have a balcony with garden and city views.

You can hire bicycles on site, allowing you to explore more of the city.

You will find bars and restaurants in the surrounding streets and the closest supermarket is just 30 metres away.

A 12-minute walk will take you to Barcelona’s La Rambla and Barceloneta Beach is 3 km away. Plaza de España, with direct buses to Barcelona Airport is 20 minutes’ walk from Hostal Balkonis.

BYPILLOW Ramblas is a modern guest house conveniently located in the famous Ramblas in Barcelona, 15 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and the port.

The Wax Museum and the airport bus stop are next to this guest house. The nearest metro station is Drassanes, located only 100 metres away. There is a wide range of monuments, bars and shops within walking distance.

The air-conditioned rooms at BYPILLOW Ramblas come with a TV and private bathroom with shower.

The multilingual staff will be happy to provide tourist information and free local maps. Free WiFi and luggage storage are also offered.

Hotel Oasis is located just 250 metres from França Railway Station and 100 metres from Barcelona’s Born district. The modern, air-conditioned rooms have satellite TV and private bathrooms with hairdryer.

The hotel features a seasonal terrace with a seasonal outdoor pool. The hotel's Oasis café-bar offers a range of hot drinks and cocktails throughout the day.

The beach and bars of Barceloneta are just 200 metres away, while Santa Maria del Mar Church is 4 minutes’ walk away. Oasis is 50 metres from Barceloneta Metro Station, and 300 metres from Ciutadella Park.

Please be aware that the type of bed is always subject to availability.

Ocean Drive Barcelona features air-conditioned rooms with satellite flat-screen TV in the Eixample district of Barcelona. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a seasonal outdoor pool. Guests can enjoy a selection of international cuisine in the in-house restaurant.

At the hotel, each room is fitted with a desk. Featuring a private bathroom, rooms at Ocean Drive Barcelona also offer free WiFi. All guest rooms include a wardrobe.

Buffet and à la carte breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation.

Guests will have free access to Urquinaona Holmes Place Gym, 800 metres from the hotel. Ocean Drive Barcelona offers a terrace.

Casa Batllo is 300 metres from the hotel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Set just 100 metres from La Rambla in central Barcelona, BYPILLOW Wander offers modern rooms with air conditioning and free WiFi. Drassanes Metro Station is just 50 metres away.

Located on the 4th floor, all rooms have a private bathroom with a hairdryer and shower. They are heated, air-conditioned and include a flat-screen TV.

You will find a wide range of shops, restaurants and bars in the area. Barcelona’s Port Vell is just 350 metres from BYPILLOW Wander and the Maritime Museum is 150 metres away.

Barcelona Beach can be reached in a 15-minute bus ride. Plaza Catalunya is a 15-minute walk from the property and buses to the airport leave from there.

Situated on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, Hostal Benidorm offers free Wi-Fi, 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. Liceu Metro Station is just 200 metres away.

Each room at the Benidorm Hostal features simple décor and tiled floors. All rooms have central heating and a private bathroom.

Drinks and snacks are available from vending machines in the Benidorm’s reception area. Staff at the front desk can provide information about the city and arrange car or bicycle rental.

Hostal Benidorm is located just outside the historic Gothic Quarter. Gaudi’s Palau Güell is 100 metres away, while the Boqueria Market is within 400 metres. Barceloneta Beach can be reached in 25 minutes’ walk or a 10-minute bus.

Acta Splendid is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas. It offers 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

Staff at the Hotel Splendid’s 24-hour reception can help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. There is also a computer in the lobby that guests can use for free.

There is a public car park 450 metres from the hotel, around a 7-minute walk. You can walk to the Palau de la Música Catalana, a Modernist auditorium and UNESCO World Heritage Site, in 15 minutes.

Gluten-free breakfasts are available upon request.

Mesón Castilla is set just 100 metres from Las Ramblas and Plaça Catalunya Square in central Barcelona. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi and an attractive garden terrace where guests can enjoy breakfast.

Rooms at the Mesón Castilla include ornate beds, and some have a private balcony. They come with air conditioning and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

The hotel operates a 24-hour reception, allowing guests flexibility during their stay. The tour desk can organise excursions and car rental. There are safes available at the reception for an extra charge.

Barcelona’s Modern Art Museum is a 5-minute walk from the hotel. The historic Gothic Quarter, with its cathedral and many bars, can be reached in 10 minutes’ by foot.

Located in Eixample District, close to Hospital Clínic metro station and only 15 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s historic town, these modern décor apartments offer free Wi-Fi throughout.

Barcelona Apartment Villaroel features deluxe and executive 2-bedroom apartments. Each of them has a comfortable living-dining area with sofa and flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and well-equipped kitchen.

Numerous bars and restaurants as well as supermarkets can be found nearby. Barcelona main shopping district is just 10 minutes’ walk away.

You can reach Barcelona Sants AVE Train Station in less than 15 minutes' walk away or a short metro ride from Hospital Clínic metro station.

When booking more than 2 apartments, different policies and additional supplements may apply.

This classically decorated guest house is set in the late 19th-century modernist district of Eixample, in the centre of Barcelona. There is free WiFi available throughout.

Refurbished in 2018, all air-conditioned rooms boast wooden floors, and includes a  smart TV and a free safe. They all have a private bathroom completed with a professional hairdryer.

From Hostal Central Barcelona you can walk into the city centre to explore Gaudi's Modernist monuments, including Casa Batllò, and La Pedrera.

Hostal Central Barcelona is a pleasant place to stay, providing an attractive and artistic interior decor.

Hotels: Hotel Gran Derby Suites, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World
Full_Descriptions:
This lovely red-brick building is perfectly situated in a quiet area of Barcelona, and boasts an outdoor swimming pool and a fantastic collection of lithographs by Picasso, Dalí, Tàpies and others.

Each air-conditioned room at Hotel Gran Derby Suites features flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with a bathrobe, slippers and a hairdryer.

These two separate spaces allow guests to comfortably host visitors, hold meetings or work in their sophisticated rooms.

Sit back and relax around the outdoor swimming pool, where you will enjoy views of the pretty gardens.

The tour desk/ticket service and free wired internet make it easy to plan your days in Barcelona.

Take a short metro journey into the city centre, or enjoy the tourist bus, which stops right next to the Gran Derby.

You can also stroll along to the fashionable Avinguda Diagonal. Here you will find the huge L'Illa shopping centre, and a succession of stylish boutiques.

Hotel Gran Derby shares with Hotel Derby the Italian pizzeria Santa Napoli and the cocktail bar with Peruvian nuances Lima Bruja.

Just 400 metres from Joanic Metro Station, these stylish apartments offer free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV and a kitchenette with a washer-dryer, oven and dishwasher. The building features a rooftop sun terrace.

Each bright, air-conditioned apartment has a spacious living-dining area with a sofa bed. All of them have a modern bathroom with a hairdryer. Towels and bed linen are provided.

There is a small supermarket directly below the apartments, and L’Abaceria Central food market is just 250 metres away. You can find many shops, bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk.

Espais Blaus Apartments are situated in a quiet area of the popular Gràcia district. Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard and Gaudi’s La Pedrera are just a 15-minute walk away.

Hotels: Radisson Blu 1882 Hotel, Barcelona Sagrada Familia
Full_Descriptions:
Set in Barcelona, 400 metres from Sagrada Familia, Radisson Blu 1882 Hotel, Barcelona Sagrada Familia has an outdoor pool and a fitness centre. The 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi.

At the hotel, each room comes with a desk. The rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV, and certain rooms include a city view. All rooms feature a wardrobe.

A continental breakfast is served every morning at the property.

Radisson Blu 1882 Hotel, Barcelona Sagrada Familia offers a terrace with views of Sagrada Familia.

Staff are ready to help around the clock. Guest can use the free bicycle service.

La Pedrera is a 14-minute walk from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Radisson Blu 1882 Hotel, Barcelona Sagrada Familia.

Located just 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya, Cotton House Hotel, Autograph Collection, A Marriott Luxury & Lifestyle Hotel, offers elegantly decorated rooms, free WiFi, a seasonal outdoor pool and an on-site restaurant.

Formerly the headquarters of the Association of Cotton House Manufacturers, the building features a beautiful vestibule, a conservatory, several lounges and a library.

On the sixth floor you will find the pool, as well as a gym and a massage room.

Air-conditioned rooms come with flat-screen TVs and a sofa. Their private bathrooms include free toiletries and a hairdryer.

Cotton House Hotel, Autograph Collection, A Marriott Luxury & Lifestyle Hotel has a stylish bar, as well as its own restaurant. Guests can also enjoy some Spanish Tapas on the terrace. You will find a wide range of dining options and shops in the surrounding streets.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is just 400 metres from the Hotel and trains to the airport stop there.

Situated 100 metres from Fontana Metro Station in Barcelona's popular Gracia district, Aparthotel Silver offers a 24-hour reception, a bar and a garden terrace. Rooms include free Wi-Fi and a kitchenette.

Each air-conditioned room at Aparthotel Silver has simple, elegant décor. All rooms offer satellite TV, a laptop safe and a private bathroom with amenities. Kitchenettes include an electric oven, kettle and fridge.

You can enjoy a drink in the Silver’s bar, and room service is available on request. Staff at reception can also arrange car or bicycle rental and provide information about the city.

Silver Aparthotel is 200 metres from Casa Vicenç, a Gaudi building. Barcelona city centre is within a 10-minute Metro journey, while Parc Guell is just one Metro stop away.

Ilunion Les Corts Spa features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a terrace and bar in Barcelona. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation provides a concierge service, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Ilunion Les Corts Spa every room comes with bed linen and towels.

A gluten-free breakfast is available daily at the accommodation.

Camp Nou is less than 1 km from Ilunion Les Corts Spa, while Sants Railway Station is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from the hotel.

The hotel is a 15-minute drive from Plaza España, from where the shuttles leave to the Montjuic field.

Boutique Hotel H10 Montcada has fantastic views of Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter and the sea from its roof terrace and hot tub. It offers modern rooms with free Wi-Fi.

The air-conditioned rooms at Boutique Hotel H10 Montcada feature parquet floors and natural light. Each one comes with a minibar, a free safe, and a flat-screen TV with international satellite channels.

The hotel’s stylish restaurant serves a daily buffet breakfast. There are also 2 bars, including the Sunset Bar located on the roof terrace. Room service is also available.

The attentive staff at the 24-hour reception can help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. Bicycle and car rental services can also be arranged.

Barcelona's main tourist attractions such as the Cathedral, the Ramblas and the Picasso Museum are within walking distance of the hotel.

Boutique Hotel H10 Montcada is just 3 minutes’ walk from the Palau de la Música Catalana, a spectacular Modernist auditorium and UNESCO World Heritage Site. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, 5 minutes’ walk away.

Featuring free Wi-Fi and air conditioning, Som Nit Born is located in the Born district of Barcelona. Just 10 minutes’ walk from Barceloneta Beach, the guest house is also 500 metres away from the Picasso Museum.

The soundproofed rooms at Som Nit Born come with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom including a shower. There is a free luggage storage service and a safety deposit box is also available.

A wide range of bars and restaurants can be found in a 1-minute walk through the Born district.

This 19th-century Neoclassical building was chosen to feature in the first ever photograph taken in Spain. Picasso also lived here.

La Rambla Street, Port Vell Harbor and Barrio Gotico District can be reached within 10 minutes’ walk as Som Nit is located in the heart of Barcelona. You can catch the Sightseeing Bus 200 metres from the guest house and Barceloneta Metro Station is 2 minutes’ walk away.

Centrally located on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas Boulevard, this aparthotel offers 24-hour reception and is surrounded by many restaurants, bars and shops. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

All air-conditioned studios and apartments at Citadines Ramblas Barcelona feature a kitchen with a microwave, fridge and dishwasher. Bathrooms are equipped with hairdryers and all rooms have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All Classic Rooms are equipped with fridge and kettle.


Linen and towels are provided. The apartment is cleaned and linen and towels are changed for free once a week. An additional housecleaning service is available upon request and is charged according to your needs.

Bicycle and car rental can be arranged for guests at Citadines. Luggage storage is also available and the aparthotel operates a ticket service for attractions in Barcelona.

Plaza Catalunya Metro Station is just 100 metres away, and airport buses leave from the square. The impressive Boqueria Market is 2 minutes’ walk from Citadines Ramblas.

These stylish modern apartments offer free Wi-Fi and well-equipped kitchens. Sants Train Station is just a 10-minute walk away, while Entença Metro Station is 450 metres away.

Offering minimalist décor, each bright, air-conditioned Fisa Rentals apartment has a living room with flat-screen cable TV. Kitchens include a washing machine, microwave and coffee maker. Some apartments have terraces with city views, available on request and subject to availability.

A range of bars and supermarkets can be found in the streets around the Fisa Rentals Les Corts Apartments. L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre is around 600 metres away.

Buses to the city centre stop within a 5-minute walk of the apartments. FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium can be reached in 20 minutes on foot, or in 5 minutes by bus or Metro.

Featuring a quality bakery within the hotel, Praktik Bakery hotel is located in Barcelona, 5 minutes' walk from Diagonal Metro. Free Wi-Fi is available.

This modern hotel offers air-conditioned double/twin rooms including a flat-screen TV and private bathroom. Towels and bed linen are provided free.

Guests can enjoy breakfast in the hotel and try the breads and pastries from the hotel's traditional bakery. Other services include provision of beach towels, ticket service for tourist bus, laundry, and airport transfers.

Praktik Bakery hotel is within a short walk of many bars, restaurants and shops. Paseo De Gracia Avenue and Gaudi's La Pedrera are just 250 metres away, and La Sagrada Familia is a 15-minute walk away. Plaza Catalunya Sqaure and Las Ramblas Boulevard is 1.3 km from the hotel.

Hotels: Torre Melina, a Gran Meliá Hotel
Full_Descriptions:
Set in 25,000 square metres of beautiful gardens and offering fantastic views of Barcelona, Torre Melina, a Gran Meliá Hotel is a luxury hotel set on Diagonal Avenue.

With unique experiences that will make this accommodation a benchmark in the Catalan capital, with access to the Palau de Congressos de Catalunya, the gardens of Torre Melina, and signature restaurants such as Erre Errechu and a cocktail bar by Erik Lorincz.

Spacious, air-conditioned rooms include a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with hairdryer and free toiletries.

The Torre Melina, a Gran Meliá Hotel is 15 minutes walk from FC Barcelona Camp Nou stadium. Zona Universitaria Metro Stop is 450 metres away, connecting you with the city centre in under 20 minutes.

Opening dates of the hotel's different spaces: Erre Urrechu 21.02, Chroma 15.04, Gala Terrace Easter - End of March, Beso Barcelona Restaurant May, Rooftop June and Spa May.

Room Mate Pau is set 50 metres from the emblematic Plaza Catalunya. It offers a stylish décor and a terrace and bright, contemporary rooms with free Wi-Fi.

Rooms at Room Mate Pau feature chic decor and air conditioning. All include a plasma TV with USB port for laptop connection, a minibar, safe and a modern private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served daily, which you can enjoy at the property's shared terrace. Events can be catered for and various bars, restaurants and shops are within 2 minutes’ walk.

Other facilities include meeting and conference rooms.

Room Mate Pau is 2 minutes’ walk from Las Ramblas and Passeig de Gracia, with its exclusive shops and Gaudí monuments. Urquinaona Metro station is 150 metres away, 2 stops from Barceloneta and its beach.

The hotel can help book tickets and activities and is 250 metres from Catalunya Metro and FGC Train Station.

These modern, fully-equipped apartments with free Wi-Fi are located in a quiet neighbourhood near Montjuïc Hill and the lively Poble Sec neighbourhood. Barcelona’s ferry terminal is just 5 minutes’ drive away.

There are several bars, restaurants and shops within 5 minutes’ walk of the apartments. Mercat Sant Antoni Food Market is about 10 minute’s walk away.

The apartments are about 15 minutes’ walk from the city’s famous Ramblas. Parallel Metro Station is about 5 minutes’ walk away and services line 3, which will take visitors to Plaza Catalunya and Plaza Espanya.

Set 300 metres from Sagrada Familia and 1.7 km from La Pedrera, Apartaments Marina - Abapart features free WiFi and units equipped with a kitchen, balcony and seating area. It is located 2.3 km from Casa Batllo and provides a concierge service. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a lift and luggage storage for guests.

The aparthotel will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a desk, a coffee machine, an oven, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. At the aparthotel, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available close by.

Passeig de Gracia is 2.7 km from the aparthotel, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Apartaments Marina - Abapart.

Pierre & Vacances Barcelona Sants offers stylish air-conditioned accommodation, just a 5-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium. Free high-speed WiFi is available.

Each bright apartment and studio has a well-equipped kitchenette and flat-screen satellite TV.

All the Pierre & Vacances apartments and studios have functional modern décor and street views. Kitchen facilities include a fridge, microwave and dishwasher. A safe is available at an extra cost.

Pierre & Vacances Barcelona Sants is situated in the lively Sants neighbourhood, home to a wide range of shops, bars and cafés.

Just 200 metres away, Badal Metro Station connects with Sants Train Station in under 10 minutes. Collblanc metro station with direct trains to Barcelona Airport and Europa Fira is 500 metres away.

Barcelona Apartment Milà is centrally located, 7 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Joanic Metro Station. Each apartment is air conditioned and features free WiFi and a flat-screen satellite TV.

Apartments have one or two bedrooms and some have a sofa bed in the living room. All have a private bathroom with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. The well-equipped kitchen includes a dishwasher and washing machine.

The Sagrada Familia is a 20-minute walk from the apartments. You can reach Plaza Catalunya in 20 minutes by Metro.

Miramar Barcelona has a picturesque setting within gardens on Montjuïc Mountain, overlooking the Mediterranean Sea. It offers 2 swimming pools, free Wi-Fi and rooms with spectacular views of Barcelona.

Housed in a former palace with a Neucentisme style, the hotel maintains many of the building’s original features and it is one of the symbols of the city. The interiors have chic, contemporary design.

Guests can make use of the on-site fitness centre, or relax by the seasonal outdoor swimming pool. The hotel's L´Occitane Spa features an indoor pool, hot tub, sauna, steam room, pressure showers and treatment cabins.

The hotel has 24-hour room service and a bar with a terrace. Studio Miramar restaurant serves a selection of Catalan and Mediterranean dishes.

Each of the Miramar’s air-conditioned rooms has floor to ceiling windows, a 47-inch TV with international channels and a minibar with a courtesy bottle of water. Their private bathrooms come with L'Occitane toiletries, hairdryer, bathrobes, slippers and either a shower or a designer bath tub.

The Joan Miró Foundation, the Old Port and the National Art Museum of Catalonia are within 20 minutes’ walk of the Miramar. And just 10 minutes walk from the Olympic Stadium and Palau Sant Jordi.

Boasting air-conditioned accommodation with a pool with a view, mountain view and a patio, Au Jardin d'Armand is situated in Barcelona. This property offers access to a terrace, ping-pong, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 43 km from Camp Nou.

The bed and breakfast has a flat-screen TV. A private entrance leads guests into the bed and breakfast, where they can enjoy some wine or champagne and fruits. The property has an outdoor dining area.

You can play darts at the bed and breakfast. Guests can also warm themselves near outdoor fireplace after a day of hiking.

Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 43 km from Au Jardin d'Armand, while Palau Sant Jordi is 44 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 33 km from the accommodation.

Pestana Arena Barcelona is less than 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Plaza Espanya and Fira Exhibition Centre. It offers a gym, sauna and modern, air-conditioned rooms with free wired internet access.

Some rooms offers free use of the Maritimo Meeting Room, up to 12 people, for private meetings.

Pestana Arena Barcelona is just 3 minutes’ walk from Las Arenas Shopping Centre and you can walk to Sants Station in 8 minutes. You can get to the Rambla in 5 minutes from Plaza Espanya Metro.

Rooms feature parquet floors and stylish décor. Each one has work desk, a pillow menu and an LCD TV with satellite channels.

The hotel’s restaurant serves Mediterranean food and has a terrace. There is also a bar where you can get a snack or a drink. The hotel's breakfast includes products for celiacs.

Situated in a pedestrianised street in the neighbourhood of Borne, Aparthotel Allada 3* offers a tranquil atmosphere due to the scarcity of street noise and the sound-proofing of the building.

Aparthotel Allada 3* is situated in a picturesque, historical area that has maintained the façades and arches of the 17th century, whilst incorporating the modern architecture of the 21st century. The apartments and studios have been designed to offer the greatest comfort and functionality during your stay. All also benefit from ample natural light throughout the day.

The Borne district is full of winding streets that form a labyrinth, allowing you to find some of the most intriguing areas in the old city. Close to the apartments, you will find the church of Saint Mary, the city gardens, the Picasso museum, the chocolate museum, the Cathedral, the market of Saint Catherine as well as many other sites of interest. In addition, you enjoy free access to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum.

Set in a renovated classical building, Express by gaiarooms is centrally located in Barcelona’s Gracia district. It is 5 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gracia Boulevard and offers free Wi-Fi throughout.

Featuring minimalist, elegant design, rooms at the Express by gaiarooms have central air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. They are also heated and have a safe. Most feature a private bathroom and some have shared bathroom facilities.

Many bars and restaurants in the trendy Gracia district are within a 5-minute walk of the Express guest house.

Express by gaiarooms is just 150 metres from Gracia FGC Train Station, while Fontana Metro Station is 500 metres away. You can reach La Rambla in 5 minutes by train.

There is a gym and a rooftop chill-out terrace with a swimming pool and wonderful city views. It is located 100 metres from Barcelona Cathedral, in the historic Gothic Quarter.

Each elegant room at the Barcelona Catedral Hotel features wooden flooring and air conditioning. Rooms have free WiFi, a laptop safe and flat-screen TV with international channels. Smoking is not allowed in any of the rooms, but there are common areas where smoking is allowed.

Creative Mediterranean cuisine is served in the hotel’s 4 Capellans restaurant, which offers a menu for celiacs. There is a wide range of restaurants and tapas bars within a 5-minute walk, including many in the popular El Born district.

Hotel Barcelona Catedral is 450 metres from Plaza Catalunya Square, while Las Ramblas are a 5-minute walk away.

Featuring free Wi-Fi and air conditioning or roof fans, Lodging Apartments Sagrada Familia is located within 5 minutes’ walk of Sagrada Familia and Plaza Gaudí Park. Set in Barcelona’s centre, these modern apartments offer a ticket service and tour desk.

Offering stylish and colourful décor, the apartments include a living-dining room with a flat-screen TV. The kitchenette is equipped with a washing machine and oven, and the bathroom comes with a bathtub. Towels as well as bed linen are provided.

Please check the excluded costs for cleaning fee and tourist tax: they are separate from the total rent amount, but clearly displayed before confirming the final payment. Lodging Apartments Sagrada Familia is centrally located and there is a wide range of shops, bars and Catalan restaurants within a 10-minute walk. Sagrada Familia and Sant Pau metro stations are within the same distance.

Arc de Triomf Train Station is 3 km from the property, as well as Port Olimpic and the Mediterranean beaches. Barcelona Airport is 15 km away.

Set 350 metres from Park Güell in Barcelona's quiet Gracia district, BcnStop Parc Güell apartments have air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. Vallcarca Metro Station is just 220 metres away.

The BcnStop Parc Güell apartments are heated and have a fully equipped kitchen, TV and either one or two bathrooms. Apartments with a private balcony or terrace available for a small surcharge.

Towels, bed linen and soap are included at BcnStop Parc Güell.
At reception you can request a laundry service and tourist information.

You can reach Plaça Catalunya and the Ramblas, the heart of Barcelona, in just 10 minutes by metro. There is a bus stop opposite the apartments, and there is private parking just 40 metres away that can also be reserved in advance for a small surcharge.

Hotels: Eric Vökel Boutique Apartments - Gran Vía Suites
Full_Descriptions:
Eric Vökel Gran Via Suites are boutique apartments set in central Barcelona, 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza de Espanya Square. These chic apartments offer free WiFi access.

Each air-conditioned apartment at Eric Vökel has attractive, contemporary décor. All accommodation has a well-equipped kitchenette and a spacious living area with a flat-screen TV.

There are several bars and cafés within 100 metres of the Suites. Set on Gran Via Avenue, the apartments have easy access to a range of supermarkets and shops.

The Vökel is just 20 minutes’ walk from Montjuïc Mountain and Catalunya’s National Art Museum. The famous Las Ramblas and the surrounding Gothic Quarter can be reached in 10 minutes, by Metro.

These stylish, air-conditioned apartments offer a well-equipped kitchen, free Wi-Fi, a covered balcony and a spacious lounge-dining room with flat-screen satellite TV. They are a 2-minute walk from Plaça Catalunya Square and Barcelona University.

Apartamentos Ramblas – Plaça Catalunya are set in a typical 19th-century building with large windows and elegant wooden floors. Kitchens include an oven and ceramic hob, a dishwasher and a washer-dryer.

The Ramblas – Plaça Catalunya Apartments are just 350 metres from the famous Las Ramblas. The Gothic Quarter and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló are both within a 10-minute walk of the apartments.

You can find a wide range of shops, bars and restaurants in the surrounding streets. Plaça Catalunya Station is 200 metres away, while airport buses and tour buses stop 400 metres away.

Located 400 metres from Barcelona’s Plaça Catalunya, Hotel Àmbit Barcelona offers modern, air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Urquinaona Metro Station is a 3-minute walk away.

Every room is fitted with a flat-screen TV, minibar and private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have a terrace or balcony.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property, where staff can help with bike hire, car hire and tourist information. Free coffee is available 24 hours on the first floor.

The shopping street, Portal de l'Angel, is 500 metres from Hotel Àmbit Barcelona, while Barcelona Cathedral is 800 metres away. There are many restaurants in the area.

Attractively located in Barcelona, Hotel Casa Sagnier features air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as a sauna. The accommodation provides room service, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests.

At the hotel, the rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Rooms include a safety deposit box, while some rooms have a balcony and others also feature city views. All rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.

The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or continental options.

Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish, staff are willing to help at any time of the day at the reception.

Popular points of interest near Hotel Casa Sagnier include La Pedrera, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 13 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Situated next to Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia Station, this boutique hotel offers a stylish lounge. Rooms include a flat-screen TV and free WiFi.

The Sixtytwo Hotel is set in a typical 19th-century building. Each elegant room comes with a Nespresso coffee machine and a minibar. Some overlook Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, while others overlook the hotel´s charming Japanese-style garden.

A continental breakfast is served daily at a cafe nearby. Staff at the 24-hour reception can help arrange car hire.

This boutique hotel offers 45 spacious and stylish rooms. It is situated in Barcelona's famous Passeig de Gràcia, next to Diagonal Avenue, the city’s best shopping area, where you can also find a wide variety of restaurants and tapas bars.

Hotel Sixtytwo is across the road from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló, and La Pedrera is just 3 minutes' walk away. It is just a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya. Nearby Passeig de Gràcia Station offers Metro services and direct airport trains.

MH Apartments Ramblas is located in front of Palau Güell, 120 metres from Las Ramblas of Barcelona. Columbus Monument and Moll de Barcelona Ferry Station are within 10 minutes’ walk away.

Each bright apartment features city views. There is a living room with air condition with a TV, a dining area and a well-equipped kitchen. There is free high-speed WiFi.

The apartments at MH also include a washing machine and basic cleaning products. Tourist information can be provided at the reception.

The nearest metro station is Liceu, which is 350 metres away from MH Apartments Ramblas. Plaça Catalunya Square is 1 km away.

BBarcelona Central Boutique Apartments has air-conditioned guest accommodation in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Casa Batllo, 1.6 km from Sants Railway Station and 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia. It is situated 1.5 km from Plaça Catalunya and features a lift. Guests can access the apartment via private entrance.

Each unit has a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with bath and a hair dryer. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while selected rooms also boast a terrace. At the apartment complex, units include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Magic Fountain of Montjuic and La Pedrera. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from BBarcelona Central Boutique Apartments.

Alma Barcelona is set in an attractive building just off Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia. It offers a spa, a stylish restaurant with a terrace, and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi.

Alma Barcelona rooms feature smart, modern décor and leather armchairs. They are equipped with a flat-screen Loewe TV, Punkt phone, and the private bathrooms come with a bathrobe and slippers.

The Alma’s spa features an indoor pool, a Hammam and a sauna. There is a gym, and massage is also available.

Staff at the Alma’s 24-hour reception can provide information on Barcelona’s many attractions. On request, the hotel offers an airport shuttle service to Barcelona El Prat Airport, a 25-minute drive away.

The hotel is just one block from Gaudí’s La Pedrera and a 5-minute walk from Casa Batlló. You can walk to Diagonal Metro Station in 5 minutes, while Plaza de Catalunya is just over 1 km away.

El Avenida Palace Hotel is set on Barcelona’s Gran Via, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya, La Rambla and Paseo de Gracia. Its grand interior features an impressive staircase and marble columns.

Many famous guests have stayed at the Hotel Avenida Palace, including the Beatles in 1965.

The elegant air-conditioned rooms feature satellite TV and carpeted or parquet floors. Rooms are soundproofed and have a minibar, work desk and a safe.

The hotel's panoramic rooftop terrace offers views over the city, a sun deck and a swimming pool. There is also a lounge bar, a 24-hour front desk and both free WiFi and room service are available.

Offering an outdoor swimming pool, Olivia Balmes Hotel is set 400 metres from Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia, in the elegant Eixample neighbourhood. The modern hotel features stylish air-conditioned rooms and a restaurant.

Each bright spacious room includes free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen satellite TV and a laptop safe. The contemporary bathrooms have an open-plan design.

The hotel’s restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner. Olivia Balmes offers a sun terrace with an outdoor swimming pool and sun loungers. There is also a bar, serving cocktails and snacks, as well as several meeting rooms.

Olivia Balmes Hotel has private parking and Barcelona Airport is around 20 minutes’ drive away. Plaza Catalunya is a 15-minute walk from the hotel and you can reach Gaudi’s famous Casa Batlló and La Pedrera within a 5-minute walk.

BacHome Terrace B&B is located in central Barcelona, 500 metres from Plaza Catalunya and Passeig de Gràcia. This modern bed and breakfast has a spacious decked terrace with sofas and offers free coffee and tea 24h.

The air-conditioned rooms at BacHome Terrace B&B feature modern décor and free WiFi. Each one comes with a desk, a private bathroom and views of the street or the terrace area. Their bathrooms include a hairdryer and free toiletries.

BacHome Terrace B&B. Located 500 metres away, Portal de l’Àngel Street is full of shops, and there are numerous charming cafes and restaurants in the Gothic Quarter, 5 minutes’ walk away. The beautiful Palau de la Música Auditorium is also 400 metres away.

Located 150 metres away, Urquinaona Metro Station connects you with the rest of the city with ease. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, 7 minutes’ walk away.

The One Barcelona GL has a fitness centre, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Barcelona. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The property is 1.2 km from the city centre and 200 metres from La Pedrera.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The rooms are fitted with a kettle, while some rooms also boast a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and a microwave. At The One Barcelona GL all rooms come with bed linen and towels.

A continental, Full English/Irish or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

At the accommodation guests will find facilities including a sauna and a spa and wellness centre.

Speaking Arabic, Catalan, Czech and German at the reception, staff are always on hand to help.

Popular points of interest near The One Barcelona GL include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 13 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Yurbban Trafalgar Hotel features a rooftop terrace with a pool providing 360 degree panoramic views of Barcelona. The hotel is located just 300 metres from Urquinaona Metro Station.

All rooms are soundproof and air-conditioned, equipped with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. A safety deposit box is also available. Bathrooms has a shower and a hairdryer.

Yurbban Trafalgar Hotel also offers a gym, a bar and a restaurant. A tour desk and laundry facilities are available.

Shops, bars and restaurants can be found within metres from the hotel. Plaza Catalunya is a 10-minute walk away and Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

This design hotel is right next to Plaza Catalunya in the centre of Barcelona. It has a rooftop garden terrace and offers free high-speed WiFi.

Set in a 19th-Century building, the hotel features modern, elegant décor. Its rooms include free tea and coffee, air conditioning, heating, and flat-screen satellite TV. The private bathrooms include luxury cosmetics. Some rooms have a private balcony.

A varied buffet breakfast with zero-kilometre and homemade products is served. Gluten-free breakfasts can be requested.

Hotel Pulitzer Barcelona has a gastronomic restaurant with a terrace, lobby bar and library. Around 100 live music sessions take place on the terrace throughout the year.

The 24-hour reception offers services such as bike and scooter rental, massages and personal training or yoga sessions.

The Hotel Pulitzer Barcelona has a Biosphere Responsible Tourism certificate.

Within walking distance from Las Ramblas, Plaza de Catalunya and Passeig de Gràcia, Cien is set in a 19th-century building. It offers air-conditioned rooms and free Wi-Fi.

Cien's 8 rooms feature warm, minimalist décor, heating, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower.

There is a terrace where guests can have breakfast. Coffee and snacks are provided in the lounge area throughout the day.

The property is less than 5 minutes’ walk from Universitat, Catalunya or Passeig de Gràcia Metro stations. Centrally located, Cien is close to Barcelona’s main shopping area. Numerous bars and restaurants serving national and international food can be found nearby.

You can catch buses to Barcelona Airport from Plaza Catalunya, while trains to the airport and coastal town of Sitges leave from Passeig de Gracia Train Station, 250 metres away.

Situated in the charming Gràcia district, these elegant design apartments offer a balcony and a stylish kitchen with a ceramic hob, dishwasher and washing machine. Fontana Metro Station is just 200 metres away.

The air-conditioned Gran de Gracia apartments feature sleek contemporary décor. Each one has a lounge with a flat-screen TV and 2 sofa beds. The modern bathrooms include a shower.

A variety of supermarkets, cafés and restaurants can be found within a 5-minute walk of the Gran de Gracia apartments. The surrounding streets are full of quirky boutiques and lively bars.

Gaudí’s Casa Vicenç is just 150 metres from the apartments, while Parc Güell is a 20-minute walk away. You can walk to Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard in around 15 minutes.

Set in the traditional, fishing district of Barceloneta, next to the central city beach. This hotel provides value and practical accommodation, ideal for those travelling on a budget.

After a hearty breakfast, head out along the impressive Barcelona beachfront. Stop for a morning coffee or a bite to eat, next to the waterfront. Here you can spend the day strolling around this charming neighbourhood, or you can walk into the Gothic Quarter, or the popular Born neighbourhood – 5 minutes’ walk away.

This hotel has a small social lounge, where you can sit and read, or chat with friends or fellow guests.

Hotels: Youth Hostel - Central and Basic Universitat
Full_Descriptions:
Set in the lively Ciutat Vella District, next to the MACBA Museum, it is 5 minutes’ walk from Plaça Universitat Square.

Decorated with bright colours, all the rooms come with single beds which can be joined together and some have a private bathroom with shower. Free toiletries are also provided.

Central & Basic Universitat is surrounded by a wide range of shops and supermarkets. You can find some of the trendiest restaurants and bars of the city in a 5-minute walk.

The Ramblas and Boquería Market are 800 metres away and you can walk to Plaça Catalunya Square in about 10 minutes’ walk. El Prat Barcelona Airport is 30 minutes by public transport. Regular buses leave from a bus stop located just 800 metres away.

Hotels: Kimpton Vividora Hotel, an IHG Hotel
Full_Descriptions:
The Kimpton Vividora Hotel, an IHG Hotel is located in the Gothic Quarter of Barcelona, a short walk from the Plaça Catalunya metro station and in the Portal del Angel shopping district and 10 minutes from the Paseo de Gracia shopping area. This elegantly designed property features a Mediterranean restaurant, a cafeteria, a terrace with a bar and a rooftop pool.

All rooms feature contemporary décor. All have a yoga mat, tea and coffee making facilities, smart TV, minibar and exclusive bathrobe.In addition, the hotel offers the Forgot it? We got it! Which makes available to its guests a whole series of amenities and accessories that will further improve their stay.

The gastronomic space of the Kimpton Vividora Hotel, an IHG chain hotel, has a rooftop terrace with magnificent views of the city, pool, sun loungers, cocktails and snacks, Terraza de Vivi. The Fauna restaurant located on the first floor offers Mediterranean cuisine with Catalan roots in a room reminiscent of a typical Eixample apartment. Got Coffee & Cocktails overlooks the street and serves locally sourced coffee, wine and signature cocktails. This gastronomic space is a place where guests feel at home. Every day from 6pm the free Social Wine Hour is offered to all guests with an open bar of local wines.

This pet-friendly hotel is close to attractions such as Barcelona Cathedral, Plaza de Catalunya and the Palau de la Música Catalana. Barcelona-El Prat Airport, located 15 km away, is the closest.

Our clients say that this part of Barcelona is their favorite, according to independent comments.

Located in the heart of Barcelona, Vincci Gala hotel offers luxurious rooms in a protected 19th-century palace. Free Wi-Fi is available.

The orginal façade, floor and central staircase of this unique hotel have all been preserved, creating a balance of traditional arquitecture and modern design.

The air-conditioned rooms include a private bathroom with hairdryer, free toiletries, and bath or shower. The rooms also come with a free laptop safe, extra large beds, satellite TV with pay-per-view channels, and a minibar.

A restaurant and snack bar are available on-site, and the hotel offers a breakfast buffet. Laundry and car rental services are available at a surcharge, and the property can provide tourist information.

Vincci Gala hotel is located opposite Urquinaona Metro Station, 2 minutes' walk from Plaça Catalunya Square.  There are many bars, restaurants and shops in the surroundings, and you can reach Gaudi's La Sagrada Familia in 15 minutes by metro.

Hotel Serhs Carlit is located in Barcelona, 900 metres from the iconic Sagrada Família Basilica and Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms, all with free WiFi and a flat-screen satellite TV.

The Serhs Carlit is a 10-minute walk from Arc de Triomf, with Ciutadella Park and the trendy Born district just beyond. You can walk to the Agbar Tower in 15 minutes.

Tetuan Metro Station is just 200 metres away, just 1 stop away from Passeig de Gràcia. Estació del Nord Bus Station is 750 metres away.

The hotel has a café-bar serving a daily buffet breakfast, as well as snacks and drinks throughout the day. Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona, as well as offering restaurant recommendations.

Located 10 minutes’ walk from Diagonal Metro Station, Deco- Diagonal Apartmens are set on Diagonal Avenue. These stylish loft apartments are housed in a striking Art Deco building offering impressive city views.

The Deco- Diagonal Apartmens are just 5 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gràcia, the iconic boulevard which is home to Gaudí's famous Casa Batlló and La Pedrera. Also 5 minutes away is Rambla de Catalunya, where there is a selection of cafés, bars and restaurants. There are also supermarkets within 350 metres of the apartments.

Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas can be reached in 20 minutes on foot.

The Atiram Oriente is located on Las Ramblas, between the Liceu Theatre and the Columbus Monument. Set in a 19th-century building, this hotel features a restaurant, terrace and free Wi-Fi.

All rooms have satellite TV and an en suite bathroom with a hairdryer. Each has simple, contemporary décor with heating and air conditioning.

The hotel’s pretty restaurant serves buffet cuisine and a daily continental breakfast. There is a 24-hour reception and a tour desk. The Atiram Oriente Barcelona also has a café on the Ramblas, close to many shops and restaurants.

The famous Boquería Market and Gothic Quarter are just a few minutes’ walk from the Hotel Atiram Oriente. Barcelona’s Port Vell is less than 500 metres away and Liceu Metro Station is 1 minute walk from the hotel.

W Barcelona is a striking sail-like structure next to Barceloneta Beach, offering breathtaking design and fantastic views over Barcelona. It features a spa, infinity pool, rooftop bar and luxurious rooms.

The W Hotel’s impressive rooms feature avant-garde design and views of the Mediterranean or the city. They all come with a chaise lounge, flat-screen TV, iPod docking station and rainfall shower.

The W has a stylish gourmet restaurant, FIRE; and you can enjoy a cocktail with panoramic views over the city and sea at NOXE rooftop bar, located on the 26th floor. Cocktails are also offered in the W Lounge. The SALT Beach Club & Restaurant has a menu of innovative burgers accompanied by specially designed cocktails to live the ultimate burger by the beach experience.

There are two pools, SUN Deck and WET Deck, which are surrounded by decking with loungers. The hotel also has direct beach access. Facilities at the W Spa include a hot tub, sauna and steam room, and a brand new relaxation area, GETAWAY, is available from 2018. A wide range of relaxation and beauty treatments is available.

The W is 20 minutes’ walk from Barceloneta Metro Station, and buses stop outside the hotel.

Hotel Expo Barcelona is located next to Barcelona Sants Station. Its rooftop pool and terrace offer fantastic city views and the modern rooms feature a private balcony and satellite TV.

The hotel’s stylish Stop’n’Bite restaurant serves international à la carte food. There is also a terrace bar in the rooftop chillout area, which provides views over Barcelona.

The Expo Hotel has 24-hour reception, allowing you greater flexibility during your stay. Bicycle hire is available to enjoy the city.

Montjuïc Hill, where you can find the Joan Miró Museum and Barcelona’s Fira Congress Centre, is 10 minutes’ walk away. Barcelona FC’s Camp Nou Stadium is just one metro stop away.

Centrally located in Barcelona’s Raval District, just 300 metres from Universitat Metro Station, Ola Living MACBA offers modern accommodation with free WiFi and a balcony. Plaza Catalunya is 8 minutes’ walk away.

These apartments feature exposed brick walls and some come with vaulted ceilings or exposed wooden beams. They come with a kitchenette equipped with a dishwasher, oven and coffee machine. Their living areas include a flat-screen TV with cable channels, DVD player and sofa.

You will find bars, restaurants and supermarkets in the surrounding streets.

Sant Antoni is a 5-minute walk away and Barceloneta Beach is 2.5 km from the property. Sagrada Familia is 10 minutes’ metro ride from Ola Living MACBA and Barcelona Airport is 15 km away.

Situated on Plaza Catalunya in the centre of Barcelona, the Hotel Olivia Plaza offers free Wi-Fi and a terrace bar with views of Santa Ana Church. Stylish rooms include a flat-screen TV.

This design hotel serves a buffet breakfast and guests can also order breakfast to the room. The modern Nineteen restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine.

The chic rooms at the Olivia Hotel Barcelona include a free safe and views over the square. They are also equipped with a sofa or armchair and a breakfast table.

Guests at Olivia Plaza Hotel have free access to Holmes Place Urquinaona gym, located 500 metres from the hotel. Guests can make free use of the pool area and fitness room there.

The Olivia Plaza Barcelona is just 100 metres from the famous Ramblas with its many restaurants and street performers. Catalunya Metro Station is 2 minutes’ walk from the hotel and the Gothic Quarter is less than 10 minutes away.

Hotels: Hotel Bagués, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World
Full_Descriptions:
A rooftop pool and bar with fantastic city views are offered at this 5-star boutique hotel, situated on Las Ramblas. Each stylish room displays a unique item of jewellery from the Masriera Museum.

Hotel Bagués is set in the restored El Regulador Palace, once a jewellery workshop, and it is built in a romantic, classical style, which gives it the Speciality Monument status. It still houses the Masriera Jewellery Museum.

Rooms are decorated in deep colours, with ebony furniture and details in gold leaf. An iPod dock, flat-screen satellite TV and free soft drinks minibar are included. Many rooms also have views of La Rambla.

Situated in the Gothic Quarter, Hotel Bagués is a 5-minute walk from Barcelona Cathedral. Just 300 metres away, Plaza Catalunya Square offers excellent bus and Metro links.

Modern fusion cuisine is served in El Regulador Bistro. This includes creative versions of typical Catalan dishes. Room service is available 24 hours a day.

Fisa Rentals Ramblas Apartments is located in central Barcelona, just 250 metres from Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas. It offers stylish, air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

The Fisa Rentals apartments feature parquet floors and modern décor. Each one comes with a DVD player, and the kitchen includes a hob, microwave, washing machine and dishwasher.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are about 15 minutes’ walk from the apartments. La Boquería Market and the spectacular Palau de la Música Catalana are within a 10-minute walk. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya.

Hotel Ramblas Internacional is set right on the famous Las Ramblas, 50 metres from Liceu Metro Station and close to La Boquería Market.
Each of the soundproofed rooms is individually decorated and has plenty of natural light. Most rooms offer views of central Barcelona and some look onto Las Ramblas.

Hotel Ramblas Internacional serves a daily breakfast.

Located just 150 metres from Liceu Theatre, the hotel has easy access to Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter and the city’s cathedral is less than 10 minutes’ walk away.

H10 Itaca is within 10 minutes’ walk of Sants Train Station, the AVE High-Speed Railway, Plaza España and the FIRA Exhibition Centre. It features a stylish 700 m² terrace with a plunge pool.

Each bright room at this modern hotel includes free Wi-Fi, a safe, a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a desk. They all have a private bathroom including a hairdryer and Textures Collection amenities.

Barcelona city centre, including Plaza Catalunya and Passeig de Gràcia, can be reached in 10 minutes by Metro, and FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium is just 2 stops away. Sants Station runs local and national rail services, including the airport train and the AVE link to central Madrid.

Hotel H10 Itaca offers a free welcome glass of cava for all guests. The hotel features a smart restaurant serving signature cuisine and you can enjoy a drink in the chic lobby. The relaxing terrace features sofas and comfortable chairs set under parasols, ideal for enjoying a cocktail.

The Itaca also features a fitness room and a sauna. There is a business corner open 24 hours a day. Free national and international newspapers are provided.

NH Barcelona Entenza is 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Sants Station and high-speed AVE Station. La Fira Exhibition Centre is 1.5 km away. All air-conditioned rooms are spacious, soundproofed and offer free Wi-Fi.

Rooms in the NH Barcelona Entenza Hotel are bright and modern with wooden floors. They feature satellite TV, minibar and a fully equipped bathroom with hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel and breakfast in the room is available. One of Barcelona’s main streets, Diagonal Avenue, is a 10-minute walk from the hotel, with many restaurants and shops.

The NH Barcelona Entenza is in a quiet area but is well-connected to the city centre by Metro. Entença Metro Station is 200 metres away. FC Barcelona's Camp Nou Stadium is 3 stops away by Metro.

A 5-minute walk from Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas, H10 Urquinaona Plaza features a roof terrace with a small seasonal pool. It is set next to Urquinaona Metro Station.

H10 Urquinaona Plaza is set in a restored 19th-century building and features smart, contemporary décor. The chic rooms have minimalist design, free Wi-Fi, a Nespresso coffee maker, air conditioning and a flat-screen TV.

This H10 also features a restaurant, a bar and a lounge with a library. You can enjoy great city views from the roof terrace.

The Palau de la Música Catalana is a short walk away and the charming Born district is within 1 km of the hotel. The airport bus stop and Catalunya Metro and Railway Station are less than 5 minutes’ walk away.

The 19th-century Duquesa de Cardona 4* Sup, opposite Barcelona’s marina in the Gothic Quarter, is 600 metres from the Ramblas and has free Wi-Fi. Its rooftop terrace offers panoramic city views and includes 2 plunge pools and a bar. Property also features a Gym.

Duquesa de Cardona has spacious, air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen satellite TV, a safety deposit box and a minibar. The private bathroom comes with a bathrobe and slippers.

The hotel’s restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine. During summer, the snack bar serves creative tapas, BBQ dishes and cocktails.

The famous Sagrada Familia is 2.5 km away, and Barceloneta Metro Station is only 300 metres away. The Maremagnum Shopping Centre and Barcelona Aquarium are 500 metres from Duquesa de Cardona 4* Sup.

This hotel is next to Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre and just 400 metres from Nova Mar Bella Beach. It offers a seasonal outdoor pool, a fitness centre and air-conditioned rooms with a LED TV.

Hilton Diagonal Mar Barcelona's terrace, Purobeach Barcelona, has an outdoor pool and paddling pool available from April to October. All services on the Purobeach terrace, including Balinese beds, sunbeds and massages are available for an extra charge.

Purobeach Restaurant offers a diverse menu, as well as a variety of classic cocktails and international spirits. Aürt Restaurant serves Catalan food cooked in front of you. Guests can also enjoy tapas, snacks or drinks at Ma'i.

The hotel has 22 meeting rooms. Barcelona’s CCIB Convention Centre is located next door to the hotel. El Maresme-Forum Metro Station is 2 minutes’ walk away, and from here you can get to central Barcelona in around 15 minutes. Barcelona's El Prat Airport is 25 minutes' drive away.

This hotel offers a free gym and a roof terrace with a seasonal outdoor pool and panoramic views of Barcelona. The rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

Novotel Barcelona City is situated next to Glòries Shopping Centre and the Agbar Tower, designed by Jean Nouvel. The Sagrada Familia Basilica and Bogatell Beach are both a 20-minute walk away.

The air-conditioned rooms at Novotel Barcelona City have simple, modern décor. Up to 2 children under 16 stay for free when sharing with parents.

The hotel’s restaurant offers typical Mediterranean food.

On the rooftop there is an outdoor swimming pool and a gourmet bar where guests can enjoy tapas, wines and cocktails enjoying panoramic city views.

Staff at reception are happy to provide information about Barcelona. Tram and bus services to the city centre stop outside the hotel. Glòries Metro Station is just 300 metres away.

The Best Western Premier Dante is located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, a few minutes walking from the elegant Paseo de Gracia, Plaza de Catalunya and the famous Pedrera and Casa Batlló. With a functional design, the Hotel has a Lobby Bar, meeting rooms, internet corner and private parking.

The rooms are spacious and daylight. They have free WI-FI connection, coffee maker, electronic safe, LCD satellite TV and air conditioning, as well as a complete bathroom. The Suites are located on the 7th floor and have a large terrace with views of Barcelona.

The Buffet Breakfast offers a wide variety of milk and vegetable drinks, juices, coffees, infusions, pastries and salty. Many of the products served are gluten free. The Hotel's Lobby Bar, serves Mediterranean cuisine, both for lunch and dinner. It is also possible to taste an aperitif.
The Hotel also has 4 fully equipped meeting rooms and private parking, as well as free Wi-Fi in rooms and common areas.

It is about 20 minutes away by car from Barcelona airport and 10 from the AVE station.

Descriptions: 4 beds (2 singles, 1 sofa bed, 1 large double)
Full_Descriptions:
Apartments Sixtyfour are situated on Passeig de Gracia Boulevard, opposite the famous Gaudi building, Casa Batlló. These design apartments have air conditioning and a flat-screen TV.

Apartments Sixtyfour are a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya Square and Las Ramblas. The apartments are next to Passeig de Gracia Station. This Metro and train station offers direct links to Barcelona Airport. The property offers information on other touristic options in the city.

Each apartment has wooden floors and elegant modern décor. Living areas come with a double sofa bed. The stylish kitchens include an oven, ceramic hob and dishwasher.

A continental breakfast is served in a cafeteria nearby.

Bed linen and towels are included in all apartments. Basic cleaning products and cooking items are also provided. Several supermarkets can be found within 800 metres of the apartments.

Featuring air conditioning, DreamKeys Barcelona City offers accommodation in Barcelona. Passeig de Gracia Boulevard and Gaudís La Pedrera and Casa Batlló are a 10-minute walk away.

The property offers apartments and rooms. There is a seating and/or dining area in some units. There is also a kitchen in some of the units, equipped with a dishwasher and oven. Towels and bed linen are featured.

The property offers grocery delivery and packed lunches. You will also find many restaurants, bars and shops in the surrounding area.

Plaça Catalunya is 2 km from DreamKeys Barcelona City. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 12 km from DreamKeys - Barcelona City.

Vincci Marítimo is located 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre and the CCIB Convention Centre. It offers bright, stylish rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi throughout.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel Marítimo feature modern décor, with parquet floors and relaxing images of the sea. They come with a pillow menu and the private bathrooms contain a hairdryer. Rooms offer views of the charming Japanese Zen garden or Diagonal Mar Park.

The hotel’s Jardí de Mar Restaurant serves Mediterranean food using fresh ingredients. The hotel's breakfast includes products for celiacs. The Ikebana Lounge Bar offers snacks, tapas and cocktails which can be enjoyed on the terrace.

The hotel’s reception is open 24 hours a day, allowing you greater flexibility during your stay. Laundry and car rental services are also available from the front desk.

The Vincci Marítimo is just 500 metres from Mar Bella Beach. Selva de Mar Metro Station is 2 minutes’ walk from the hotel, connecting you with the city centre in 15 minutes.

Located at different locations near Plaza Catalunya, Fewdays Barcelona Apartments offers stylish, air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi. They feature a fully equipped kitchen.

The bright apartments feature a modern, minimalistic décor and parquet floors. Each one has a lounge area with a TV and CD player, and a kitchen equipped with an oven, microwave and coffee machine. The bathrooms include a washer-dryer.

Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia is around 5 minutes’ walk away and offers a range of designer shops, as well as Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera houses. Central Barcelona offers a wide selection of restaurants and bars.

Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, which is also connected via many metro and bus lines to the rest of the city. Parking is available nearby for an extra cost.

Bonavista Apartments - Pedrera provides accommodation within 1.3 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with an oven, a toaster and a fridge. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a desk, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. A terrace with an outdoor dining area and garden views is offered in some units. At the apartment complex, all units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Pedrera, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Bonavista Apartments - Pedrera.

BBarcelona Còrsega Flats offers 3 elegant, minimalist apartments within 10 minutes´ walking distance to the central Boulevards, Rambla de Cataluña and Paseo de Gracia. Free WiFi and air conditioning are available.

All apartments come with a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and coffee machine. 2 of the apartments offer a small balcony with city views, and another features a furnished terrace.

Many restaurants, bars and shops can be found in the surrounding streets. The nearest supermarket is less than 100 metres from the apartment.

You can reach Sagrada Familia in a 15-minute metro ride. Sants Train Station is just 10 minutes’ walk away and trains to Barcelona Airport leave from there.

Situated in Barcelona, 400 metres from Sants Railway Station, Nobu Hotel Barcelona features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation offers a concierge service, luggage storage space and currency exchange for guests.

At the hotel rooms have air conditioning and a safety deposit box.

Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.4 km from Nobu Hotel Barcelona, while Casa Batllo is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from the accommodation.

Acacia Suite is located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, just 50 metres from Hospital Clinic Metro Station. It offers air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi and a shared roof terrace.

The modern apartments feature a lounge with carpeted floors, sofas and a TV. The kitchenette includes an electric hob and a microwave. Bed linen and towels are changed daily.

The Acacia serves a daily continental breakfast directly at the apartments. The aparthotel also has a free business centre. Board games are also available for guests’ use.

The Acacia offers discounts on Barcelona’s popular tourist bus. The city’s financial district is 800 metres away, and you can reach Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard in 3 minutes by metro.

Suite Place Barcelona Còrsega features air-conditioned guest accommodation in Barcelona, 500 metres from Sagrada Familia, 1.7 km from La Pedrera and 2.1 km from Casa Batllo. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

Some of the units feature a satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, and a private bathroom with a bath and a hair dryer. At the apartment complex, some units are allergy-free.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

Sightseeing tours are available close by.

Passeig de Gracia is 2.5 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Suite Place Barcelona Còrsega.

Situated in Barcelona, 2.4 km from Somorrostro Beach, Hotel Cortes Rambla features views of the city. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The property is 100 metres from the city centre and 2.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, the rooms at the hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms are fitted with a terrace. At Hotel Cortes Rambla rooms include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Plaça Catalunya, Tivoli Theatre and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Hotel Cortes Rambla.

MH Apartments S. Familia are located around 100 metres from Barcelona’s Sagrada Familia Church. The apartments feature balconies, well-equipped kitchens and free Wi-Fi access.

The spacious MH Apartments have contemporary design and offer kitchens with oven, microwave, kettle and toaster. Each apartment has a living area with satellite TV, bathroom and separate bedrooms.

Facilities at the MH include 24-hour customer service, and guests are provided with bed linen, towels and basic cleaning materials.The apartments can arrange car hire and provide tourist information.

The apartments are a 2-minute walk from Sagrada Familia Metro Station and 20 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. Plaza de Catalunya is a 15-minute Metro journey from the apartments and Sants Train Station is less than 4 km away.

Offering a rooftop pool and terrace,  NH Collection Barcelona Constanza has modern rooms with satellite TV. It is located next to L’Illa Shopping Centre on Diagonal Avenue, 15 minutes' walk from Sants Train Station.

The elegant, modern rooms at the Constanza feature a Nespresso machine, flat-screen TV, and pillow menu, while the bathroom includes a rain shower and a professional hairdryer. Free WiFi is included.

Guests can use the spa for an extra cost. The gym is available free of charge. Room service is available 24 hours.

The hotel's Antiox healthy buffet breakfast features antioxidant dishes made with ecological produce.

The hotel is 15 minutes’ walk from Barcelona FC’s Camp Nou Stadium. María Cristina Metro Station is 10 minutes’ walk away, connecting you with the Fira Exhibition Centre in under 10 minutes.

Located 400 metres from Sants Station in Barcelona, NH Sants Barcelona offers modern, air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, flat-screen TV and private bathroom.

The hotel has a restaurant, serving fresh Mediterranean cuisine. There is also a relaxing café-bar. It also offers a healthy breakfast. The restaurant is closed during summer months.

The NH Sants Barcelona is set in a quiet area of Barcelona's Les Corts Financial District, but Barcelona city centre is within 15 minutes by Metro. Guests can reach FC Barcelona Football Stadium from Plaça del Centre Metro Station, which is 300 metres away.

Hostal Laia by gaiarooms is set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 1.4 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 1.3 km from Casa Batllo and 1.7 km from Sants Railway Station. It is situated 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia and features a lift. The guest house has private entrance.

All units feature air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, units at the guest house also boast free WiFi. At the guest house, each unit includes bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Plaça Catalunya, Boqueria Market and Magic Fountain of Montjuic. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Hostal Laia by gaiarooms.

Aramunt Apartments offers modern, stylish studios 10 minutes' walk from Passeig de Gràcia Metro Station. It features free Wi-Fi, and a terrace with sun loungers and a small swimming pool of 5,5 metres by 1.

Aramunt offers bright, well-equipped studios for 2 to 4 people, They have air conditioning, a kitchenette with a washer dryer and a dishwasher, a dining area, and a seating area with a flat-screen TV and a double sofa bed. The bathroom comes with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries.

The property is just a few minutes' walk from numerous tourist attractions. On the nearby Passeig de Gràcia you will find world-famous examples of Modernist architecture, such as Casa Batlló and La Pedrera.

The cultural heart of the Catalan capital, around Plaça Catalunya and Las Ramblas, is just a 10-minute stroll away.

As a guest of the Aramunt Apartments you enjoy free access to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum. Pay public parking can be found next to the property and buses to Barceloneta's beaches stop outside.

In the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, close to Boqueria Market, Lodging Apartments Liceu G1 features free WiFi and a washing machine. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. The property is 2.4 km from Sant Sebastian Beach, and within less than 1 km of the city centre.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, 2 living rooms, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. A TV is featured. The accommodation is non-smoking.
