Popular points of interest near the apartment include Santa Maria del Mar, Picasso Museum and Cathedral of Barcelona. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Lodging Apartments Liceu G1.

Set just off Plaça d’Espanya and at the foot of Montjuïc, Hotel Acta Azul Barcelona offers stylish accommodation in central Barcelona. It features a roof terrace, 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi.

Las Ramblas and the city’s Gothic Quarter can be reached in less than 10 minutes, by Metro and here you will find where a selection of bars and restaurants.

Each of the Azul’s spacious rooms has bright décor and wooden flooring. All rooms have air conditioning, satellite TV and a desk.

The hotel is a 5-minute walk from Barcelona’s Fira Conference Centre and Plaça d’Espanya’s Magic Fountains. Montjuïc Park and the MNAC Gallery are within 1 km of the hotel. The bullring-turned-shopping centre of Las Arenas is next door.

This student residence is located in Barcelona's lively Gràcia district. It offers affordable accommodation with free internet and a modern en-suite bathroom. Diagonal Avenue is 15 minutes’ walk away.

Residència Erasmus Gracia serves a buffet breakfast, including toast, cereals, cheese, jams and fruit juices. Residència Erasmus Gracia Gracia also has vending machines with snacks, and guests can find bars and restaurants within a short walk.

Residència Erasmus Gracia is located in a historical building and features a garden, lounge area with a TV and a dining area with a fridge and microwave for long stay guests. A luggage storage service is provided and laundry facilities and parking are available on request.

The residence is just 15 minutes’ walk from Gaudi’s famous Park Guell, with many interesting architectural elements. Lesseps Metro Station is just 200 metres away.

The residence is open to the university community, including students, professors, researchers and administrative staff all year round.

Room Mate Carla is set 200 metres from Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, and 5-minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s La Pedrera in Barcelona’s Eixample District. It features free WiFi and colourful, stylish rooms.

Decorated with lively prints, the air-conditioned rooms include a flat-screen TV, minibar, safe and a private bathroom.

Room Mate Carla features a modern bar offering a range of cocktails. You will also find a terrace and meeting rooms on site.

The hotel is a 15-minute walk from the Sagrada Familia Cathedral. Verdaguer and Diagonal Metro Stations are 500 metres away and offer easy access to Las Ramblas and Sants Train Station.

Residencia Campus del Mar has an excellent location in Barcelona's Barceloneta neighbourhood, 200 metres from the beach. It features a fitness centre and free internet in rooms and public areas.

Each room at Residencia Campus del Mar has a kitchen area with a microwave and tea/coffee facilities. Most also have a TV.

Guests can make use of the library area and games room with snooker and table tennis at the Residencia. Private parking, a laundrette and 24-hour reception are available on site. Bicycles are available to rent, upon prior request.

There is also a range of vending machines.

Ciutadella Park and the Paseo Marítimo are within a 2-minute walk of Residencia Campus del Mar. Barceloneta Metro Station is 250 metres away.

The residence is open to the university community, including students, professors, researchers and administrative staff all year round.

Offering a roof terrace with a swimming pool and bar, Sercotel Amister Art Hotel Barcelona is located just 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s fashionable Paseo de Gracia Boulevard. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel.

Each floor of the hotel is dedicated to a different artist and rooms feature contemporary art work. The stylish rooms come with a flat-screen TV, safe and air conditioning,

Located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Sercotel Amister Art Hotel Barcelona is approximately 400 metres from Entença and Hospital Clinic Metro Stations. It is also 15 minutes’ walk from Gaudís Casa Batllò, and La Pedrera.

Parking can be arranged at the hotel. Across the hotel there is a bus stop and taxi service.

These modern décor apartments are located in Barcelona city centre, next to Passeig de Gracia Avenue and within walking distance of Gaudi’s most famous Modernist buildings.

Barcelona Apartment Val features air-conditioned 1, 2 or 3 bedroom apartments. Each one offers plenty of natural light and views of the city.

Apartments also include a comfortable seating area with sofa and flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen and a private bathroom.

Guests have free access to an outdoor pool located in Paseo de Gracia Boulevard, 300 metres away.

Set in Barcelona’s main shopping district, the apartments are well connected by public transport to all main tourist attractions in Barcelona. Apartments are situated 10 minutes’ walk from both the Plaza Catalunya Square and the Ramblas.

Located 7 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya, Hotel Constanza has a fantastic rooftop terrace (open from May to October) with views over Barcelona. It offers a 24-hour reception and rooms with smart décor and satellite TV.

Staff at the Constanza Hotel’s 24-hour reception can help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. You can also hire a bicycle or car from reception.

The Constanza is 7 minutes’ walk from the Gothic Quarter, where you can find the Palau de la Música Catalana, a spectacular Modernist auditorium. Casa Batllo & la Pedrera are at 10-12 minutes walking distance form the Hotel. Urquinaona Metro Station & Plaza Catalunya Metro station are under 5 minutes’ walk away, connecting you with the rest of the city.

Set 50 metres from Las Ramblas and Liceu Metro Station, Hotel Condal offers rooms with free WiFi and private bathrooms. Opened in 1850, this hotel in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter offers air conditioned or heated accommodation, depending on the season.

The Condal’s rooms have simple décor with tiled floors. Each room has a flat-screen TV.

A continental breakfast is served in Hotel Condal’s café-bar. There is a varied selection of restaurants in the streets surrounding the hotel.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information on Barcelona’s many attractions, including the MACBA Museum and Barcelona Cathedral, which can be reached in 10 minutes by foot. The Condal is less than 1 km from Port Vell Marina.

Just 100 metres from Passeig del Born, these stylish apartments have balconies and free Wi-Fi. Borne Apartments Barcelona - Decimonónico offers an ideal setting within 5 minutes’ walk of the Picasso Museum and the Born’s trendy bars, cafés and restaurants.

Each smart apartment at Borne Apartments Barcelona - Decimonónico has chic, modern décor combined with original features such as wooden beams and exposed stone walls.

The spacious living room has a sofa and a flat-screen TV, and the kitchenette includes a microwave, fridge, coffee maker and a kettle.

Ciutadella Park is just 5 minutes’ walk from the apartments, while Barceloneta Metro Station and the old port are within 600 metres of the Borne Apartments Barcelona - Decimonónico.

The nearest beaches can be reached in less than 20 minutes by foot. Las Ramblas, the Gothic Quarter and Plaça de Catalunya are less than 1.5 km away.

Hostal Dragonflybcn is a guest house located in the centre of Barcelona, 250 metres from Palau de la Música auditorium and 10 minutes' walk from Plaza Catalunya Square. Free WiFi access is available.

Some rooms have air conditioning and a private bathroom, while some have access to shared bathrooms or shared toilets.

This guest house is located on the 2nd floor of a 150-year-old restored building. It features a mahogany entrance door and functional décor. Luggage storage and tourist information can be provided at the front desk.

Guests can find a wide range of bars, restaurants and shops in the area. Arc de Triomf railway and metro station is 500 metres away. Urquinaona metro station is 5 minutes' walk away.

Set in Barcelona, 2.1 km from Somorrostro Beach, Hotel Omnium offers accommodation with a shared lounge, private parking and a terrace. Among the facilities at this property are a concierge service and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property.

The units at the hotel feature air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hotel Omnium every room has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Tivoli Theatre, Cathedral of Barcelona and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 13 km from Hotel Omnium.

This boutique hotel is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and Paseo de Gracia. It offers a free bicycle use, free WiFi

Each room at the ICON Bcn by Petit Palace features modern décor, a flat-screen TV and a shower.

Guests will find a bar and a restaurant with Mediterranean cuisine and reception is open 24 hours a day. The hotel also offers a scooter hire service, subject to availability.

ICON Bcn by Petit Palace is just 7 minutes’ walk from the Gothic Quarter, where you can find the Palau de la Música Catalana. Urquinaona and Paseo de Gracia Metro are less than 5 minutes’ walk away. Gaudi's La Pedrera is 750 metres away, and you can walk to Ciutadella Park in 15 minutes.

Suites Independencia offers stylish apartments set just 10 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia and 150 metres from Encants Metro Station. It features apartments with cable TV.

The Indepencia’s bright, air-conditioned accommodation has simple, modern décor. Each apartment has a spacious seating area and a well-equipped kitchenette with an oven. Some apartments have a balcony.

The area surrounding the apartments has a varied selection of shops, cafés and restaurants. Sagrada Familia Market is a 10-minute walk away.

Barcelona’s old town and Las Ramblas are just 4 Metro stops from Encants. The beaches at Poblenou are less than 2 km from the Suites Independencia.

Hotels: Gran Hotel Havana 4Sup by Escampa Hotels
Full_Descriptions:
This elegant, design hotel is set in Barcelona’s city centre, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya. It features a sauna and a seasonal rooftop pool with a terrace.

The Gran Hotel Havana is located in Casa Fradera, a historic building dating from 1882. Rooms are decorated in a classic style and feature a marble bathroom. They come with a flat-screen TV and free WiFi.

The Grand Place restaurant serves traditional cuisine, and in summer guests can enjoy light meals on the hotel’s rooftop bar-terrace.

Please note that the rooftop bar-terrace may be closed to the public at certain times due to private events.

Girona Metro Station is 200 metres away while the stylish Paseo de Gracia is just 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel, with many shops, bars and restaurants.

Offering free Wi-Fi, these modern décor apartments are located in Sant Gervasi District, less than 15 minutes’ walk from the famous Passeig the Gracia Avenue and the Modernist buildings.

Apartamentos Laforja features air-conditioned 1-bedroom apartments. They all include 1 double room, a seating area with sofa bed, a modern and well equipped kitchenette and a private bathroom.

Numerous bars and restaurants as well as supermarkets can be found nearby. You can also visit the charming Gracia District, less than 15 minutes’ walk from the apartments.

Muntaner Train Station is 5 minutes’ walk of the apartments while Diagonal Metro Station is 15 minutes’ walk away.

Apartments are well connected to the city centre, only 10 minutes away by public transport.

Hostel Friends Barcelona is located on the well-known Gran Vía Avenue in Barcelona, 500 metres from Plaza Espanya Square. Free WiFi access is available and 24-hour reception is featured.

This guest house offers free services like luggage storage and safe box.

Rooms at Friends Barcelona have heating, a fan and a small fridge, as well as a hairdryer. Some rooms have a private bathroom, a balcony and a flat-screen TV, while others have a shared bathroom and a TV. Bed linen and towels are included.

The area has very good public transport links. Rocafort metro station is only a minute on foot. Sagrada Familia Temple is 20 minutes by metro.

This elegant hotel is situated in the exclusive Sarrià area and has a garden terrace with an outdoor pool and hot tub. It offers functional, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV, a mini fridge with complimentary water and free Wi-Fi.

The Catalonia Mikado's restaurant serves breakfast and evening meals, specializing in international dishes. There is also a bar. Only 500 metres away, the charming centre of Sarrià is famous for its cake shops.

The Catalonia Mikado is within a 10-minute walk of Ramon Llull University and the International University of Catalonia. It is also well located for some of Barcelona's most important medical centres, including the Teknon Centre and IMO and the Institut Catalá de la Retina.

Sarrià Train Station is just 10 minutes’ walk away. From here you can get to central Barcelona in 5 minutes.

Ako Suites Hotel offers stylish apartments with free Wi-Fi and modern kitchenettes. It is located a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya Square.

The Ako Suites have a sleek minimalist design and are decorated in light colours. A flat-screen TV and a double sofa bed can be found in each air-conditioned apartment.

Kitchenettes include a ceramic hob and a microwave. The elegant bathrooms have a bath or shower. Towels and amenities are also provided.

Ako Suites Hotel is located just 300 metres from Universitat Metro Station and a 5-minute walk from an airport bus stop. Staff at the 24-hour reception is happy to provide information about the city.

These apartments are located in the residential neighbourhood of Sarrià-Sant Gervasi, only 10 minutes from Plaça Catalunya.

The aparthotel boasts attractive and spacious studios that make your stay a more comfortable and pleasant one. It also has excellent public transport connections with the centre of Barcelona.

Bonanova Suite offers 24-hour reception, a tour desk and shuttle service at an extra cost.

El Putxet Train Station is 4 minutes' walk away and Gaudi's Park Güell is a 30-minute walk away.

Located in Barcelona's attractive Eixample district, U232 Hotel offers stylish, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Hospital Clinic Metro Station is just 150 metres from the hotel.

All of the rooms in Hotel U232 have modern marble bathrooms with powerful showers. Some also have city views and private terraces.

Guests can enjoy drinks, jazz music and city views on the hotel's top-floor terrace. There is also a modern gym on the same floor.

The U232 has a free business centre with an internet terminal. There is an Art Deco-inspired lounge and cocktail bar, decorated with art photography and leather armchairs.

The hotel offers an extensive breakfast buffet. Room service includes daily specials and a pizza delivery service.

The shops and department stores of Diagonal Avenue are just 7 minutes’ walk away. Passeig de Gràcia and Sants Railway Station are both about 20 minutes’ walk away.

Situated 350 metres from Paseo de Gracia Boulevard, The Mirror Barcelona - Adults Only is an eco-friendly hotel with a small outdoor pool, sauna and terrace. Provença Train Station is 200 metres away.

The Mirror Hotel Barcelona’s air-conditioned rooms feature elegant white décor and various mirrors. They offer free WiFi, and LCD TVs in the bedroom and bathroom. Bathrooms also include a bathrobes and slippers.

The Mirror Hotel Barcelona offers a spacious reception area with a lobby bar.

You will find shopping areas nearby.

Diagonal Metro Station is within 400 metres of The Mirror Barcelona - Adults Only. Gaudi’s Casa Milà and the popular Gràcia district can be reached in an 8-minute walk.

Ramblas Hotel is situated on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, just 500 metres from Port Vell Harbour. It offers free Wi-Fi, a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with a balcony or terrace.

Each bright room at the Hotel Ramblas includes satellite TV, a minibar and a safe. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and toiletries. Some rooms have views over the Ramblas.

The Ramblas Hotel has a lobby bar and a charming café with original Modernista design and a pavement terrace. Breakfast is included in all room rates.

Located at the edge of Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, the hotel is a 10-minute walk from Barcelona Cathedral. Liceu Metro Station is just 250 metres away.

Situated in the L'Eixample neighbourhood of Barcelona, Hostal Aslyp 114 offers free WiFi and features a shared lounge with flat-screen TV and satellite channels. Plaza Catalunya is 2.8 km away.

Fitted with tile flooring, the guest house has air-conditioning and heating. The rooms feature simple décor, wardrobe and city view. The private bathroom has a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

The property offers a continental breakfast and vending machines are available.

Restaurants, shops and bars are within 250 metres away. Gaudí's famous Sagrada Familia Cathedral is 3.5 km from Hostal Aslyp 114. Sants Metro and Train Station is a 15-minute walk away.

Barcelona Airport is 20 minute-drive away. Hostal Aslyp 114 offers shuttle service for a surcharge.

Apart-Suites Hostemplo offers stylish apartments and suites set in 2 beautiful Modernist buildings, 250 metres from Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia. This soundproofed accommodation features free Wi-Fi and a DVD player.

The property offers contemporary décor with wooden floors. The apartments come with air conditioning and heating, as well as a private balcony. Most have views of Sagrada Família. Most of the apartments have a washing machine.

A buffet breakfast with homemade pastries, local produce and freshly squeezed natural orange juice is served daily at Hotel Hostemplo, located 150 meters from the property.

The junior suite features a fridge, microwave and kettle, and it has a TV. Located on the 5th floor, it offers views of Sagrada Família.

In 5 minutes you can walk to Sagrada Família Market, as well as Gaudí Avenue, where there are many restaurants, bars and shops. Barcelona's open-top bus tour route also stops just 3 minutes' walk from the property.

Apart-Suites Hostemplo is situated just metres from Avinguda Diagonal and just 3 minutes' walk from Sagrada Família Metro Station. Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are a 10-minute walk away on Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, in the city centre.

Vincci Bit is located just 10 minutes walk from Mar Bella beach. Situated a 7-minute walk from El Maresme Forum Metro Station, it features a sauna, a gym and a rooftop swimming pool with city views.

The restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and à la carte meals, including gluten-free products. There is also a lounge, bar and room service available.

The air-conditioned rooms at Vincci Bit are bright and comfortable and feature a flat-screen TV, a pillow menu and a minibar. The private bathrooms include a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Free Wi-Fi is also available.

There are a number of bars, restaurants and shops within a few minutes walk from the hotel. Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre is just 300 metres away.

The International Convention Centre (CCIB) is a 9-minute walk from Vincci Bit. The historic centre of Barcelona can be reached in just 15-minutes by metro or tram.

Overlooking Camp Nou Stadium and Diagonal Avenue, the modern NH Barcelona Stadium offers free WiFi, a gym and seasonal rooftop pool. The air-conditioned rooms have flat-screen satellite TV, minibar and a pillow menu.

NH Barcelona Stadium Hotel’s seasonal sun terrace offers wonderful views across Barcelona to Montjuic. It also has sun loungers.

The hotel’s restaurant, Acanto, offers a varied buffet breakfast, as well as an á la carte lunch menu. The lobby café is open until midnight every day. The restaurant is closed during summer months.

Les Corts Metro Station is just 5 minutes’ walk away and offers a direct link to Barcelona’s historic centre. Diagonal Avenue can be reached in 10 minutes on foot, and Sants Station is 1.5 km away.

Barcelona's Fira Congress Centre is a 10-minute drive from the hotel. Barcelona El Prat Airport can also be reached in 10 minutes by car.

Hotel El Palace Barcelona is located in Eixample District, close to the Ramblas, the main shopping area and Barcelona’s main tourist attractions. It offers a Mayan-style luxury spa. A limousine service with a chauffeur is available on request.

Opened in 1919, this hotel features a neo-classical façade and stylish air-conditioned rooms with classic decor. Each room is spacious and comes with satellite TV, desk, minibar and a private bathroom with hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers.

There are 2 restaurants: L'Éclair, located at the hall, and the Winter Garden Restaurant, set at the Roof Terrace; guests can also enjoy a cocktail at the Bluesman Cocktail Bar.

Hotel El Palace Barcelona has a Mayan-style spa with a Temazcal Sauna. Other facilities at this hotel include both fitness and business center and an outdoor pool.

Third person sharing in room is available for Superior room, Junior Suite and Superior Suite.

Staff at Hotel El Palace Barcelona can provide information about the area. Passeig de Gràcia Metro and Railway Station as well as Urquinaona Metro station are less than 5 minutes’ walk of the hotel.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are approximately 15 minutes’ walk away.

Located in Barcelona’s beachfront area of Barceloneta, this design hotel has a stylish terrace overlooking the port. It offers a 24-hour reception, free Wi-Fi and air-conditioned rooms with a smart TV.

The rooms at the Hotel 54 Barceloneta feature modern décor and innovative lighting. Each one has a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

There is a variety of good seafood restaurants within 5 minutes’ walk of Hotel 54.

The 54 Barceloneta is just 3 minutes’ walk from Barceloneta Beach. You can walk to the attractive Born district in 10 minutes, and Barceloneta Metro Station is a 7-minute walk away.

Located in the heart of Barcelona, just 700 metres from Plaza Catalunya, Praktik Vinoteca hotel offers air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi in public areas. Universitat Metro Station is 7 minutes’ walk away.

The bright and soundproofed rooms at Praktik Vinoteca feature wooden floors, a flat-screen satellite TV, telephone and a wardrobe. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

The property has a terrace where you can enjoy a glass of wine served by the on-site wine expert, who can tell you about local wines and their history.

You will find bars, restaurants and supermarkets in the surrounding streets. Paseo de Gracia, with its shops and impressive architecture, is just 600 metres away.

Barcelona Airport is a 45-minute bus ride away from Plaza Catalunya and Barceloneta Beach is 3 km from Praktik Vinoteca.

Seventy Barcelona has a shared lounge, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Barcelona. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with an indoor pool, fitness centre, and sauna, as well as an outdoor swimming pool.

At the hotel the rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Seventy Barcelona the rooms include bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a hammam.

Popular points of interest near Seventy Barcelona include La Pedrera, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the hotel.

Bed & Art has an ideal location, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaça Catalunya. The guest house features rooms with free WiFi, luggage storage and a sun terrace where breakfast is served.

Each heated room has single beds with wardrobe. Some have a balcony or a terrace with city view. On-site services include a breakfast buffet and packed lunches. The property also features a snack bar and is decorated with works of art that reflect on environmental themes.

Set in a 19th century Catalan building with a stained glass from Antoni Blanch i Rigalt, the guesthouse is very handily located. It is surrounded by shops, bars, restaurants as well as supermarkets. A car and bicycle rental services are available on site.

You can walk to the Ramblas and to Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard within 10 minutes. You will also have easy access to Barceloneta Beach and to the Borne District.

The closest metro station is Urquinaona, just 40 metres from the property. There is an airport shuttle just 500 metres away. You can reach Estació del Nord Bus Station within a 10-minute walk.

The striking Boutique Hotel H10 Catalunya Plaza is set directly on the square, just 200 metres from Las Ramblas. It offers chic, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and a lovely chill-out terrace.

The stylish rooms at Boutique Hotel H10 Catalunya Plaza have lightly coloured contemporary décor. All feature a Nespresso coffee maker with 2 free capsules, an iPod docking station, a safe, minibar and 1 bottle of water per person on arrival. A luxury apartment is also available.

Modern bathrooms include H10 toiletries, a hairdryer, magnifying mirror, a bathrobe and slippers. Some rooms also have views of the square or feature a terrace.

Dating from the 19th century, the hotel combines original ornate tiles, murals and carved wooden doors with modern finishes.

The 1892 Restaurant offers traditional Catalan dishes, a Modernist ceiling and great views of the square. There is also a lobby-bar and a library.

The H10 has a 24-hour reception, where staff can provide you with information on Barcelona. There is also a 24-hour internet terminal.

Boutique Hotel H10 Catalunya Plaza is just 20 metres from Catalunya Metro and train stations. The Aerobus shuttle to Barcelona Airport leaves from the other side of Plaza Catalunya.

Located in the Barceloneta neighbourhood in Barcelona, H10 Port Vell is just 220 metres from Port Vell Harbour. This 4-star hotel features a rooftop chill-out terrace with plunge pool and fantastic views.

Air-conditioned rooms include a 42-inch flat-screen TV, a minibar. Bathrooms come with hairdryer, magnifying mirror and Rituals toiletries. Two rooms are adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

Other facilities that can be found are Lobby Bar del Port and Hollywood Restaurant open for breakfast. Room service is available.

This stylish hotel has a free business corner with computers and free WiFi throughout. Tourist information and tickets for local attractions can be requested at the 24-hour reception.

Set in a restored historic building, this H10 is 400 metres from Francia Railway Station. Las Ramblas and Plaza Catalunya are 20 minutes’ walk away. Barcelona Airport is 15 km away.

Aparthotel Mariano Cubi can be found just 200 metres from Barcelona’s Avinguda Diagonal and 15 minutes' walk from Passeig de Gracia. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and some have a kitchenette.

All spacious rooms have wooden floors, satellite TV, and a desk.

The Aparthotel Mariano Cubi's tour desk can help guests plan their stay in Barcelona. There is also a free business centre with internet access.

The area has a wide range of shops. Fontana Metro station is about 500 metres away and Gràcia FGC Station is only 150 metres away. From there you can get to Plaça Catalunya and the Ramblas. Gaudí's La Pedrera is about 20 minutes’ walk away.

Centric Apartments Paseo de Gracia provides accommodation within less than 1 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with an oven, a microwave and a toaster. With quiet street views, this accommodation offers a balcony. In good weather, guests are welcome to sit outside.

Certain units in the apartment complex have private entrance and are equipped with desk and wardrobe. All units are air conditioned and include a seating and/or dining area. At the apartment complex, every unit includes a private bathroom and bed linen.

There is a snack bar and bar.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Casa Batllo. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Centric Apartments Paseo de Gracia.

AC Hotel Sants is located just 50 metres from Barcelona Sants Train Station. It offers 24-hour reception and modern, air-conditioned rooms with a satellite TV and free safe.

Each room features special reading lamps, 4 pillows and elegant furnishings. They come equipped with a desk and a minibar. Some rooms offer city views.

Free WiFi is available in the lobby and bar. The restaurant inside the property serves a breakfast buffet every morning.

AC Hotel Sants is around 500 metres from Plaça Espanya and Montjuic. Sants Station offers direct metro access to Plaça Catalunya and Las Ramblas, as well as direct access to El Prat Airport.

AC Hotel Sants is located just 50 metres from Barcelona Sants Train Station. It offers 24-hour reception and modern, air-conditioned rooms with a satellite TV and free safe.

Each room features special reading lamps, 4 pillows and elegant furnishings. They come equipped with a desk and a minibar. Some rooms offer city views.

Free WiFi is available in the lobby and bar. The restaurant inside the property serves a breakfast buffet every morning.

AC Hotel Sants is around 500 metres from Plaça Espanya and Montjuic. Sants Station offers direct metro access to Plaça Catalunya and Las Ramblas, as well as direct access to El Prat Airport.

Hotel Call Barcelona is located right in the centre of Barcelona’s historic Barri Gótic, 10 minutes' walk from Las Ramblas. It is close to Plaça Sant Jaume and not far from the Cathedral.

The rooms in the Hotel Call are spacious and practical. It offers air conditioned or heated accommodation, depending on the season. There is free Wi-Fi and a safe. The bathrooms have a shower.

The nearest Metro stops are Jaume I and Liceu, both about 10 minutes’ away. The famous Ramblas are also about 10 minutes’ walk away.

Hotel Call is also close to central Barcelona’s main shopping areas such as Portaferrisa and Portal de L'Àngel. The trendy Born area is also close by – here you will find plenty of restaurants and bars.

Featuring a charming garden terrace, Praktik Garden is located 400 metres from Barcelona’s fashionable Passeig de Gracia Boulevard. Fully reburbished in 2015, its chic rooms feature colourful mosaic floors, a flat-screen TV and free WiFi.

Girona Metro Station is just around the corner from the hotel. From there guests can reach the city’s Barceloneta Beach in 15 minutes. Plaça Catalunya is 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel.

All rooms at the Praktik Garden are equipped with air conditioning and some rooms have balconies. The modern bathroom includes a shower.

Guests can relax in the hotel lounge or on the furnished garden terrace. The hotel provides vending machines for drinks 24-hours a day.

Located in Barcelona's Plaza de España, Hotel Catalonia Barcelona Plaza offers a seasonal rooftop pool and a terrace with panoramic city views. It also has a fitness room, beauty salon and free Wi-Fi.

The property is located next to Espanya Metro Station. In the square there are numerous bus stops that connect with other parts of the city, with the Fira Barcelona fairground and with Barcelona airport.

All spacious rooms are equipped with air conditioning, satellite TV, a safe and a private marble bathroom with hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout, and Smart TVs with Chromecast apps are available. Choose one of the two clock suites and you will have incredible views of Montjuïc from the floor-to-ceiling windows. If you prefer, the hotel also has rooms and suites with private terrace.

The Catalonia Barcelona Plaza serves a daily buffet breakfast in the Simultáneo space, Barcelona's new meeting point that fuses cultural and leisure activities with the best gastronomic offer. Come to Simultáneo to telework with free wifi, to have an informal meeting, to enjoy a concert or to have an afterwork cocktail.

Do you already know the  Simultáneo Gastrobar? An avant-garde space that offers unique haute cuisine dishes. If you book half board, you can enjoy the Gastrobar menu during lunch or dinner.

The Filigrana restaurant specialises in modern Catalan cuisine made with local ingredients. You can also visit the Japanese restaurant Kurai or have a drink on The Clock terrace, overlooking Montjuïc.

The Catalonia Barcelona Plaza has a spacious business centre with 3 large conference rooms and 8 meeting rooms, all equipped with the latest technology.

This is our guests' favourite part of Barcelona, according to independent reviews.

The striking Boutique Hotel H10 Catalunya Plaza is set directly on the square, just 200 metres from Las Ramblas. It offers chic, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and a lovely chill-out terrace.

The stylish rooms at Boutique Hotel H10 Catalunya Plaza have lightly coloured contemporary décor. All feature a Nespresso coffee maker with 2 free capsules, an iPod docking station, a safe, minibar and 1 bottle of water per person on arrival. A luxury apartment is also available.

Modern bathrooms include H10 toiletries, a hairdryer, magnifying mirror, a bathrobe and slippers. Some rooms also have views of the square or feature a terrace.

Dating from the 19th century, the hotel combines original ornate tiles, murals and carved wooden doors with modern finishes.

The 1892 Restaurant offers traditional Catalan dishes, a Modernist ceiling and great views of the square. There is also a lobby-bar and a library.

The H10 has a 24-hour reception, where staff can provide you with information on Barcelona. There is also a 24-hour internet terminal.

Boutique Hotel H10 Catalunya Plaza is just 20 metres from Catalunya Metro and train stations. The Aerobus shuttle to Barcelona Airport leaves from the other side of Plaza Catalunya.

This hotel is set in the heart of the cosmopolitan city of Barcelona, just a short distance from Las Ramblas and within walking distance of attractions such as the Liceu opera house and Plaça Catalunya.

The Hotel Alba is located in Barcelona’s old town, and its beautiful façade is listed for its artistic interest. Inside, relax in a spacious en suite bedroom with balcony and air conditioning.

Stroll down the colourful Ramblas to the seafront, or enjoy cava and tapas in the famous Boqueria food market. Just a short walk away, the narrow streets of the Gothic Quarter are full of shops, bars and restaurants.

The Alba boasts convenient public transport links, with Liceu metro station only 300 metres away. From here you can travel quickly and conveniently to attractions including the Fira de Barcelona and Gaudi’s incredible Parc Güell.

Situated in Barcelona’s Pedralbes neighbourhood, Upper Diagonal offers modern accommodation with free WiFi and a gym just 1 km from the Camp Nou football stadium.

All rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. All rooms have ironing facilities.

The hotel has an on-site restaurant serving seasonal food, and you can find more restaurants and shops on Diagonal Avenue, just 600 metres away, and in the L’Illa Diagonal shopping centre.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property and the hotel also offers car hire.

La Pedrera is 3.3 km from Upper Diagonal, while Tibidabo is 3.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Upper Diagonal.

Bed & Art has an ideal location, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaça Catalunya. The guest house features rooms with free WiFi, luggage storage and a sun terrace where breakfast is served.

Each heated room has single beds with wardrobe. Some have a balcony or a terrace with city view. On-site services include a breakfast buffet and packed lunches. The property also features a snack bar and is decorated with works of art that reflect on environmental themes.

Set in a 19th century Catalan building with a stained glass from Antoni Blanch i Rigalt, the guesthouse is very handily located. It is surrounded by shops, bars, restaurants as well as supermarkets. A car and bicycle rental services are available on site.

You can walk to the Ramblas and to Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard within 10 minutes. You will also have easy access to Barceloneta Beach and to the Borne District.

The closest metro station is Urquinaona, just 40 metres from the property. There is an airport shuttle just 500 metres away. You can reach Estació del Nord Bus Station within a 10-minute walk.

Centrally located, Som Nit Triomf features rooms with free WiFi and private bathroom. It is 800 metres from Ramblas and Plaza Catalunya as well as from Barcelona North Bus Station.

Rooms are fitted with traditional Catalan Modernist tiles and they all have a wardrobe. Some rooms have a balcony with city views. A kettle and ironing facilities are available on prior request at reception.

There is a plenty of restaurants, shops and trendy bars in the surrounding area and a 24-hour supermarket can be found 200 metres away.

Som Nit Triomf is located between the Eixample and Borne District, 450 metres from Arc de Triomf and Urquinaona Metro Stations.  You can walk to fashionable Passeig de Gracia in 10 minutes and the tree-lined Passeig de Companys connected to Ciutadella Park is just 150 metres away.

This chic boutique hotel blends a carefully preserved, 18th-century setting with the most modern and impressive interior design. It lies in the fashionable La Ribera district of central Barcelona.

The Mercer House Bòria BCN is set in amongst the narrow, atmospheric streets just to the north of the famous El Born district. Its original 18th-century façade has been well-preserved and adds to the hotel’s unique charm. Inside, each suite and room has a clean, contemporary style complemented by works of modern art by young local artists.

To get an idea of the Boria’s great location, head to its own rooftop sun terrace, where you can look out over the city’s Gothic cathedral, the beautiful nearby church of Santa María del Mar and the Old Port beyond.

Putxet by gaiarooms is just 600 metres from Gaudí’s Park Güell, in a quiet residential area. It offers good-value accommodation, with free Wi-Fi internet and easy access to Barcelona city centre.

The guesthouse is set in the elegant Sant Gervasi area. The bars and restaurants of Gràcia are within minutes.

Hostal Putxet is a short walk from Lesseps Metro Station and Padua Station. Plaça Catalunya is just 4 stops away.

Please note there is no lift in the building.

Rooms at the guesthouse are simple and comfortable. They all have an en suite bathroom with a hairdryer. Rooms have central air conditioning and flat-screen satellite TV.

Negresco Princess is situated in Barcelona in the Catalonia Region. The hotel has an outdoor pool and sun terrace, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant.

Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.  For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. Negresco Princess features free WiFi throughout the property.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Plaça Catalunya is 400 metres from Negresco Princess, while Portal de l'Angel is 500 metres away. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 13 km from Negresco Princess.

Offering contemporary apartments with balconies and private parking, Apartments Sata Olimpic Village Area is a 10-minute walk from Vila Olimpica Beach. This stylish property is a 5-minute walk from Marina Metro Station.

Each air-conditioned apartment is decorated in simple, grey tones with modern finishes. All apartments have a well-equipped kitchenette with a microwave, fridge and hob.

ApartmentsSata Olimpic Village Area is a 15 minutes’ walk from the Olympic Marina and Barcelona’s seafront promenade. The centre of Barcelona can be reached in just 10 minutes, by Metro. An airport shuttle service is available for a surcharge.

Nord Bus Station is located within a 15-minute walk of the apartments and regular airport trains leave from Passeig de Gràcia Station, which is 5 stops from Bogatell Metro.

Set 500 metres from Plaza España, No 439 - The Streets Apartments Barcelona features accommodation with modern design and free WiFi. All apartments are located within a 10-minute walk of Fira of Barcelona.

Each air-conditioned apartment is fitted with wooden flooring and provides a pleasant seating area with sofa, flat-screen TV and DVD player. It features a well-equipped kitchen including a dishwasher, microwave and coffee machine. The bathroom comes with shower and hairdryer.

The property is surrounded by a wide range of bars, shops and restaurant with traditional Spanish dishes.  Las Arenas Shopping Centre is also a 5-minute walk from the complex.

Rocafort Metro Station is just outside the door. There is also a bus stop just in front of the property which let you reach Plaza Cataluña and Las Ramblas within 5 minutes.

Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Located in Barcelona, 3.7 km from Sagrada Familia, Laramond Barcelona Rooms provides air-conditioned rooms. Located around 4.2 km from Park Güell, the guest house with free WiFi is also 5 km away from La Pedrera. The guest house features family rooms.

At the guest house, rooms are fitted with a wardrobe. At Laramond Barcelona Rooms every room has a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

Passeig de Gracia is 5 km from the accommodation, while Casa Batllo is 6 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 20 km from Laramond Barcelona Rooms.

Catalonia La Maquinista is ideally located next to the La Maquinista Shopping Centre in Barcelona’s Sant Andreu District. Plaza de Catalunya is just a 15-minute Metro journey away.

The Maquinista’s bright rooms have air conditioning and flat-screen smart TV equipped with Chromecast app. All rooms have a work desk and safe. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel.

The hotel restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and Mediterranean cuisine for lunch and dinner. The neighbouring Maquinista Shopping Centre has a selection of cinemas, a bowling alley, as well as cafés and bars.

Catalonia La Maquinista is 500 metres from Barcelona’s ring road, the B10 Ronda del Litoral, connecting guests to the beach in 10 minutes.

Sant Andreu Metro and Railway Station is just a 10-minute walk from Catalonia La Maquinista and has direct trains to Passeig de Gràcia and to El Prat Airport. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are 8 Metro stops away.

As with reservations of more than 4 rooms, special conditions and supplements will apply to those of more than 8 nights.

Enjoy Apartments Borrell offers air-conditioned apartments with free WiFi, located within 15 minutes’ walk of both Plaza España and Plaza Universidad. MACBA Museum and the Raval District are 1 km away.

Each apartment at Borrell has a living-dining area with a sofa, a TV and a dining area with a dining table. The kitchen is completed with a dishwasher and kitchenware; while the bathroom includes a hairdryer. Bed linen and towels are provided.

There are plenty of bars and shops within a 5-minute walk of the apartments, and trendy restaurants can be found at the Sant Antoni neighbourhood, 500 metres away.

Enjoy Apartments Borrell is also well connected by public transport. The closest metro station is Urgell, 6 minutes’ walk away.

Four Petals Barcelona Boutique Apartments features accommodation within 300 metres of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. It is situated 2.3 km from Somorrostro Beach and provides a lift. The apartment has family rooms.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath. There is a seating and a dining area in all units. At the apartment complex, units have bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Portal de l'Angel and Cathedral of Barcelona. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Four Petals Barcelona Boutique Apartments.

Frequently hosting world-famous celebrities, this prestigious hotel is located on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas. Le Méridien’s stylish rooms feature flat-screen TVs, a music system and iPod dock.

The iconic building housing Le Méridien Barcelona features a Neoclassical style façade and chic, boutique design throughout with bright colours. Some rooms have carpets featuring a Barcelona street map design, while others have Gaudí-inspired finishings.

The Méridien serves a varied, international breakfast. The CentOnze restaurant provides creative Mediterranean cuisine and cocktails, prepared with fresh ingredients from the nearby Boquería Market, as well as music and impressive views of Las Ramblas.

The on-site spa offers a wide selection of aromatherapy, massage and holistic treatments.

All guests can enjoy free entry to the nearby Palau Güell.

Attractively set in the centre of Barcelona, Occidental Diagonal 414 features air-conditioned rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a fitness centre. Boasting room service, this property also has a restaurant and a terrace. Private parking is available on site.

At the hotel, rooms come with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms come with a safety deposit box, while certain rooms are equipped with a balcony and others also boast city views. The rooms will provide guests with a minibar.

Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish at the reception, staff are willing to help at any time of the day.

Popular points of interest near Occidental Diagonal 414 include La Pedrera, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

Hotels: Sir Victor Hotel, part of Sircle Collection
Full_Descriptions:
Sir Victor Hotel, part of Sircle Collection in Barcelona offers stylish accommodation on Passeig de Gràcia, 5 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s La Pedrera. It features a rooftop swimming pool and a terrace offering excellent views of Barcelona.

Each of the Sir Victor Hotel, part of Sircle Collection rooms has chic, contemporary décor. Rooms overlook Passeig de Gràcia, or the hotel’s interior garden. Each has satellite TV, free Wi-Fi and a large bathroom.

The Spa features steam baths, a sauna, and a state-of the art gym.

The lobby restaurant & bar, MR PORTER, offers an innovative selection of dishes to share.

Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas can be reached in 15 minutes, by foot. Diagonal Metro Station is just 70 metres from the hotel.

Conveniently located in the centre of Barcelona, ME Barcelona offers air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The accommodation features nightclub and a tour desk.

At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. ME Barcelona provides some units with city views, and each room comes with a coffee machine. All guest rooms feature a safety deposit box.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk.

Popular points of interest near ME Barcelona include Tivoli Theatre, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 13 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Offering a 1960’s vibe and rooms with vintage décor, this hotel is set in the heart of Barcelona, only 2 minutes’ walk from the famous Ramblas.  Free Wi-Fi is available throughout.

Each air-conditioned room at Sixties Ramblas features a TV and a private bathroom. Most rooms have a balcony.

Sixties Ramblas has a bar and a restaurant. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide tourist information about the area. Bike rental services are also available, and there is also a stylish white billiards table.

The nearest Metro Station is Drassanes, only 2 minutes’ walk from the hotel. You can also walk to the harbour or Plaza Catalunya Square in less than 10 minutes.

Sixties Ramblas is close to the Born district, with numerous trendy bars and restaurants serving local and international food.

This casual-style, urban hotel is set in Barcelona’s quiet Sarrià-Sant Gervasi district, 10 minutes’ from the centre via nearby Sant Gervasi FGC Train Station. It offers modern and contemporary rooms with views.

The bright, air-conditioned rooms at Mercure Barcelona Condor come with free WiFi, satellite TV, a work desk, minibar, safe and private bathroom with hairdryer. Some rooms also have a terrace.

A buffet breakfast is served daily at the hotel's restaurant. Room service and laundry facilities are also available.

When booking 5 rooms or more, different policies and additional supplements may apply.

Guests have free access to the fitness centre which overlooks the Tibidabo mountain and the city. Massage services are available for a supplement. Events and meetings can also be catered for.


There are various bars, shops and pleasant squares within 5 minutes’ walk in the Gracia district. The famous Passeig de Gracia Boulevard, with Gaudi’s La Pedrera, as well as Park Güell are just 15 minutes away by foot.

Diagonal Avenue , a popular shopping area, is just 750 metres away from Mercure Barcelona Condor and Muntaner FGC Station is a 3-minute walk away.

Offering free private parking and free WiFi, La França Travellers is located next to Montjiuic, 10-minute walk from Plaza de España and Fira de Barcelona. 24-hour reception is available.

This adults-only guesthouse boasts modern décor and air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen satellite TV. All have a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. All suites have a spa bath and some have a round bed.

Bars, restaurants and several dining options can be found in the surrounding streets.

Regular airport buses leave from a bus stop located just 500 metres away.

These apartments without elevator access are located in the district of Barceloneta, surrounded by seafood restaurants and set beside the city’s sandy beaches.

ClassBedroom Barcelona Beach Apartments can accommodate 2 people per apartment.  They allow families and groups of friends to enjoy independent accommodation in the heart of The Catalan capital.

The apartment's location is near to train, metro and bus services, meaning that you can easily visit the many cultural sights of this inspiring city. Las Ramblas and the lively district of El Born are only a few minutes walk away.

This historic fishing district is also a short distance from the Olympic Port.

Set the centre of Barcelona, 400 metres from Picasso Museum and Barceloneta Metro Station, Duquesa Suites Barcelona features a year-round outdoor plunge pool, sun terrace and free WiFi. It is housed in a building from the 18th century with the Speciality Monument status.

Rooms at this hotel come with 1 extra large double bed, a sofa bed and a bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Rooms have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and capsule coffee machine.

Please note that the hotel reserves the right to pre-authorise credit cards prior to arrival. When booking more than 3 rooms, different policies and additional charges may apply. Buffet breakfast is served at Hotel Duquesa de Cardona. Local City Tax pending to be paid at Front Desk.

Plaza Reial is 500 metres from Duquesa Suites Barcelona, while La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 600 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Duquesa Suites Barcelona.

This iconic, Modernist building is located at the head of Barcelona’s chic Passeig de Gracia Avenue. It has a sauna and gym, and a roof terrace with a pool and excellent views.

The luxurious Casa Fuster is a monument in itself, built in 1908 by the Modernist architect, Lluis Domènech i Montaner, and has the status of Speciality Monument. His work, including the hotel, is a designated UNESCO World Heritage Site.

The elegant air-conditioned rooms at Casa Fuster G.L Monumento feature satellite TV and a minibar. There is a private bathroom with a hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers. Some rooms have a hydro-massage bath.

The Casa Fuster Hotel has a stylish restaurant, which serves Mediterranean cuisine. Room service is available, and there is a jazz bar and rooftop chill-out bar.

There is a concierge service and 24-hour front desk. You can hire a car from the tour desk, and parking is available nearby for an additional charge.

Descriptions: 4 beds (2 bunk beds, 1 sofa bed, 1 large double)
Full_Descriptions:
Located 300 metres from famous Sagrada Familia, BBarcelona Gaudí Flats offers bright apartments with free Wi-Fi. Apartments have a balcony with city views.

All apartments have a spacious living-dining room with a sofa and a flat-screen TV; and a fully equipped kitchen including a dishwasher, a microwave, and kitchenware. There is a washing machine, and ironing facilities are also provided.

Numerous bars, restaurants, as well as supermarkets and shops open till late are in the surroundings.

BBarcelona Gaudí Flats is well connected to the city centre. You can reach both Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas in 15 minutes by public transports. The closest metro station is Sagrada Familia, just a 2-minute walk from apartments.

These stylish apartments are on Barcelona’s famous Passeig de Gràcia, in the heart of the Eixample. Each comes with free Wi-Fi, plasma-screen satellite TVs and a modern kitchen.

Suites Center Barcelona offers apartments with DVD and CD player, washing machine and a kettle. They feature full heating and air conditioning, soundproofing and a bathroom with shower.

Private parking is available at Suites Center Barcelona. There is also 24-hour reception.

The Suites are only 20 metres from the Modernist Casa Fuster, a short walk from the popular Gràcia neighbourhood. Diagonal Metro Station is 200 metres away and offers direct access to Plaça Catalunya and the Rambla.

This chic, exclusive hotel is set in an 18th-century aristocratic house overlooking a secluded square in the heart of the Gothic Quarter. Its contemporary style contrasts with the impressive historic surroundings.

Set right beside the city’s Cathedral, the Hotel Neri lies just a short distance from the bustling Las Ramblas. The building’s original period charm has been preserved and enhanced by the hotel’s sophisticated interior design. This design blends with relaxing music and sensual aromas to create a unique setting in this ancient, atmospheric area of central Barcelona.

Dine on delicious specialities in the hotel restaurant or enjoy a drink at the terrace bar. You can also spend a relaxing moment in the tranquil library or on the pretty rooftop garden terrace.

Hotel Neri Relais & Châteaux preserves its impressive façade to Sant Felip Neri square as well as a 17th-century stone wall, which separates the lounge bar area of the restaurant. It has the status of Specialty Monument.

Hotel Neri also offers apartments housed in a restored classic building located few metres away. Please see the individual apartment description for more details.

The Barcelona EDITION has a restaurant, outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and bar in Barcelona. Featuring a terrace, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests.

All guest rooms at the hotel come with a seating area. At The Barcelona EDITION all rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

A la carte breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation.

You can play billiards at The Barcelona EDITION.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Barceloneta, Somorrostro and Sant Miquel Beach. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 17 km from The Barcelona EDITION.

Hotels: La Casa de Antonio Boutique Rooms
Full_Descriptions:
Featuring free WiFi, La Casa de Antonio Boutique Rooms is located in Barcelona. This guest house is set a 7-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and 94 metres from Universitat Metro Station.

This guest house has a Modernist décor and offers air-conditioned rooms in the centre of Barcelona. Each room comes with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and tiled floors, and the private bathroom includes a bath or shower, hairdryer, and free toiletries.

There is a tour desk available to all guests, and the property can arrange a shuttle to the airport for an extra charge.

You can find several restaurants, bars, and a grocery shop within a 5-minute walk of La Casa de Antonio Boutique Rooms. Plaza Espanya and the famous Montjuic Fountain are 2 metro stops from the property, and Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia is 2.7 km away.

Located in Barcelona, BBarcelona Clot Apartments is a recently renovated accommodation, 3 km from Mar Bella Beach and 1.4 km from Sagrada Familia. The air-conditioned accommodation is 2.8 km from La Pedrera. The apartment features family rooms.

With a private bathroom, units at the apartment complex also offer free WiFi, while some rooms are equipped with a balcony.

Casa Batllo is 3.1 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 16 km from BBarcelona Clot Apartments, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Ideally located just 100 metres off Barcelona’s central Plaça Catalunya and the exciting Las Ramblas, this new hotel blends a 19th-century façade with 21st-century decor and facilities.

The H10 Universitat lies in the cultural heart of this cosmopolitan city, allowing you to easily walk to many of the city’s unique sights. It is full of stylish, contemporary design and modern art. State-of-the-art amenities include free Wi-Fi available throughout the building.

Primavera hostel is set in Barcelona’s Eixample district, 8 minutes’ walk from the Sagrada Familia Basilica. It offers free Wi-Fi and private rooms with a balcony, 200 metres from Verdaguer Metro Station.

Rooms at Primavera hostel are bright and feature smart, functional décor and original features. All include a fan and central heating, while bathrooms are shared.

The property has a communal kitchen where you can prepare meals, snacks and drinks and you can relax in the lounge area with big sofas and a selection of books.

Primavera is 5 minutes’ walk from the bohemian Gracia area and 600 metres from Passeig de Gracia, with its exclusive shops and Gaudi monuments.

Luggage storage is available and you can walk to the Arc de Triomf, Ciutadella Park and Estació del Nord Bus Station in 15 minutes.

Hotel Catalunya offers free Wi-Fi and is centrally located in Barcelona’s Gothic centre, just off La Rambla, 50 metres from Plaça Catalunya. It offers air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV.

All rooms at the Catalunya come with a fridge and a safe. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer. Breakfast is served in a café 25 metres from the hotel.

Barcelona Cathedral is just a 5-minute walk from Catalunya Hotel. The famous Gaudi buildings of Passeig de Gracia are only 500 metres away.

The hotel is near Plaça Catalunya Train and Metro Station. The airport and sightseeing buses also stop in this central square.

Hotel Catalunya’s tour desk can provide recommendations and book tickets. Car hire is available, and the 24-hour reception offers express check-out and luggage storage.

Located in Barcelona's Sarria District, Atenea Rekord Suites is a 10-minute train ride from Plaza Catalunya. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property

Spacious and comfortable rooms with modern décor come with satellite TV, a safe and Nespresso coffee machine. Each one has a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

The Rekord Café offers a buffet breakfast.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona.

The surrounding area offers a selection of restaurants, shops and lounge bars. Muntaner Train Station is just 50 metres from the hotel.

Hotel Gótico is 50 metres from Barcelona’s Jaume I Metro Station and a 2-minute walk from Barcelona Cathedral. It offers a rooftop terrace, and stylish, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV.

Soundproofed rooms are heated and feature beautiful tiled floors. They have a safe and work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast in the Gótico hotel café-bar, which features impressive stone arches. Packed lunches can be requested and there are vending machines for drinks and snacks.

There is a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. Parking is available nearby for an extra charge. The hotel is just 5 minutes’ walk from La Rambla.

Hotel Moderno has a central location, on a side street just 20 metres from Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas. It offers free Wi-Fi access throughout.

All rooms at the Moderno are heated, air conditioned and soundproofed. There is also cable TV, a fridge and a private bathroom with toiletries.

The hotel is just a short walk from the Boquería Market on La Rambla. Plaza de Catalunya and the city’s cathedral are just a few minutes’ walk away.

The hotel’s City Tour offer is ideal for exploring the city. There is also a ticket service. The 3 computers in the lobby can be used for free.

The Moderno has a 24-hour front desk and offers express check-in and check-out.

Attractively located in the centre of Barcelona, The MO GOTIC is within 2.1 km of Sant Miquel Beach and 2.2 km of Somorrostro Beach. The property is around 2.3 km from Barceloneta Beach, 600 metres from Palau de la Musica Catalana and 300 metres from Portal de l'Angel. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a tour desk and free WiFi throughout the property.

At the hotel rooms come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near The MO GOTIC include Plaça Catalunya, Tivoli Theatre and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

Hostal Sol y K is set in Barcelona, 200 metres from Plaza Reial and 400 metres from La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona. Hostal Sol y K features free WiFi .

Rooms come with a private or shared bathroom.

You will find a tour desk at the property.

Picasso Museum is 500 metres from Hostal Sol y K, while Portal de l'Angel is 700 metres away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Featuring free WiFi, a restaurant and a seasonal outdoor pool, 1881 Barcelona Gran Rosellon Hotel offers accommodation in Barcelona, 5 minutes' walk from Diagonal Metro Station.

The hotel has a sun terrace and a fitness centre, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. There is also a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Air-conditioned rooms include a flat-screen TV and a telephone. Some have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Every room includes a private bathroom with free toiletries.

La Pedrera is 600 metres from Bcn Urban Gran Rosellon, while the trendy Passeig de Gràcia Street is 8 minutes' walk away. Plaça Catalunya is 1.7 km from the property and Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away. Private parking is available on site.

Set in Barcelona, 1.7 km from La Pedrera and 2.2 km from Casa Batllo, Apartment Gracia- Providencia by Interhome offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The 3-star apartment is 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia. Sagrada Familia is 2.8 km from the apartment and Palau de la Musica Catalana is 3.1 km away.

The spacious apartment features 3 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

Park Güell is 1.2 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Apartment Gracia- Providencia by Interhome.

Surrounded by the fascinating streets of the Gothic Quarter, this elegant hotel is located right at Barcelona’s historic heart – just a short walk from the cathedral and Las Ramblas.

The Gran Hotel Barcino is set in a street which runs off the magnificent square of Sant Jaume, home to both the Catalonian government and the city council. The narrow streets which surround the hotel are full of fashionable shops, historic sites and museums, such as the Picasso Museum.

See the city’s many sights then return for a good night’s sleep in your traditional-style room. The rooms feature marble floors and air conditioning.

Situated just 200 metres from Sagrera Metro Station in Sant Andreu, the modern Hotel Acta Laumon is 25 minutes from the centre of Barcelona by metro.

It features stylish rooms with air conditioning, a plasma TV and a private bathroom. Free WiFi is offered. Hotel Acta Laumon also offers apartments, located in front of the hotel. Guests have access to the hotel facilities.

The hotel have a spacious lounge to rest, work or have a coffee.
There are also 24-hour vending machines for snacks and drinks.

The hotel offers tourist information and ticket services.

Hotel Condes Barcelona occupies a 19th-century building on Passeig de Gracia with a seasonal rooftop pool and terrace. It features a gym and a sauna.

The soundproofed rooms at Condes de Barcelona Hotel are air conditioned, LCD satellite TV and laptop safe. They have views of Passeig de Gracia or a pretty Eixample courtyard, and some rooms include a small balcony.

The hotel has an elegant rooftop bar, Alaire Terrace Bar with wonderful views.

The Condes is just 100 metres from Gaudi’s La Pedrera, and a 10-minute walk from Plaça Catalunya and La Rambla. Passeig de Gracia Train Station, 200 metres away, offers direct links to Barcelona Airport.

Hotels: Hotel Indigo Barcelona - Plaza Catalunya 4Sup, an IHG Hotel
Full_Descriptions:
Featuring an outdoor swimming pool with a poolside terrace, Hotel Indigo Barcelona - Plaza Catalunya is just 200 metres from Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. Plaça Catalunya is about 4 minutes’ walk away.

The stylish, air-conditioned rooms in the Hotel Indigo have a flat-screen satellite TV and free WiFi.  Some bathrooms have a spa bath, while all rooms include amenities such as a minibar, coffee maker, scale and daily newspaper delivery. A pillow menu is also offered. Some rooms have a balcony or terrace.

The restaurant, Gastro Bar Catalunya, offers Spanish dishes for breakfast, lunch and dinner.  The 24-hour reception can arrange hire of bicycles and cars, and book tickets for exhibitions and musicals.

The train station offering a connection with Barcelona Airport is about 6 minutes’ walk away. Gaudi’s famous La Pedrera is just 10 minutes’ walk away.

A great range of bars and restaurants can be found in the area surrounding the Indigo Hotel.

Hotels: Iberostar Selection Paseo de Gracia 4 Sup
Full_Descriptions:
Located right on Plaça Catalunya Square in Barcelona, Iberostar Selection Paseo de Gracia offers a terrace with a pool and free WiFi throughout. Private parking is available on site.

Awarded as Hotel Monument by the Gremi d'Hotels of Barcelona

Rooms are spacious and come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with a shower. Some rooms offer city views.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property and there is a restaurant and a bar on site.

Barcelona's La Rambla is 300 metres from Iberostar Selection Paseo de Gracia, while Paseo de Gracia, with its trendy shops and restaurants, is just 50 metres away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the property.

Located in the centre of Barcelona, 2.4 km from Somorrostro Beach, Urquinaona Rooms provides air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. The property is situated 2.6 km from Sant Miquel Beach, 600 metres from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 500 metres from Passeig de Gracia. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.6 km from Barceloneta Beach.

All units include bed linen.

Popular points of interest near the hostel include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Tivoli Theatre and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Urquinaona Rooms.

Hostal Girona is located in the historic heart of Barcelona, a 10-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia and Plaça Catalunya. It offers free Wi-Fi.

Hostal Girona is a small and modern guest house with a lift. All rooms are air conditioned and have a TV. Some rooms are en suite and others have a shared bathroom.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are within walking distance. Private parking is possible nearby, at a daily cost.

The guest house occupies a historic, 19th-century building. The building was part of the Quadrat d’Or. This block was designed by the father of the Eixample neighbourhood, Ildefons Cerdà.

Situated just outside Barcelona’s central Plaza Catalunya Square, BYPILLLOW  Mothern  offers bright, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV. Buses to Barcelona Airport stop 100 metres away.

BYPILLLOW Mothern is situated next to Passeig de Gracia Boulevard, 600 metres from Gaudi’s famous Casa Batlló and a 5-minute walk from the Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter. Metro and regional train services stop at Catalunya Station, just 50 metres away.

 Set in a restored 19th century building, BYPILLLOW Mothern features simple and modern décor throughout. It has a 24-hour reception with a tour desk and ticket service.

You can work from the comfortable coworking space or terrace, or having a buffet breakfast in the dining room. You can also find a wide range of cafés, tapas bars and restaurants in the surrounding streets.

Situated next to Ciutadella Park, Inside Barcelona Apartments Mercat are a 15-minute walk from Las Ramblas and a 15-minute stroll from the city’s beaches. Barceloneta and Jaume I Metro Stations are both 650 metres away.

Each Inside Barcelona Apartments Mercat apartment has wooden flooring and elegant, functional design. They all include a kitchen with an oven, dishwasher and washer-dryer.

The streets around the Apartments Mercat are full of shops and bars, while the popular seafood restaurants of Barceloneta are just a 10-minute walk away.

Inside Barcelona Apartments Mercat are a 15-minute walk from Las Ramblas and a 15-minute stroll from the city’s beaches. Barceloneta and Jaume I Metro Stations are both 650 metres away.

Staff at reception can help organice your trip to Barcelona.

Set in the centre of Barcelona, Mihlton Barcelona Boutique B&B is a recently renovated accommodation, which offers allergy-free rooms. Boasting a lift, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The accommodation features luggage storage space, a housekeeping service and organising tours for guests.

All units feature air conditioning and a satellite flat-screen TV. Units are equipped with a private bathroom, a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while certain rooms also offer a balcony and some have garden views. At the bed and breakfast, every unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with warm dishes, local specialities and champagne are available every morning at the bed and breakfast. There is a coffee shop, and a minimarket is also available.

Guests at Mihlton Barcelona Boutique B&B will be able to enjoy activities in and around Barcelona, like walking tours. The bed and breakfast has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include La Pedrera, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Mihlton Barcelona Boutique B&B.

Aspasios Las Ramblas Apartments is located in central Barcelona, next to Palau Güell and 100 metres from the Rambla. It offers stylish, air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi, and some have a private terrace.

The modern apartments feature a spacious, open-plan lounge-diner with a sofa and TV. The kitchenette includes a hob, microwave and Nespresso machine, as well as a dishwasher and washing machine. There is free Wi-Fi, and bed linen and towels are provided.

The apartments are 7 minutes’ walk from the seafront and the Boqueria Market. Located 250 metres away, Drassanes Metro Station connects you with the rest of the city with ease. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, located 10 minutes’ walk away.

Featuring a rooftop terrace with a seasonal swimming pool and hot tub, as well as panoramic views of Barcelona, Sunotel Aston is a 3-minute walk from Hospital Clinic Metro Station.

Air-conditioned rooms include a flat-screen TV, soundproofed windows and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Free, high-speed WiFi is available.

An extensive buffet breakfast is served at the hotel. The hotel’s Pa'l Caldero Restaurant offers a wide selection of dishes from around the world. There are also many eating options in the area.

Sunotel Aston has a 24-hour reception and offers services such as luggage storage, free pool towels and free bikes.

Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas can be reached in around 15 minutes by public transport; while Barcelona’s famous Sagrada Familia Cathedral is around 10 minutes away.

Set in a striking, contemporary building on Passeig de Gràcia and facing Gaudí’s La Pedrera, Suites Avenue offers stylish accommodation. It features an outdoor swimming pool, a gym and sauna.

Each of the Avenue’s apartments has simple, chic décor with parquet floors and leather sofas. All apartments have a large kitchen with an oven, fridge and dishwasher. Free Wi-Fi is available.

The property has a concierge service, which guests can use to arrange excursions, beauty treatments and babysitting.

The apartments are a 5-minute walk from a selection of upmarket shops and close to a range of cafés and restaurants.

Casa Batlló is 5 minutes’ walk from the apartments, while Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are just over 1 km away. Diagonal Metro Station is a 2-minute walk from the Suites.

Featuring free WiFi, Ola Living Hostal Diagonal is located in Barcelona. Set 800 metres from Passeig de Gracia, famous for its luxury shops, this hotel offers modern rooms with air conditioning.

Each heated room at this hotel has modern décor and includes 1 double or 2 single beds, a flat-screen TV and wardrobe. The private bathroom comes with a shower and hairdryer. Some rooms have a spa bath. All are on the ground floor.

The hotel offers a lounge area.

You can find several restaurants, bars, and grocery shops within a 5-minute walk of Ola Living Hostal Diagonal Exclusive rooms. Diagonal Metro Station is 850 metres from the property, and Plaza Catalunya is 2 stops away.

Our reception is located at 228 Aribau Street. The opening hours are from 09:00 to 20:00, Monday to Sunday.

Check in time is 3:00 PM. If you arrive earlier we can store your luggage at reception until your apartment is ready. Also after your check out (11.00 AM).  You can leave your luggage at the reception.

The apartment has opening through a smartphone. If you need a face-to-face check-in later than 9:00 PM.  There is a surcharge of €30.

Hotels: ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento
Full_Descriptions:
Located in Barcelona, 1.9 km from Park Güell, ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento provides accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with an indoor pool, fitness centre, and sauna, as well as a garden.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento every room is fitted with bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a range of wellness facilities including a hot tub and a hammam.

La Pedrera is 3.3 km from ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento, while Casa Batllo is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 14 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Urbany Hostel Barcelona is on Barcelona’s Meridiana Avenue, 300 metres from Clot Metro Station. This large, funky hostel has spacious common areas where you can relax and meet people from abroad. There are free Wi-Fi throughout and rooftop terrace with city views and bar service.

Each modern dormitory or room features lockers, an en-suite bathroom and air conditioning.

The Urbany Barcelona serves a daily continental buffet breakfast. It has a kitchen with cookers, fridges and microwaves. There is a café-bar and vending machines, and you can request a packed lunch.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. Free city maps and tour information are available.

Urbany Hostel is 5 minutes’ walk from Glories Shopping Centre, and Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia is a 15-minute walk away. You can reach the city centre in 15 minutes by Metro or bus, and the beach is 2 km away.

Hostal Ramos is in Barcelona's Raval district, just 50 metres from the famous Ramblas. It offers 24-hour reception and simple, air-conditioned rooms with a TV and private bathroom.

The Ramos has a computer with free internet access. There is also a luggage storage facility in reception.

The guesthouse is set near many of the city's attractions. It is next to the Boquería Market and the Liceu Opera House.

Plaça Catalunya is just 5 minutes’ walk away. Airport buses, trains and metro lines all stop here.

Set on Barcelona’s fashionable Passeig de Gràcia, the luxurious Mandarin Oriental, Barcelona is within 5 minutes’ walk of Gaudi’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera. Plaça Catalunya is just a 10-minute walk away. The hotel features a spa, rooftop pool, indoor pool, fitness centre, wonderful city views, and 24-hour room service.

The spacious rooms feature bright, minimalist design. They include a home theatre, a seating area, large flat-screen TV, CD and DVD player. Bathrooms have large bathtubs or showers, and include Acqua di Parma free toiletries, a bathrobe and slippers.

Additionally, you can dine al fresco in the Mimosa garden, and discover Terrat, the rooftop terrace, where guests can enjoy cocktails and Peruvian food. Banker's bar is also serves cocktails and tapas.

Mandarin Oriental spa offers a wide range of treatments. Spa access is free and includes the indoor pool, hot tub, Hammam and 24-hour gym. The spa also features suites for couples. Headphones, towels and chilled drinks are provided for the gym.

There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. Parking is available nearby for an extra charge.

This central Barcelona hotel is surrounded by the boutiques and cafes of the elegant Rambla de Catalunya. It offers free internet access and an outdoor pool, not heated and is open from April to October.

Onix Rambla has a fitness centre and a business centre with free internet access. There is also a nice terrace.

All air-conditioned rooms have flat-screen satellite TV. Rooms are also heated and come with a minibar and free safe. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer and amenities.
