The hotel is housed in a building with typical Modernist architecture. The surrounding area of the Eixample neighbourhood is famous for its beautiful buildings.

There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car at the hotel tour desk.

Please, be aware that swimming pool is not heated and will be opened from April to October.

This small hotel occupies the first floor of a modernist building, just 50 metres from central Barcelona’s famous shopping street, Passeig de Gràcia. It offers elegant rooms with free Wi-Fi.

Air-conditioned rooms at Circa 1905 include a blend of classic and modern features. There is a balcony and private bathroom with amenities and a hairdryer.

The hotel serves a breakfast of local produce. Free tea and coffee are offered 24 hours a day.

Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. Gaudí’s La Pedrera is just 100 metres away, while you can walk to Casa Batlló in under 5 minutes.

The hostel’s privileged position in the heart of the Eixample district allows you to easily walk through Barcelona´s cultural heart, with streets such as La Rambla and Passeig de Gracia in the local area.

Once you have returned from a day’s sightseeing you will find drinks and snacks available on site. Breakfast is served daily.

Hotels: True Design in Heart of Noble BCN
Full_Descriptions:
Offering free WiFi, True Design in Heart of Noble BCN is located near the historic center of Barcelona. Restaurants and cafeterias are 50 metres away. Plaça Catalunya and La Rambla are 1 km and 1.5 km away.

Featuring wooden ceiling beams, the air-conditioned loft includes a sofa and TV with satellite channels. The kitchen is equipped with a stove and microwave. The bathroom comes with a shower.

Gaudi's La Pedrera Museum is 1 km from the apartment. Provenca Train Station, with direct lines to the beaches, is within 5 minutes' walk away.

True Design in Heart of Noble BCN is 2 km from Sagrada Familia and 3.5 km from Camp Nou Stadium. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Hotel Inglés is located right next to the Ramblas and Boquería market, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaça Catalunya. It offers 24-hour reception and rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV.

Air-conditioned rooms at the Inglés are simple and comfortable. They come with a private bathroom and some rooms have a private balcony.

A breakfast is served every morning in a restaurant located next to the hotel.

Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. You can also hire a car and store your luggage at the front desk.

The Palau de la Música Catalana, a Modernist auditorium, is 10 minutes’ walk from the Hotel Inglés. The characterful streets of the Gothic Quarter are on the doorstep, and you can walk to the trendy Born area in around 5 minutes.

Located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, Cosmopolitan Boutique Rambla is only 200 metres from Gaudi’s famous La Pedrera. This guest house offers rooms with free WiFi.

Rooms at the Cosmopolitan Boutique Rambla have typical tiled floors and high ceilings. All rooms have heating, TV, and private bathroom. Some have a balcony with city views.

Cosmopolitan Boutique Rambla is set on Rambla Catalunya, a tree-lined avenue full of shops, cafés and tapas bars.

Passeig de Gracia is 100 metres away, and Diagonal Metro Station is within 50 metres. Las Ramblas, Sagrada Familia and Camp Nou Stadium are all just a few stops away by Metro.

Ideally set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, ibis Styles Barcelona Centre is situated less than 1 km from Casa Batllo, a 15-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia and 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Featuring a bar, the 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is 1.3 km from the city centre and 500 metres from La Pedrera.

All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. At ibis Styles Barcelona Centre the rooms come with bed linen and towels.

With staff speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish, non-stop advice is available at the reception.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sagrada Familia, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from ibis Styles Barcelona Centre.

Offering beautiful, stylish rooms Hotel Ciutadella Barcelona has an ideal central setting within 300 metres of Santa María del Mar Church, Ciutadella Park and Barceloneta Metro Station. It offers easy access to the historic Born and Gothic districts.

Each air-conditioned room at Hotel Ciutadella Barcelona has contemporary décor. All rooms have a TV and a private bathroom.

Bars and cafés can be found along Passeig del Born, 200 metres away. There are several seafood restaurants along the seaside Passeig de Joan de Borbó, a 5-minute walk from the Hotel Ciutadella.

The nearest beaches can be reached in 15 minutes by foot. Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are within 2 km of the hotel.

These chic apartments are set on Barcelona’s stylish Rambla de Catalunya, 150 metres from Passeig de Gracia Boulevard. There is free WiFi available throughout.

Apartments at Aspasios Rambla Catalunya Suites feature contemporary decor, a sofa bed, and plasma TV while kitchens have a dishwasher, washing machine, tumble drier and Nespresso coffee maker.

There are several bars, restaurants and shops within 5 minutes’ walk and Plaza Catalunya is 400 metres away.

Las Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter are 10 minutes’ walk away and Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batllo are within 5 minutes’ walk.

The Aspasios Rambla Catalunya apartments are 3 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gracia Metro and Train Station, with direct trains to Barcelona El Prat Airport.

The pictures at the top of this page are a selection of the different apartments located in the Eixample area. Please select a date and click on the apartments to see the pictures of the individual apartments.

Catalonia Barcelona 505 offers spacious rooms with free Wi-Fi and an outdoor swimming pool in Barcelona’s Sant Gervasi area. From El Putxet Train Station, 400 metres away, you can reach the centre in 15 minutes.

The hotel is close to important medical centres, such as the Teknon Clinic, Sant Jordi Clinic, Dexeus and Barraquer. It is also next to the Blue Tram, which takes you to the cable car for Tibidabo.

Air-conditioned rooms have a satellite TV, a safe and minibar. There is a work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

The restaurant C50&5 offers international cuisine. There is a bar and room service is available.

You can hire a car from the 24-hour front desk. On-site parking is offered for an additional charge, and the hotel has easy access to the B20 Motorway.

Arc House is a youth hostel, located centrally in Barcelona, just 350 metres from Arc de Triomf Metro Station. Free WiFi is available at the hostel and there are lockers in each room.

Mixed and same-sex dormitory rooms are available at Arc House, and all come with bunk beds and feature a bright interior. Bathrooms are shared.

Guests can make use of laundry facilities for a supplement. Lockers are also available and padlocks can be rented at reception.

The hostel offers access to computers, as well as a shared kitchen and dining area. Arc House provides luggage storage, a ticket service and a tour desk.

A range of bars, shops and restaurants are located 10 minutes' walk away. Plaza de Cataluña, Las Ramblas and La Barceloneta Beach are within 20 minutes´ walk. Barcelona El-Prat Airport is 16 km away

Hostal Rio De Castro offers free WiFi and is centrally located on Barcelona’s Parallel Avenue, next to Poble Sec Metro Station. It is 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza Espanya’s Magic Fountain.

All air-conditioned rooms feature flat-screen TV and tiled floors. Each has a work desk and some have a private bathroom with a hairdryer and amenities.

There is a communal area with a TV lounge, microwave and coffee maker. Many shops, bars and restaurants can be found in the immediate area.

Luggage storage is offered at the Rio de Castro. You can walk to the Rambla in 15 minutes through the Raval district.

This hotel is located next to Avinguda Diagonal and Passeig de Gràcia, ideal for shopping. Guests can easily access Plaza Cataluña and the city’s historic gothic quarter. Free Wi-Fi is available.

Situated along the modernist route, Hotel Catalonia Gracia is surrounded by much of the interesting architecture that Barcelona is famous for, such as Gaudí and Domenech i Muntaner's key buildings, including La Pedrera.

A buffet breakfast is available at the on-site restaurant; room service is also available.

Guests can easily enjoy this cosmopolitan city as Hotel Catalonia Gracia is within walking distance of Barcelona’s many attractions. As well as the excellent public transport links providing swift access to the entire city and the surrounding area, the hotel offers great value for money. The hotel also includes meeting amenities and conference rooms available for business events and banquets.

Featuring free Wi-Fi, Apart Easy Gracia is located in Barcelona’s Gracia District, within 400 metres of Passeig de Gracia and Gaudí’s La Pedrera building. The property offers modern apartments with air conditioning.

Each apartment features wooden floors and has a living room with a sofa and TV. An oven, microwave and washing machine are included in the kitchenette. The bathroom comes with a shower.

Some apartments offer a private terrace with city views. A large variety of supermarkets, bars and restaurants can be found within 5 minutes’ walk of the apartments.

Plaça Catalunya and the famous Sagrada Familia can be reached in 20 minutes on foot. Diagonal Metro Station, with connection to the historic centre, is 400 metres away.

Located in a typical Eixample-style building in Barcelona’s Quadrat d’Or, Bonavista Apartments Eixample offers modern accommodation with free Wi-Fi. Plaza Catalunya Square is 1.5 km away.

All 2-bedroom apartments feature a modern décor with parquet flooring and contemporary furnishings. Each includes a 32-inch flat-screen TV, a washing machine and ironing facilities. The fully-equipped kitchenette includes a kettle, microwave and dishwasher.

Bonavista Apartments – Eixample is located on the corner of Enric Granados Street, where guests will find plenty of cafés, bars and restaurants. There is also a supermarket just 1 block away.

Diagonal Metro Stop, servicing lines 3 and 5, is a 5-minute walk away. Barcelona’s FGC urban rail line also stops at Provença, just 250 metres from the apartments and will take you to Plaça Catalunya in about 5 minutes.

Situated in the charming residential district of Sarrià, this elegant design hotel offers an outdoor pool and garden area, overlooking Tibidabo Mountain. Free Wi-Fi is available.

The Ikonik Anglí’s spacious rooms have a minimalist design and large windows, which provide plenty of natural light. Each air-conditioned room includes a flat-screen TV and a modern bathroom with a range of amenities.

Guests can enjoy a daily breakfast in the Angli’s stylish breakfast room. The Sarrià district is known for its wonderful cake shops, and there are also many popular bars within a 5-minute walk. The hotel also offers meeting rooms for events.

Sarrià FGC Train Station is 600 metres from the Ikonik Anglí, and offers direct services to Barcelona city centre. Plaza Catalunya Square is just a 10-minute train ride away. The nearest airport is Barcelona Airport, 15 minutes drive away from the hotel.

This design hotel is a 5-minute walk from Barcelona’s Arc de Triomf Metro Station and Estació del Nord Bus Station.  It has a gym, and offers free Wi-Fi and free bottled water.

Rooms at the Sercotel Caspe are air-conditioned and soundproofed. They feature satellite TV, a minibar and safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

The Sercotel Caspe has an outdoor terrace, an attractive restaurant and a café-bar. Room service is also available.

The hotel is a short walk from Gaudí's buildings on Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. Plaza Catalunya is approximately 20 minutes' walk away.

There is a tour desk and 24-hour reception. Car hire is available and there is on-site parking for an extra charge.

These apartments with free Wi-Fi are located in Vall d’Hebron, in the hills above Barcelona. Penitents and Vall d'Hebron Metro Stations are both less than 10 minutes' walk away. By direct metro you can reach La Rambla in 15 minutes.

The Tibidabo Apartments are set within an old villa with a spacious garden and terrace.

The location is convenient for access by car, with the Ronda de Dalt (B20 Ring Road) 200 metres away. Barcelona Airport is 15 minutes' drive away and there is free street parking around the apartments. The CosmoCaixa Science Museum and the Vall d’Hebron Hospital are a short drive away.

The Tibidabo Apartments are at the bottom of Mount Tibidabo, in the Sierra de Collserola. Tibidabo is famous for the beautiful Sagrat Cor Church, amusement park and spectacular views over Barcelona.

Factory Apartments Barcelona features accommodation within 700 metres of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. This recently renovated apartment is located 2.7 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2.7 km from Barceloneta Beach. Sant Miquel Beach is 2.9 km away and La Pedrera is 1.3 km from the apartment.

The units in the apartment complex are equipped with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, all units at the apartment complex have a TV and air conditioning, and some rooms have a terrace. At the apartment complex, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Casa Batllo. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Factory Apartments Barcelona.

Catalonia Albeniz offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and satellite TV. It is situated 150 metres from Clot Train Station, and a 15-minute walk from Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia Church.

The property has a gym and an outdoor pool. You can also use the luggage storage facility on site at the Albeniz.

The varied buffet breakfast at the Catalonia Albeniz includes typical local dishes, such as potato omelette and bread with tomato.

The Albeniz offers bright, modern rooms with simple décor and wooden floors. Each room includes a minibar and a marble bathroom with a hair dryer, plus a safe. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.

Catalonia Albeniz is just 700 metres from the shops and restaurants of Glòries Shopping Centre, while Encants Flea Market is a 5-minute walk away. Metro services and direct airport trains are available from nearby Clot Station.

limehome Barcelona Rector Triadó is located just 300 metres from Sants Train Station, in a commercial district of Barcelona. This modern air-conditioned apartment complex offers spacious accommodation with free WiFi access.

The complex has stylish apartments, with minimalist design. They all offer an en-suite bathroom and well-equipped kitchen. Both the living area and bedroom have LCD TV with satellite channels. You can make use of a communal laundry room.

limehome Barcelona Rector Triadó are a short walk from the Fira Exhibition Centre. Montjuïc Hill is also nearby. Attractions include the Olympic stadium, the Catalan National Gallery and the Magic Fountain.

The apartments are well-placed for transport connections, only 3 stops from Camp Nou. Plaça Espanya Metro Station is 300 metres away. Direct airport buses also stop in the square.

Featuring a balcony with city views, Historical center - Barrio Gótico district is an apartment, situated in Barcelona. The air-conditioned unit is 200 metres from Plaza Reial.

The kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave, as well as a coffee machine. A TV is featured.

La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 300 metres from Historical center - Barrio Gótico district, while Portal de l'Angel is 500 metres from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

ITC Barcelona By Soho Boutique is set in an impressive historic building, next to Barcelona’s Universitat Metro Station. It offers free Wi-Fi and bright, air-conditioned rooms, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and La Rambla.

Rooms feature wooden floors and have a safe and minibar. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer.

ITC Barcelona By Soho Boutique offers a buffet breakfast each morning. A gluten-free breakfast is available upon request. Due to its central location, there are many bars and restaurants within a short walk.

ITC Barcelona By Soho Boutique has a 24-hour front desk, and a public parking is available nearby for an additional charge. The Airport Bus stops opposite in Plaza Universitat.

Located in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Sants Railway Station, Hotel Brick Barcelona features views of the city. Among the facilities at this property are a business centre and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is set 600 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hotel Brick Barcelona the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Languages spoken at the reception include Catalan, English, Spanish and French, and guests are invited to request information on the area when needed.

Palau Sant Jordi is 1.8 km from the accommodation, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 10 km from Hotel Brick Barcelona.

Set 3 metro stops from central Barcelona, the Atenas Catalonia has a rooftop swimming pool, offering views of the nearby Torre Agbar and Sagrada Familia. It also features free WiFi, a gym and a spa with a Turkish bath.

The bright rooms of Hotel Atenas Barcelona have simple décor with wooden flooring. Each has air conditioning, a mini fridge with complimentary water, and satellite TV.

The hotel's buffet breakfast features a show kitchen. There is a snack bar and guests can enjoy stunning city views from the pool, set on the 11th floor.

The Sagrada Familia is just over one kilometre from the hotel, while Glòries shopping centre can be reached in 15 minutes by foot.

The Catalonia Atenas has a convenient left luggage service, on-site parking, and is 2 minutes’ walk from Clot Metro Station; and 200 metres from Clot Train Station; here you can take a direct train to Barcelona Airport.

Situated in a residential area of Barcelona, Artlifebcn Apartment offers stylish, air-conditioned apartment with furnished private terrace. Free WiFi is available.

The heated apartment include a spacious living area with a flat-screen TV. Complete with a dishwasher, the open-plan kitchen includes an oven and washing machine.

Bedrooms feature modern décor, and the apartment has 2 bathrooms with a bath or shower and a hairdryer.

Mercat de Sants, with fresh local products, can be found within 10 minutes' walk of the property. Barcelona Fira Conference Centre is a 20-minute walk away.

Mercat Nou Metro Station is a 5-minute walk from the apartment, and Sants Train Station can be reached in 10 minutes on foot. Plaza España is a 15-minute walk, and a 15-minute metro ride takes you to Plaza Cataluña Square in central Barcelona.

Hotel Transit is just 3 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Sants, the city’s main AVE Train Station. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property.

Rooms feature a flat-screen satellite TV, central heating and central air conditioning. Some rooms overlook an interior patio. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries, shower, and hairdryer.

There are vending machines on-site for coffee, drinks and snacks. Several bars and restaurants can be found a short walk from the Transit Hotel.

You can reach Plaza Catalunya and La Rambla in 10 minutes by bus or Metro, and Sants Estació Metro Station is 250 metres away. Plaza Espanya and the Magic Fountain are 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel.

Next to the modernistic Palau de la Música Catalana, Ola Living Music offers air-conditioned apartments with free safe and free Wi-Fi. Apartments are 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and Ramblas.

Featuring vaulted ceiling and traditional Catalan tiles, these apartments come with modern and functional furniture. They all have a fully equipped kitchenette including a microwave, and a washing machine, clothes dryer and iron facilities are also provided.

You can find some of the trendiest bars around beautiful Sant Pere Square and have fresh produce at Santa Caterina Market, just 350 metres away. There is also a plenty of shops and supermarkets open till late in the surrounding area.

Located in the Borne District of Barcelona, Ola Living Music is 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Cathedral. The closest metro station is Urquinaona, just 300 metres away.

Onix Liceo is next to Gaudi’s Palau Guell, 300 metres from Liceo Metro Station on Barcelona’s Ramblas. This stylish hotel offers a sun terrace and free Wi-Fi access.

The Onix is a design hotel with modern art in its public spaces. There is also a lounge and a business centre.

Free water, coffe and tea are available 24 hours a day.

All air-conditioned rooms at the Onix are spacious and elegant. They have a minibar and LCD satellite TV. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer.

You can hire a car or bicycle from the hotel tour desk. There is a 24-hour reception and a laundry service.

Please, be aware that swimming pool is not heated and will be opened from April to October.

These apartments can be found in Barcelona's Born area, close to the Picasso Museum. They have free Wi-Fi.

The apartments have heating and air conditioning.

Bedrooms have an en-suite bathroom with a shower. The kitchen has a fridge, microwave and hob. There's a terrace.

Bicycle rental is available.

Staff at reception can organise your trip to Barcelona. Barceloneta with its seafront bars and restaurants is just a 10-minute away from the property. The Ramblas is also nearby.

El hotel boutique Casa Llimona está situado en la planta principal de un antiguo palacete construido en 1890. Recién reformado con total detalle se ha mantenido intacto el encanto de la época y con exquisito gusto se han seleccionado los muebles y materiales nuevos.

Todas las habitaciones están equipadas con aire acondicionado, TV de pantalla plana, ventanas de doble acristalamiento, baño privado con bañera o ducha, secador de pelo y caja fuerte.

La recepción está disponible las 24 horas, y se ofrece un ligero desayuno de 8h a 10h todas las mañanas.

El hotel boutique Casa Llimona está muy bien ubicado, a tan sólo a 8 minutos a pie de la Casa Batlló y a 10 minutos a pie de la plaza Cataluña y las Ramblas.

Se ofrece WiFi de alta velocidad gratuita en todas las zonas.

Pension Ciudadela guest house is opposite Barcelona’s França Train Station and 100 metres from Ciudadela Park. It offers basic air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi, and private bathroom facilities.

All rooms at the Ciudadela are heated, and there is a TV. Most rooms have a work desk and a private balcony.

The central location means there are many bars and restaurants within a short walk.

Barcelona’s Born district is 100 metres away, and Barceloneta Beach is a 10-minute walk away.

Hostal Alogar is located 5 minutes’ walk from the Corte Inglés Shopping Centre in Barcelona’s Sant Gervasi district. It offers comfortable, good-value rooms and a car rental service.

Guests at the Alogar can make use of the communal kitchen with a hob, microwave and TV. Each room is allocated a different cupboard. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas and rooms.

Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona.

Muntaner Metro Station is 5 minutes’ walk away and from here you can get to Plaza Catalunya in 10 minutes. There are also several bus stops within a 5-minute walk.

Onix Fira offers a small rooftop pool which is opened from April to October and is not heated, private parking and soundproofed rooms in Barcelona’s centre, overlooking Joan Miró Park. Lively Plaza Espanya is 200 metres away and offers a direct connection to Ramblas.

All of the spacious rooms in the Onix Fira come with free Wi-Fi, a modern décor and a private bathroom. They include a safe, minibar and telephone.

A number of restaurants and bars can be found within a 15-minute walk from the Onix Fira Hotel.

Montjuïc and the Magic Fountains are less than a 10 minutes’ walk away from Fira. The airport bus and Fira Exhibition Centre are 200 metres away.

Please, be aware that swimming pool is not heated and will be opened from April to October.

Situated above Barcelona Sants Train Station, Barceló Sants offers a subtle outer space theme throughout. Minimalist rooms feature free Wi-Fi, rain showers, and large windows with city views.

Air-conditioned rooms feature modern décor and designer furniture. Each has an iPod dock, flat-screen TV, and tea and coffee making facilities. The bathroom comes with a hairdryer.

This design hotel includes a fitness centre.

The hotel has the Oxygen restaurant, where you can enjoy a delicious, complete and healthy breakfast buffet. It also has the Orbital Bar, the ideal space to disconnect from daily life; a fun and perfect place to have a delicious cocktail with your partner or to hang out and have a drink with colleagues after a long working day.

Sants Train and Metro Station offers direct access to Barcelona Airport, and the historic city centre, 3.5 km away. There are also high-speed AVE services to Madrid and international trains.

There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. On-site parking is available for an extra charge and the hotel has a Wi-Fi zone.

Exe Mitre enjoys a peaceful location in the San Gervasi district of Barcelona, 200 metres from Putxet Park. It offers spacious rooms with and free WiFi.

An extensive buffet breakfast is served, with hot and cold options. The friendly staff are happy to recommend restaurants and bars nearby.

The elegant rooms at Exe Mitre feature classic décor and come with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms also have a terrace with views over Mount Tibidabo.

Exe Mitre is just 15 minutes’ walk from Gaudi’s famous Park Guell. Putxet Metro Station is 200 metres away and connects with Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard in just 6 minutes. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are an 8-minute metro ride away.

A 5-minute walk from Las Ramblas and Drassanes Metro Station, Pensión Solárium is set in Barcelona’s Ciutat Vella district. It has a lounge and a small terrace, where free Wi-Fi is available.

Pensión Solárium has simple, modern décor. Its rooms have either private or shared bathroom facilities.

The Pensión is within 10 minutes’ walk of a range of cafes and bars. The Raval and nearby Gothic Quarter offer a selection of popular restaurants.

Barcelona’s old Port is 500 metres away, while the beaches around Barceloneta are a 20-minute bus journey from the Solárium. Airport buses leave from Plaza de Catalunya, 2 Metro stops from Drassanes Station.

Habitat Apartments Blanca offers bright, modern apartments situated a 10-minute walk from Parc de la Torrassa in Barcelona. The property features free WiFi and views of the city.

Each apartment here is air-conditioned and includes a full kitchen with an oven, kettle, microwave and dishwasher. They also boast a spacious seating area with a sofa and flat-screen TV.

Restaurants and bars are available within a 5-minute walk of the property. The popular Sants Estacio stadium is just 2 km away.

Bareclona’s “Ciutat Vella” historic centre can be reached in 15 minutes by car, while El Prat-Barcelona Airport is 10 km from Habitat Apartments Blanca.

Hotel Margot House Barcelona is located in Barcelona. This hotel is set in front of Casa Batlló, at number 46 in a residential building in the heart of Passeig de Gracia. Passeig de Gracia metro station is in front of the hotel and Sagrada Family is 3 metro stops away.

Each room at this hotel features modern décor and hardwood floors. They include a flat-screen TV, safe, air conditioning, and heating. The private bathroom comes with a bath or shower, hairdryer, slippers, and free toiletries.

The property has a 24-hour front desk and library. Laundry and dry cleaning services are available, and a shuttle to the airport can be arranged for an extra charge.

Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas Boulevard are less than 10 minutes away on foot.

Brummell Apartments Eixample Izquierda/Valeris features air-conditioned guest accommodation in Barcelona, 1 km from Passeig de Gracia, less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and a 13-minute walk from Plaça Catalunya. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

Each unit is equipped with a balcony, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, Boqueria Market and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Brummell Apartments Eixample Izquierda/Valeris.

This modern hotel offers spacious, air-conditioned suites with a separate seating area, private balcony, free WiFi and 2 TVs. The hotel is 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard.

There are several restaurants within a 5-minute walk from Guitard Grand Passage. Also, the hotel is only 500 metres from Hospital Clinic Metro Station.

There are good transport connections to Barcelona El Prat Airport from Passeig de Gràcia Metro Station, located around 15 minutes’ walk away.

Within 2 minutes’ walk of Gaudí’s Sagrada Família, these bright modern apartments feature a shared rooftop sun terrace and a small outdoor swimming pool with views of the city’s famous Basilica.

Sensation Sagrada Familia apartments feature a balcony and a living room with parquet floors and floor-to-ceiling windows. The modern kitchen is equipped with a hob, oven, coffee maker and dishwasher.

All Sensation Sagrada Familia apartments have free Wi-Fi. There is also a gym and sauna in the same building which can be used free of charge.

There are several cafés, bars and restaurants on the tree-lined Avinguda Gaudí Avenue, just 250 metres away. There are plenty of shops and supermarkets within walking distance, including Mercat Sagrada Família food market, 5 minutes’ walk away.

Sagrada Família metro station, with lines 2 and 5, is just 1 minute walk from the apartments. Line 2 will take visitors to the city centre in 15 minutes. The number 92 bus goes to Gaudí’s Parc Güell, and Barcelona's El Prat Airport is a 30-minute drive away.

Aparthotel Atenea Calabria is situated 200 metres from Rocafort Metro Station, a 10-minute walk from Plaza España Square. This aparthotel features spacious studios with free Wi-Fi, a well-equipped kitchenette and a flat-screen TV.

The Atenea’s studios are spacious and brightly decorated. Each has a seating area with satellite TV and sofa bed. The kitchenette comes with a fridge, microwave and coffee maker.

The Calabria offers a daily buffet breakfast. There are also a range of supermarkets, cafés and restaurants within walking distance of the aparthotel.

The Atenea Calabria is around a 20-minute walk from Sants Train and Bus Station. Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas are 3 Metro stops away from nearby Rocafort Metro Station.

This modern, eco-friendly hostel offers a terrace with city views and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. It is set 10 minutes’ walk from Nova Icaría Beach and the Olympic Port.

Rooms at Twentytu Hostel Barcelona are shared or private with a maximum of 4 beds and an en-suite bathroom. All include individual lockers and sheets. Towels can be rented at reception.

There is a communal kitchen, a chill-out lounge and dining areas. Various bars and shops are within 5 minutes’ walk and Razzmatazz nightclub is 200 metres away.

The property organises events, guided tours and activities and bike rental is available. Ciutadella Park is 10 minutes’ walk away and L’Auditori Theatre and Catalan National Theatre are 5 minutes’ walk away.

Twentytu Hostel Barcelona is 5 minutes’ walk from Marina Metro Station, 3 stops from Plaza Catalunya. Nord Bus Station is 10 minutes’ walk away.

For reservations of more than three nights or more than 7 people, special charges will apply, for this the hotel will contact you personally

Situated in the centre of Barcelona, Hostal Oliva features accommodation with free WiFi in a historic building. This sustainable guest house is located 200 metres from Passeig de Gracia and 100 metres from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The guest house has family rooms.

At the guest house, every unit is equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units at the guest house have air conditioning and a wardrobe.

Sightseeing tours are available around the property.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Casa Batllo, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Hostal Oliva.

Offering a fantastic location, right on the famous Ramblas, next to Plaza Cataluña Square and Barcelona’s main shopping area, this hotel features a 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi throughout.

Rooms at Hotel Toledano Ramblas include satellite TV , desk and a private bathroom. Some rooms have air conditioning.

This hotel is close to the Aerobus bus stop, which takes you to Barcelona International Airport. Plaza Cataluña or Liceu metro stations are less than 4 minutes’ walk of the hotel.

Numerous bars and restaurants serving national and international food can be found nearby.

The Barcelona City North Hostal offers value-for-money accommodation and free Wi-Fi. It is in the quiet Sarrià-Sant Gervasi area of Barcelona, with good access by car to the airport.

The rooms at the Barcelona City North are clean, heated and air conditioned. All come with a private bathroom, a TV and a kettle.

Guests at Barcelona City North Hostal have access to a common area with a microwave and fridge.

The hostel is within walking distance of the popular Gràcia neighbourhood and the Modernist buildings of the Eixample.

Nearby Lesseps Metro Station offers easy access to Vallcarca and the Parc Güell. Plaça Catalunya is only 3 stops away.

Located in central Barcelona, 200 metres from Tetuan Metro Station, Hotel Casa Bonay is a boutique hotel offering a shared terrace and free WiFi throughout. Plaça Catalunya is 10 minutes’ walk away.

Set in a 19th-century Neoclassical residential building, all rooms at Hotel Casa Bonay hotel are soundproofed and combine traditional features such as mosaic floors and modern textiles, lighting and furniture. They come with a minibar filled with local refreshments and snacks, complimentary WiFi, premium TV, selected magazines, air conditioning and ceiling fans in most rooms. The bathroom comes with natural soap from Mailin+Goetz. Some rooms include a sofa, a terrace or balcony.

Casa Bonay hotel also offers a dynamic and unique culinary experience. Guests will find a Satan’s Coffee Corner café and Bodega Bonay's cuisine on site.

The popular Passeig de Gracia Street, with shops and restaurants, is 700 metres away.  A 20-minute walk will take you to Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia. Barceloneta Beach is 4 metro stops away from Hotel Casa Bonay.

Located in central Barcelona, just 300 metres from Poble Sec and Sant Antoni metro stations, Apartment Eixample Comfort offers free WiFi, a patio and a balcony with city views.

This bright, air-conditioned apartment features wooden floors, exposed beams and classic-style décor. It has 1 large double room and 1 bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. The living room includes a sofa, flat-screen TV and dining table. The kitchen is fitted with a gas hob, electric kettle and microwave.

There are many cafés and bars in Parlmant Street and Paral•lel Avenue, with bars, theatres, supermarkets and restaurants is just 500 metres from the property.

A 15-minute metro ride will take you to Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia and Plaça Espanya, with direct buses to Barcelona Airport, is 15 minutes’ walk from Apartment Eixample Comfort.

SmartRoom Barcelona is an eco-friendly economy hotel located in central Barcelona, 1 km from Sants Train Station. Decorated in a modern style, each room here will provide you with a flat-screen Smart TV with satellite channels. This hotel has been awarded the Green Key for their sustainable and environmental friendly business.

The air-conditioned rooms have free WiFi access. Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with free toiletries. Extras include a desk and bed linen.

A buffet breakfast is available daily. Other facilities offered at the property include a vending machine with drinks and snacks. At SmartRoom Barcelona you will find a 24-hour front desk.

Plaza de Sants is 450 metres from SmartRoom Barcelona and Sants Train Station is 15 minutes' walk away. The hotel is 1.5 km from Camp Nou and Magic Fountain of Montjuïc. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 20 minutes' drive away.

Located in the centre of Barcelona, 1.3 km from Sant Miquel Beach, Private Room Gothic Quarter provides air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. This property is situated a short distance from attractions such as Plaça Reial, Santa Maria del Mar, and Picasso Museum. Certain rooms at the property include a balcony with a city view.

At the hostel each room is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near Private Room Gothic Quarter include Sant Sebastian Beach, Barceloneta Beach and Cathedral of Barcelona. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from the accommodation.

Situated 200 metres from Universitat Metro Station, Líbere Barcelona Sant Antoni offers stylish, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are a 7-minute walk away.

The Líbere Barcelona Sant Antoni is located on the edge of the lively Raval district, 350 metres from the MACBA Modern Art Museum. Direct buses to Barcelona Airport stop within 400 metres.

Rooms at this modern hotel have wooden floors and simple, elegant décor. Each room offers a bathroom with a hairdryer. Some rooms also have a private terrace.

Numerous bars and restaurants can be found in the surrounding streets.

Located in Barcelona, 2.3 km from Sagrada Familia and 3.6 km from La Pedrera, Flateli Navas A01 provides air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is set 4.4 km from Passeig de Gracia and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 4 km from Casa Batllo.

The apartment features 2 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 4.5 km from Flateli Navas A01, while Park Güell is 4.6 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 17 km from the accommodation.

BYPILLOW House offers air-conditioned rooms with balcony and free WiFi and private parking. The property is 300 metres from Maragall Metro Station connected to famous Sagrada Familia and o the popular sandy Barceloneta Beach in Barcelona.

Fitted with wooden floor, bright rooms have an en suite bathroom with free toiletries and bath or shower. Suites come with 2 separate areas with 2 double beds.

Buses to the city centre leave from a bus station located 200 metres away. Plaza Catalunya is 30 minutes by public transports and you can reach fashionable Passeig de Gracia in 20 minutes by metro.

These bright modern apartments each have a furnished terrace with excellent views over the sea or Barcelona’s Hospital de Sant Pau, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Sant Pau Terraces Apartments also come with free Wi-Fi.

Apartments have an integrated heating and cooling system. The living room includes a sofa, flat-screen TV and DVD player. There is a dining table and a kitchenette with a washing machine, fridge, microwave and coffee maker. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and shower.

You will find lots of shops and restaurants along Avenida Gaudi, which starts next to the apartments. You can stroll along this avenue to the Sagrada Familia in 10 minutes. From Sant Pau/Dos de Maig Metro Station, 2 minutes’ walk away, you can reach central Barcelona in 10 minutes.

Set just 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia in Barcelona, Aspasios Garden Apartments offers a getaway with a garden, outdoor pool, free WiFi, and a lift. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. The property is 800 metres from Casa Batllo, and within 1.3 km of the city centre.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Pedrera, Plaça Catalunya and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Aspasios Garden Apartments.

Well set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Rooms Nueva Valencia is located 800 metres from Sants Railway Station, 1.3 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 2.2 km from Casa Batllo. This bed and breakfast provides air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi. Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.6 km from the bed and breakfast and La Pedrera is 2.8 km away.

A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a kettle. The units include a shared bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen.

Passeig de Gracia is 2.5 km from the bed and breakfast, while Plaça Catalunya is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Rooms Nueva Valencia.

Set in Barcelona in the Catalonia Region, 200 metres from Plaza Reial, May Ramblas Hotel boasts a sun terrace and views of the city. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. All rooms have a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property.

La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 400 metres from May Ramblas Hotel, while Portal de l'Angel is 500 metres away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Descriptions: 4 beds (2 singles, 1 sofa bed, 1 large double)
Full_Descriptions:
Featuring free WiFi,  Radas is set in Barcelona, 500 metres from Montjuïc. Palau Sant Jordi is 1.3 km away and Fira Barcelona is a 13-minute walk away.

The apartment features a seating-dining area with a satellite flat-screen TV, CD and DVD player. All units include a kitchen fitted with a dishwasher, electric kettle, ceramic hob and oven. A microwave, a toaster and refrigerator are also offered, as well as a coffee machine. Some apartments have a terrace, balcony or chill out area.

Radas offers two-bedroom and one-bedroom apartments. They are equipped with a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Bed linen and towels are provided. Each apartment has a climate control system.

Plaza Reial is 1.5 km from Radas, while Plaça Catalunya is 1.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 11 km from Radas, which you can reach by public transport from a bus stop 500 metres from the property.

This modern aparthotel is located just off Diagonal Avenue, 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona FC’s Camp Nou Stadium. It offers large rooms with free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a kitchen.

The elegant rooms at Aparthotel Atenea Barcelona are equipped with carpeted floors and air conditioning. Each one has a seating area with a sofa, as well as a kitchen with a fridge and 2 electric hobs.

The hotel’s restaurant offers a breakfast-to-go box for a surcharge, and serves healthy food for lunch and dinner. There is also a lounge bar, where guests can relax while having a glass of cava or a soft drink.

Les Corts Metro Station is just a 3 minutes’ walk away. Sants Train Station is only 2 Metro stops from Atenea. Barcelona’s main tourist attractions can be reached within 15 minutes by Metro.

Located 1.2 km from Sants Railway Station, Apartamentos Barcelona - Iberia offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a dining area, a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.6 km from the apartment, while Camp Nou is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 10 km from Apartamentos Barcelona - Iberia.

This stylish design hotel is situated in the centre of Barcelona, less than 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya. The chic rooms include free WiFi.

Rooms at the Petit Palace Museum feature a contemporary bathroom with a hydromassage shower and hairdryer.

Bicycles can be hired for free at the Petit Palace, subject to availability. Bus tours can be organised for guests. The exclusive Paseo de Gracia Boulevard is 200 metres away with its many shops, restaurants and bars.

A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel’s restaurant. There is also a bar where guests can enjoy cocktails.

Featuring a rooftop swimming pool, Mercer Hotel Barcelona is set in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, within 10 minutes’ walk of Las Ramblas. This boutique hotel is set in one of the city’s ancient buildings, next to the Roman walls.

The stylish rooms at Mercer Hotel Barcelona have chic décor with original beamed ceilings and exposed brick walls. There is free Wi-Fi, air conditioning and flat-screen satellite TV. The bathroom has a rain-effect shower.

The hotel features an interior courtyard with orange trees. There is also a poolside bar and a terrace with loungers.

Several cafés, bars and restaurants can be found in the charming, winding streets and pretty squares surrounding the hotel.

Jaume I Metro Station is just 5 minutes’ walk from the Mercer. The trendy Born district is approximately 300 metres away, while Barcelona Cathedral can be reached in 5 minutes by foot.

Hotels: NH Collection Barcelona Gran Hotel Calderon
Full_Descriptions:
The elegant NH Collection Barcelona Gran Hotel Calderón has an excellent location just off Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard in central Barcelona. It has fitness centre and a year-round free rooftop pool with spectacular city views.

The air-conditioned rooms at the NH Collection Barcelona Gran Hotel Calderón feature free WiFi, a Nespresso machine and a private bathroom with a rain-effect shower and professional hairdryer.

Room service is also available 24 hours and the Eleven Bar serves cocktails and light snacks.

The breakfast buffet has a variety of high antioxidant dishes and a fresh juice corner. Breakfast can also be requested in your room, and a light early breakfast is available.

Staff in the Guest Relations department can help you throughout your stay and advise you on what to see and do in Barcelona.

The hotel is just one block away from Gaudí’s famous Casa Batlló. You can walk to the city’s Gothic Quarter in about 10 minutes.

Located in Barcelona, 3.6 km from La Pedrera and 4 km from Casa Batllo, Flateli Navas D01 offers air conditioning. It is situated 4.4 km from Passeig de Gracia and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sagrada Familia is 2.3 km away.

The 2-bedroom apartment comes with a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 4.5 km from the apartment, while Park Güell is 4.6 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 17 km from Flateli Navas D01.

Room Mate Gerard in Barcelona provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre.

It boasts a sun terrace and location, set in the Eixample district, near attractions such as Tivoli Theatre and within 700 metres of Portal de l'Angel.

At the hotel all rooms offer a simple yet elegant décor. They come with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. Air-conditioning is featured, and certain rooms include a balcony. All units include a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property.

Speaking English and Spanish, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help you plan your stay. Other facilities include portable WiFi.

Plaça Catalunya is a 9-minute walk from the accommodation. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Exe Ramblas Boquería is situated right on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, next to La Boquería Market. The stylish, air-conditioned rooms offer free WiFi, flat-screen satellite TV and a private balcony.

Exe Ramblas Boquería features elegant modern décor, with hardwood floors and designer furniture. The soundproofed rooms have views of Las Ramblas or the colourful Boqueria Market.

A varied buffet breakfast is served in the Exe Ramblas Boquería’s bright dining room. The Boquería is an ideal place to sample typical tapas and fresh fruit, while numerous restaurants and bars can be found nearby.

Barcelona Cathedral and Plaça Catalunya are both within 400 metres of the hotel. Liceu Metro Station is just 100 metres away.

Offering free WiFi throughout the property, Hotel Boutique Hostemplo is located on a pedestrian street just 100 metres from Barcelona's Sagrada Familia. The hotel has a friendly and very peaceful atmosphere.

Each room comes with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. You will find a kettle in the room. Every room comes with a private bathroom equipped with a shower. For your comfort, you will find a hairdryer and toiletries.

The surroundings are full of bars, restaurants and shops, like the F.C. Barcelona Museum. Las Glorias Shopping Centre is a 10-minute walk away. Gaudí’s Pedrera and Casa Batlló are 10 minutes' walk away. Sagrada Familia Metro Station, located 2 minutes' walk away, connects you with the city centre in 7 minutes, offering easy access to Plaza Catalunya, the Ramblas and the beach.

You can buy discounted tickets for the tourist bus, which stops 100 metres from the hotel.

The buffet breakfast with homemade pastries, local products and freshly squeezed natural orange juice is served daily in our café from 08:00 to 10:30.

Offering free Wi-Fi and a shared outdoor pool, these modern apartments are located between Gracia and Sant Gervasi Districts. Diagonal and Passeig de Gracia avenues are 10 minutes’ walk away.

Enjoybcn Patio de Gracia Apartments features 1 or 2-bedroom apartments as well as duplex apartments.

Each air-conditioned apartment offers modern-style furniture and has a living-dining area with sofa and flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

Numerous bars and restaurants serving national and international food can be found nearby. Gracia District is also known for its small shops and trendy cafés.

Fontana metro station is less than 5 minutes’ walk of the apartments and Gracia train station is 80 metres away.

Situated in Barcelona, 3.6 km from La Pedrera and 4 km from Casa Batllo, Flateli Navas D02 offers air conditioning. It is set 4.4 km from Passeig de Gracia and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sagrada Familia is 2.3 km away.

The apartment features 2 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 4.5 km from Flateli Navas D02, while Park Güell is 4.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 17 km from the accommodation.

Within 50 metres of La Pedrera and Diagonal Metro Station, Hotel Royal Passeig de Gracia features a terrace bar with panoramic views of Barcelona. This 4-star hotel also has an interior garden.

Hotel Royal Passeig de Gracia is set in a restored building with contemporary architecture. The smart bedrooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi and a bathroom with a rain-effect shower.

Casa Batlló is just 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel, while Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are 2 stops from Diagonal Station.

The Gràcia district is within a 5-minute walk, and charming street cafés can be found along the tree-lined Rambla de Catalunya, 200 metres away.

2.9 km from Sant Miquel Beach, Casa Vaganto is set in Barcelona and offers free WiFi, concierge services and express check-in and check-out. The property is close to Tivoli Theatre, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Portal de l'Angel. The property is allergy-free and is located 1.6 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Casa Vaganto every room has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Santa Maria del Mar, Plaça Catalunya and Boqueria Market. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Casa Vaganto.

Right in the centre of Barcelona, situated within a short distance of Somorrostro Beach and Picasso Museum, Top Location Apartment offers free WiFi and household amenities such as a microwave and kettle. The apartment is 400 metres from Cathedral of Barcelona.

The apartment has Towels and bed linen are available in this accommodation.

Popular points of interest near Top Location Apartment include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Passeig de Gracia and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

Just off the famous Las Ramblas, Aspasios Plaza Real Apartments offers air-conditioned studios with balconies overlooking the street. La Boqueria Market and Liceu Opera House are a 2-minute walk away.

Each studio has smart wooden floors and functional décor. Studios are divided into a sleeping area and a living-dining area with a TV and DVD player. Free WiFi and International channels are available in all apartments.

You can prepare meals in the well-equipped kitchenette, which features an oven, hob, kettle and microwave. There is also a dishwasher and a washer.

Aspasios Plaza Real Apartments is ideally located in the Gothic Quarter, next to lively Plaça Reial Square. Barcelona Cathedral and the town hall are a 5-minute walk away. Liceu Metro Station is 150 metres away.

Set in Barcelona’s stylish Eixample district, Barcelo Hostel offers air-conditioned dormitory rooms with free Wi-Fi. Located 600 metres from Passeig de Gracia, the hostel features a terrace, 24-hour reception and shared kitchens.

Each bright dormitory has bunk beds and lockers. There is access to shared bathrooms with showers and hairdryers. Bicycles are not allowed

Barcelo Hostel offers 2 shared kitchens, including a microwave, fridge and kitchenware. There are also 2 air-conditioned lounge areas with sofas and a TV. You can find a variety of shops, restaurants and bars within a 5-minute walk of the hostel.

Diagonal Metro Station is 500 metres from Barcelo Hostel and Plaza Catalunya is 2 stops away, on Line 3. Staff at the hostel can give you tourist information about the area.

Situated on the central, tree-lined Rambla Catalunya, this boutique hotel is set in a stunning 19th-century palace. It maintains authentic features such as Baroque-style columns and colourful ceramic floors.

The chic rooms at the Praktik Rambla feature a minimalist design and come with air conditioning. They also include free Wi-Fi and a private bathroom, decorated with striking green tiles.

The hotel offers a terrace with comfortable sofas where guests can relax. From June to September, free fruit juice is served on the terrace from 16:00 to 20:00 every day.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 200 metres away from the Praktik Rambla. Barcelona’s famous Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are a 5-minute walk away. The hotel is surrounded by restaurants, bars and shops.

Set in the lively Plaza Reial Square, My Adddress in Plaza Real offers air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi. Centrally located, apartments are 100 metres from Las Ramblas.

Featuring a modern décor, these heated apartments come with a lounge area with flat-screen TV and a well-equipped kitchenette including a microwave, fridge and kettle. Bed linen and towels are provided.

You can find fresh produce and traditional tapas bar in the nearby Boqueria Market, 450 metres away.  There are also a wide range of restaurants and shops open till late in the surrounding area.

My Adddress in Plaza Real are located in the Gothic Quarter, 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Cathedral. Well connected by public transport, the apartments are 300 metres from Liceu Metro Station.

Set in the heart of Barcelona, just 700 metres from Plaza Catalunya Square, TOC Hostel Barcelona offers an outdoor pool and a terrace.

The property offers private and shared rooms with air conditioning and heating. Some rooms have a flat-screen TV and some have a private bathroom. There is a shared TV area, kitchen and games room for guests to make use of.

TOC Hostel Barcelona also offers tourist information of the area and a ticket service. You will also find many bars, restaurants and supermarkets in the surrounding streets.

Metro Universtitat is a 2-minute walk from the property and a 25-minute metro ride will take you to Barceloneta Beach. Sagrada Familia is 10 minutes’ metro ride away.

Smartr Barcelona Ramblas offers accommodation in Barcelona. Plaza Reial is 100 metres from the property.

There is a seating and/or dining area in some units. There is also a kitchen in some of the units, equipped with a refrigerator.

La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 600 metres from Smartr Barcelona Ramblas, while Portal de l'Angel is 700 metres away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Smartr Barcelona Ramblas.

In the centre of Barcelona’s famous Modernist district, this sophisticated hotel is an ideal base for your discovery of the city’s famous shops and stylish bars – enjoy views of Gaudí’s architecture.

Relax in the calm interiors of the Actual’s rooms. Surf the web on the free wireless provided and watch your favourite shows on the LCD screen.

Prepare for the day ahead with a fantastic buffet breakfast served in the Hotel Actual’s cafe. Here, you can later enjoy a refreshing drink in the bar area. You can also rest your legs in the stylish lounge and chat to other guests while you help yourself to complementary hot drinks.

The Actual has been carefully designed to harmonise with the beautiful architecture of its surroundings. Admire a balance of old and new. You can enjoy sleek, modern furniture and contemporary design which features dark wood and glass details. This is cleverly contrasted against traditional, Belle Époque fixtures in the ceilings.

Set within a 10-minute walk of La Pedrera in Barcelona, No 23 - The Streets Apartments Barcelona offers apartments in a same building with free WiFi.

Every unit has a well-equipped kitchen or kitchenette completed with an oven; while the bathroom has a shower. There is a washing machine, and bed linen and towels are provided.

Fresh produces can be found at the market located 700 metres away; and trendy bars, restaurants and shops are on the many surrounding public squares.

A 10-minute metro ride will take you to Plaza Catalunya and Ramblas.

Suite Gracia Barcelona features a balcony and is located in Barcelona, within just 1.3 km of Casa Batllo and 1.6 km of Passeig de Gracia. Featuring a terrace, the apartment is close to several noted attractions, around 1.6 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 1.4 km from Sagrada Familia and 1.7 km from Tivoli Theatre. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and La Pedrera is 800 metres away.

The apartment comes with 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer and free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 2.1 km from Suite Gracia Barcelona, while Portal de l'Angel is 2.2 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

These studio apartments are located next to the Picasso Museum, Santa Caterina Market and in the heart of the bohemian Born and Gothic Quarter. They offer free Wi-Fi.

Apartments in Barcelona Corders are housed in a refurbished building, with a private lift to each apartment. Each stylish studio is decorated in light colours, using traditional materials such as stone and wood. Each studio has a small kitchen corner with a fridge and a hob or microwave.

The local district of the Born has a wealth of bars, restaurants and nightlife from which to choose. From the Corders apartments you can also walk to Las Ramblas, Barcelona Port and Barcelona Beach.

Plaza Goya Rooms is located in the centre of Barcelona and a few minutes’ walk from the Las Ramblas. It features free WiFi and free luggage storage.

Rooms at Plaza Goya Rooms are air conditioned and include a flat-screen TV and safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have a balcony.

You can find several restaurants, bars, and a grocery shop within a 5-minute walk of Plaza Goya Rooms. Universitat Metro Station is 50 metres away, and Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia is 4 metro stops away. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are 700 metres from the property.

Featuring stylish accommodation, Apartments Gaudi Barcelona are set in the charming Gràcia district, just a 10-minute walk to Gaudi´s Sagrada Familia.

Each studio and apartment at the Gaudi Barcelona has charming décor. There is either a kitchen or a kitchenette with a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. Seating areas come with a flat-screen TV.

There is a selection of shops in the streets around Apartments Gaudi Barcelona. Gràcia has a range of cafés, bars and restaurants.

Passeig de Gràcia is a 10-minute walk away, while Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló are both within 1.5 km of the apartments. Las Ramblas can be reached in 10 minutes by Metro.


Please note that this property offers apartments in different locations around Barcelona, near the Gracia district. Check-in takes place directly at your apartment. Please see the individual apartment descriptions for the address and more details.

Arrivo Apartments is located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 2.9 km from Passeig de Gracia, 3 km from Palau Sant Jordi and 3 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. It is set 700 metres from Sants Railway Station and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 3 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Plaça Catalunya is 3.3 km from the apartment, while Casa Batllo is 3.4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Arrivo Apartments.

Ideally located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Sweet Inn - Sepulveda is located 1.3 km from Plaça Catalunya, 1.4 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 1.3 km from Boqueria Market. It is set 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.6 km away.

Each unit comes with a sofa, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a well-fitted kitchen with a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Casa Batllo and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Sweet Inn - Sepulveda.

Boasting a garden and free WiFi, Limonaia is set in Barcelona, 100 metres from La Pedrera and 600 metres from Casa Batllo. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and organising tours for guests.

All rooms have a contemporary décor and come with air conditioning, free WiFi, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a wardrobe. At the hotel all rooms are fitted with a private bathroom with free toiletries.

Popular points of interest near Limonaia include Passeig de Gracia, Tivoli Theatre and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

Featuring 3-star accommodation, H10 Raco del Pi is set in Barcelona, 2.2 km from Sant Sebastian Beach and 2.2 km from Somorrostro Beach. With a terrace, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is 400 metres from the city centre and 2.1 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

At the hotel, all rooms come with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. Every room includes a safety deposit box, while certain rooms will provide you with a balcony and others also provide guests with city views. At H10 Raco del Pi rooms include bed linen and towels.

A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation.

There is an on-site snack bar and guests can also make use of the business area. Staff speak English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk.

Popular points of interest near H10 Raco del Pi include Plaça Catalunya, Tivoli Theatre and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the hotel.

Hotels: Happy People Gaudi Sant Pau Apartments
Full_Descriptions:
Happy People Sagrada Familia Apartments offers air-conditioned apartments and studios with free WiFi. Accommodation is 5 minutes’ walk from Camp de l’Arpa Metro Station.

Both studios and apartments feature a living-dining room with air conditioning, a sofa, and a flat-screen TV, and a kitchenette including a microwave, dishwasher and fridge. Some rooms have ceiling fans. The modern bathroom has a hairdryer, and towels and bed linen are provided.

Several bars, restaurants and supermarkets can be found within 5 minutes’ walk. The property offers tours around the city, and airport shuttle service, available on request and for a surcharge.

Located in a residential area of the Eixample District, the property is 15 minutes’ walk from Sagrada Familia. You can reach Plaza Catalunya and Ramblas in 30 minutes by public transport. Sant Pau Hospital, a spectacular example of modernist architecture, can be reached in 5 minutes on foot.

With a small rooftop pool offering great views over Barcelona, Andante Hotel is centrally located 350 metres from Drassanes Metro Station and La Rambla. It offers free Wi-Fi and a gym.

Modern air-conditioned rooms feature parquet floors, a laptop safe and flat-screen satellite TV. The bathroom comes with a full-length mirror and a high-powered hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast with show cooking is available. A gluten-free breakfast is available upon request. There is a self-service area with a microwave and vending machines for drinks, sandwiches and snacks, as well as a large terrace.

You can hire a car from the tour desk and a private shuttle from and to Barcelona El Prat Airport is available on prior request at an extra cost. There is a luggage storage room and a laundry and ironing service are offered.

The rooftop terrace will be closed for maintenance from January 15, 2024, to January 25, 2024.

ApartEasy - Central Gracia Apartments features air-conditioned guest accommodation in Barcelona, 500 metres from La Pedrera, less than 1 km from Casa Batllo and a 16-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

All units include a seating area, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom, while some feature a terrace or a balcony. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near ApartEasy - Central Gracia Apartments include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 14 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Situated 200 metres from Barcelona’s Diagonal Avenue with its many shops and restaurants, Arenas offers modern rooms with TV.

A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel’s restaurant.

A public car park is situated 3 minutes away from the hotel.

Arenas Atiram is a 15-minute walk from the Camp Nou Football Stadium. Maria Cristina Metro Station is 200 metres away and L’Illa Shopping Centre is a 10-minute walk away.

Set within the World Trade Center building, this 5-star design hotel overlooks Barcelona’s port and is a 5-minute walk from La Rambla. It features a seasonal rooftop pool, a gym and a spacious terrace.

The Eurostars Grand Marina Hotel GL offers modern rooms with wooden flooring and warm-coloured fabrics. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a spacious work desk are featured in each room. A pillow menu is also available.

The chic Grand Marina restaurant serves Mediterranean meals prepared with seasonal ingredients, while the lobby bar features exotic cocktails and live music. In the mornings, a rich breakfast is served on the terrace, weather permitting.

The Marina GL's gym offers cardiovascular equipment and free weights. Massage services are available.

Drassanes Metro Station, providing links to the rest of the city, is just 500 metres from the hotel while Barcelona Airport is 15 km away.

Centrally located in the enchanting Gothic Quarter, close to Plaza Catalunya Square and the Ramblas, this fresh and modern hotel boasts designed rooms and a 24-hour coffee and drinks service in the smart lobby.

The Denit offers you the chance to enjoy fun and contemporary design. You will enjoy the soothing, calm ambience of the bedrooms created by the fresh mix of pale wood and white furnishings.

Sleep soundly in the Denit’s soundproofed rooms. They include free Wi-Fi, a plasma-screen TV and an iPod dock.

Start your day with a fantastic continental breakfast where the modern décor continues along with a tasty selection of cold dishes to prepare you for the busy day ahead.

Explore the vibrant city on foot, with most attractions just a short stroll form the Denit’s entrance. Soak up the Medieval atmosphere of the hotel’s immediate surroundings.

Happy People Ramblas Harbour Apartments is just 5 minutes’ walk from Parallel Metro Station. It offers stylish air-conditioned apartments in the Poble Sec neighbourhood, close to cafés, bars and restaurants.

Each bright, spacious, open-plan apartment at Happy People Ramblas Harbour has high ceilings with exposed wooden beams, tiled floors and stylish décor. The living area has a sofa and a kitchen area with microwave and fridge. Free Wi-Fi is included.

On the last floor of the buiding there is a rooftop with the views to the city and where you can also enjoy  the swimming pool.

You can walk to Las Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter in just 15 minutes.

Barcelona’s port and cruise terminal are within 15 minutes’ walk of the apartments. Buses to Barceloneta’s beaches stop nearby.

Apartments Barcelona Sagrada has air-conditioned guest accommodation in Barcelona, 2.9 km from Bogatell Beach, 600 metres from Sagrada Familia and 2.1 km from La Pedrera. It is situated 2.3 km from Casa Batllo and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 2.7 km away.

The apartment provides guests with a balcony, city views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit includes bed linen and towels.

Passeig de Gracia is 2.7 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Apartments Barcelona Sagrada.

Situated in Barcelona, 1.3 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 2 km from Palau Sant Jordi, Brummell Apartments Poble Sec offers a rooftop pool and air conditioning. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The apartment with a terrace and city views has 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Plaça Catalunya, Montjuïc and Boqueria Market. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Brummell Apartments Poble Sec.

Located just 35 metres from La Rambla, Hostal MiMi Las Ramblas in Barcelona offers free WiFi and 24-hour front desk. The guest house is 20 minutes’ walk from La Barceloneta Beach.

Wooden-floor rooms at Hostal MiMi Las Ramblas come with a wardrobe and a desk. The shared bathroom includes a shower, and guests can also enjoy a shared living room.

A wide range of bars and restaurants offering traditional Catalan and Spanish cuisine can be found in La Rambla, within 2 minutes’ walk of the guest house.

Plaza Catalunya is is 10 minutes’ walk from Hostal MiMi Las Ramblas and guests can enjoy a range of nightclubs in La Rambla. The closest metro Station is Liceu, 3 minutes’ walk from the property and Barcelona Port is 9 km away.

Located just 2 blocks from the Sagrada Familia, this hotel has a rooftop terrace overlooking Gaudí’s world-famous temple. It offers 24-hour reception and rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel Sagrada Familia feature parquet floors and modern furniture. They are equipped with a minibar and the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

Glòries Shopping Centre and Arc de Triomf are under 20 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Sagrada Familia Metro Station, located a 3-minute walk away, connects you with the city centre in 5 minutes.

Descriptions: 3 beds (1 single, 1 sofa bed, 1 large double)
Full_Descriptions:
Conveniently located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Ola Living Calabria is situated 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia, 1.8 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.4 km from Boqueria Market. It is set less than 1 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and offers a lift. Tivoli Theatre is 2.9 km away and Palau Sant Jordi is 3.2 km from the apartment.

Each unit is fitted with air conditioning, a private bathroom and a well-fitted kitchen including a dishwasher, oven, microwave and a toaster. The units have a coffee machine, a TV, a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while some rooms also offer a terrace. At the apartment complex, units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Portal de l'Angel, Cathedral of Barcelona and Montjuïc. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Ola Living Calabria.

Situated in Barcelona, 1.6 km from Sants Railway Station and 3.3 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Penthouse Camp Nou offers air conditioning. It is located 4.6 km from La Pedrera and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Camp Nou is 1.2 km away.

The apartment with a terrace and mountain views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

Casa Batllo is 4.7 km from Penthouse Camp Nou, while Palau Sant Jordi is 5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 11 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Hotels: AC Hotel Diagonal L'Illa by Marriott
Full_Descriptions:
AC Hotel Diagonal L´Illa offers accommodation in Barcelona, 1.8 km from Camp Nou. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurants,  paid parking located at commercial center.

Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel.

Every room at this hotel has plush bedding, a flat-screen TV and a spacious work desk. Every room includes a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Surrounded by lush gardens, the property is near many upscale boutiques and restaurants.

The Suite Bar is a modern, welcoming space on the hotel’s second floor. Its contemporary décor and lighting make it an ideal spot to enjoy a drink.

The Picasso Museum is 3.8 km from AC Hotel Diagonal L´Illa, while La Pedrera is 2.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 11 km away.

Gracia Apartments offer various apartments, all located in Barcelona's trendy Gràcia district, 750 metres from Gaudí's iconic Sagrada Família Basilica. These modern, air-conditioned apartments feature free WiFi.

Each apartment has stylish décor with parquet floors, while some apartments have a private terrace. The lounge has a sofa and flat-screen TV, and the kitchen includes an oven, hob, microwave and washing machine. There are 2 bathrooms, one with a bath and the other with a shower. A hairdryer, towels and bed linen are provided. The address of each apartment is provided in the descriptions of each one.

Information about what to see and do in the surrounding area is available, and you can walk to Hospital de Sant Pau, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, in 7 minutes.

Located 450 metres away, Joanic and Sagrada Família Metro Stations connect you with the rest of the city with ease.
