Seneca7 near paseo de gracia features air-conditioned guest accommodation in Barcelona, 500 metres from La Pedrera, less than 1 km from Casa Batllo and a 16-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The apartment has family rooms.

Each unit has a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with bath and a hair dryer. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Seneca7 near paseo de gracia.

Happy People Sagrada Familia Apartments is a self-catering accommodation located in Barcelona. Free WiFi access is available. The property is 55 metres from Sagrada Familia and 500 metres from Monumental.

The apartment will provide you with air conditioning and free amenities including italian coffee maker. Complete with a microwave, the dining area also has a refrigerator and kitchenware. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer.

At Happy People Sagrada Familia Apartments you will find a terrace.

If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out Tetuan (900 metres) and Estacio del Nord (1.1 km). Barcelona El Prat Airport is located 14 km from the property.

Descriptions: 4 beds (2 singles, 1 sofa bed, 1 large double)
Full_Descriptions:
Sant Pau Ramblas Apartments Serennia provides accommodation within less than 1 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. It is located 2.4 km from Sant Sebastian Beach and features a lift. The apartment features family rooms.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Some units include a terrace and/or a balcony with city views and an outdoor dining area. At the apartment complex, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Santa Maria del Mar and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Sant Pau Ramblas Apartments Serennia.

Fuster Apartments are just 150 metres from Diagonal Avenue and 15 minutes’ walk from Plaza de Catalunya. These stylish apartments are set in a Modernist building dating from 1905.

Fuster Apartments boast high ceilings and mosaic floors. Lounges include a plasma TV, DVD and CD player and sofa, while kitchens have a washing machine, dishwasher, oven and microwave. Some apartments also have balconies. Free Wi-Fi and air conditioning are included, and towels, bed linen and a hairdryer are provided.

There are several bars and restaurants within 5 minutes’ walk. Passeig de Gràcia, with its Gaudí buildings and exclusive shops, is 650 metres away.

The Sagrada Familia is 10 minutes’ walk from the Fuster Apartments. You can reach Ciutadella Park and Las Ramblas by foot in 20 minutes.

The properties are set 5 minutes’ walk from both Girona and Verdaguer Metro Stations. Nord Bus Station is 1.4 km away

Hotels: DO Plaça Reial powered by Sonder
Full_Descriptions:
Set on Plaza Reial and just off Las Ramblas, DO Plaça Reial powered by Sonder features a spa, a rooftop pool and stylish rooms. Bars and cafés can be found in the square and in the surrounding Gothic Quarter.

Each spacious, air-conditioned room offers a free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV and a free minibar.

In the mornings, the DO Plaça Reial offers a paid breakfast. Creative Mediterranean cuisine and tapas dishes are also served in the restaurant.

The hotel spa features a sauna.

The famous Boquería Market is just 5-minute walk away. Barcelona Cathedral, Liceu Metro and Plaza Catalunya are within 1 km of the hotel.

Hotel Regina is set in a historic 19th-century building, just 50 metres from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas. The hotel offers free high-speed WiFi and modern rooms.

The century-old hotel was founded in 1917 and features beautiful architecture, including its impressive art nouveau entrance.

The Hotel Regina’s spacious rooms come with air conditioning, central heating and satellite TV. There is free tea and coffee, a safe, work desk and minibar. The private bathroom includes ecological cosmetics and a hairdryer. Some rooms have a balcony.

A varied buffet breakfast with zero-kilometre and homemade products is served. There is also a bar and room service is offered all day from 07:00 to 00:00.

The Regina has a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera, on Passeig de Gràcia Avenue, are within a 10-minute walk away. Catalunya Metro and Train Station and the airport bus stop are within 5 minutes' walk.

Sensation Authentic Gracia is a self-catering accommodation located in Barcelona. Free WiFi access is available in all apartments. The property is a 10-minute walk from Gaudi's La Sagrada Familia.

Accommodation will provide you with a TV and air conditioning. There is a full kitchenette with a dishwasher and a microwave. Featuring a bath, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. All properties include a private balcony with chairs and tables. Bed linen and towels are provided.

Joanic Metro Station is a 5-minute walk away, and you can reach Plaça Catalunya and the centre in 15 minutes by metro. You can reach Gaudi's La Pedrera in 20 minutes by metro, and Barcelona-El Prat Airport is located 16 km away.

Hotel Del Comte is 100 metres from Barcelona's Urgell Metro Station and 15 minutes walk from the Rambla and Plaza Espanya. It offers modern rooms with free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The air-conditioned rooms at Del Comte feature parquet floors and smart design. Each one comes with a work desk and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

Staff at the Del Comte Hotel’s 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona.

There is a bus stop just 3 minutes’ walk from the Del Comte which provides transport connections to Barcelona El Prat Airport. It is only 2 stops on the Metro to Plaza Catalunya, Barcelona’s main square.

Offering inner courtyard views, Nordic Apartment II Sagrada Familia is an accommodation situated in Barcelona, 1 km from Sagrada Familia and 2.5 km from La Pedrera. Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The accommodation features a lift, and organising tours for guests.

The 2-bedroom apartment has a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Casa Batllo is 3 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 3.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from Nordic Apartment II Sagrada Familia.

3.5 km from La Pedrera, limehome Barcelona Carrer de Besalú 82 is set in Barcelona and provides free WiFi and express check-in and check-out. The property is around 3.6 km from Casa Batllo, 4 km from Passeig de Gracia and 4.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.8 km from Sagrada Familia.

All units in the hotel are fitted with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, guest rooms at limehome Barcelona Carrer de Besalú 82 have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms include a balcony. At the accommodation each room comes with bed linen and towels.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 4.4 km from limehome Barcelona Carrer de Besalú 82, while Tivoli Theatre is 4.4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from the hotel.

Enjoying from an ideal location right opposite the sea in Barcelona's Gothic Quarter, Serras Barcelona is a 5-star hotel with a rooftop infinity pool and with our Restaurant Informal by our Michelin Starred chef Marc Gascons . Free WiFi access is available.

Set in a historic building where the famous painter Pablo Picasso started his career in 1896, the hotel preserves the building's original façade. Luxurious services like airport pick-up, limousine, concierge and valet parking are standard in this hotel.

All stylish rooms at Serras are air conditioned and soundproofed, featuring a private balcony with views of Barcelona's Port Vell or Mercè Street in the Gothic Quarter. Each comes with state-of-the-art facilities such as a Smart HD TV, wireless sound system and bathrooms with bathrobes and slippers.

Featuring attractive sea views, guests can have a signature cocktail on the stylish lounge in the rooftop terrace, while listening to chill-out music. The mezzanine level in Serras Barcelona features a cosy library with bar, while the restaurant serves Catalan specialities and Mediterranean tapas. The restaurant opens for breakfast, lunch and dinner.

This boutique hotel is 10 minutes' walk from Picasso Museum and Estaciò de França Railway Station. Plaça Reial Square is 650 metres away, and Santa María del Mar Cathedral is 500 metres away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 minutes by car.

This design guest house has an excellent location just 200 metres from Gaudí’s world-famous Sagrada Familia. There is free Wi-Fi throughout.

Rooms and apartments at Hostemplo Sagrada Familia are bright and have modern design. They have a flat-screen TV with DVD player and air conditioning. All rooms have a private bathroom.

Hostemplo Sagrada Familia rooms occupy all three floors of a historic modernist building, that preserves its original front. The interior is fully renovated. The suites are located in a new outbuilding.

A buffet breakfast with homemade pastries, local produce and freshly squeezed natural orange juice is served daily at Hotel Hostemplo, located 150 metres from the property.

The Tourist Bus passes the guest house and stops only 100 metres away. Tickets are conveniently available at reception. There is a metro station just 150 metres from the property.

There is 24-hour access to the building, as well as 24-hour reception.

This practical hotel is located 1 streets from Passeig de Gràcia, metres from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló. It offers simple rooms with free Wi-Fi.

The Barcelona City Hotel is situated within easy walking distance of the city’s famous Modernist buildings. These include La Pedrera and the Casa Amatller.

The surrounding streets are full of elegant boutiques and great restaurants. The shopping and touristic centre of La Rambla is a short stroll away.

There are many metro stations and buses near the Barcelona City. The tourist bus also stops on Passeig de Gràcia.

All rooms at the hotel are air conditioned and heated.

Centrally located, Ola Living Portaferrissa offers air-conditioned apartments and studios with free Wi-Fi and free safe. Accommodations are 100 metres from Ramblas and Plaza Catalunya is 5 minutes’ walk away.

Featuring modern and functional furniture each accommodation comes with a flat-screen cable TV and a fully equipped kitchenette including a coffee machine, microwave and oven. A washing machine, clothes dryer and iron facilities are also provided.

Ola Living Portaferrissa is surrounded by a wide range of bars, restaurant and traditional Spanish Granjas for a snack or a light meal. You can find fresh produce in La Boquería Market, 200 metres away.

You can walk to the Cathedral in 5 minutes from Ola Living Portaferrissa. Lively Plaza Reial is 400 metres away and Barcelona Museum of Contemporary Art is 7 minutes’ walk from accommodations. The closest metro station is Liceu, just 300 metres away.

Hotel L’Alguer Nou is situated just 500 metres from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium and 220 metres from Collblanc Metro Station. This family-run hotel offers a bar, lounge and 24-hour reception.

Rooms at the L’Alguer Nou Hotel are simple and functional, with tiled floors. Each room comes with a TV and a private bathroom. The rooms have air conditioning in summer and central heating in winter.

Hotel L’Alguer Nou serves a daily breakfast consisting of a buffet of cold and hot dishes.

Collblanc Metro Station takes you to Barcelona Aiport in 30 minutes. L'Alguer Nou is a 20-minute walk from the campus of Barcelona University. Sants Train Station is a 10-minute bus ride away, and regular bus services stop within 200 metres of the hotel.

This family-run, eco-friendly hotel is within 200 metres of Las Ramblas and Plaza Catalunya. All rooms are made of natural, organic materials and painted with PVC-free paint.

All rooms at Hostal Grau have a private bathroom with free toiletries made from natural sources such as lavender. Some rooms have a balcony; while others face a vertical garden.

The hotel also has one OFF room with a reduction of electromagnetic radiation; and the whole building boasts environmentally friendly design, energy efficient lighting and a water recycling system, as well as using renewable or clean energy.

As well as free natural teas and infusions, are available from the on-site lounge.

The MACBA Modern Art Museum is just 350 metres from the guest house, and Port Vell Harbour is a 15-minute walk away. Direct buses to Barcelona Airport stop in nearby Plaza Universitat.

This great selection of comfortable and cosy apartments has various locations in the area around Barcelona's Sagrada Família, each with convenient access to the excellent public transport network.

Each of the Barcelona4Seasons’ apartments is tastefully decorated and well-equipped with stylish furnishings. They provide the ideal setting for those who prefer the privacy and independence of apartment accommodation.

The apartments are located in different points of Barcelona – all a maximum of 10-15 minutes from the city centre. Each one enjoys easy access to public transport, allowing you to explore this cosmopolitan city.

Check availability for the exact location of each apartment.

Nuevo Balmes Habitaciones is set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 1.1 km from Plaça Catalunya, less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and a 7-minute walk from La Pedrera. It is situated less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia and features a shared kitchen. The property is 500 metres from Casa Batllo, and within less than 1 km of the city centre.

All units in the bed and breakfast are equipped with a kettle. With a shared bathroom fitted with a bidet and a hair dryer, units at the bed and breakfast also boast free WiFi. At the bed and breakfast, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Boqueria Market, Tivoli Theatre and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Nuevo Balmes Habitaciones.

ClassBedroom Gaudí Apartments offers stylish and modern self-catering apartments in Barcelona. Apartments are spread around the San Marti district.

With air conditioning, each apartment is equipped with a flat-screen TV and a kitchen with microwave and coffee machine. The private bathroom comes with a shower and hairdryer.

La Sagrera, Bac de Roda and San Marti Metro Stations are all within a 15-minute walk from Apartments VI ClassBedroom. San Marti Park is 1.5 km away.

Barcelona Princess Hotel is a 10-minute walk from the beach in the city’s Forum area. It offers wonderful views and a free gym. Free WiFi is available throughout.

All guests have free access to the 2 heated outdoor pools. The one on the 23rd floor offers spectacular sea views.

Rooms at Princess Barcelona are elegant and bright. Each has contemporary décor. All rooms have satellite TV.

The hotel has a Mediterranean restaurant and 2 stylish bars, including a relaxed poolside bar with panoramic views.

Princess Hotel Barcelona is set on Avenida Diagonal, next to Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre. The tour bus stops in front of the hotel and Maresme Forum Metro Station is 100 metres away. Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas can be reached in 15 minutes, by Metro.

Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace, One bedroom Apartment in Eixample! is set in Barcelona. It is located less than 1 km from Sants Railway Station and provides a lift. Casa Batllo is 2.9 km away and Camp Nou is 3.1 km from the apartment.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment offers a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 2 km from the apartment, while La Pedrera is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from One bedroom Apartment in Eixample!.

The Exe Cristal Palace is very well located next to the prestigious Passeig de Gràcia, the main shopping area and most important places of interest in Barcelona. All rooms at the Exe Cristal Palace have air conditioning, a safe, satellite TV, a minibar, a desk and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries.

Exe Cristal Palace rooms have a safe and a minibar and feature wooden floors. There is a work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

Exe Cristal Palace has a 24-hour front desk. You can hire a car from the tour desk, and on-site parking is available for an additional charge. The hotel serves a varied buffet breakfast, including a healthy corner option.

The buffet breakfast includes a wide variety of dishes and an area with juices and coffees.

The hotel is a 5-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and Casa Batlló.

Pensión San Ramón is located in Barcelona’s Raval district, just 350 metres from the Rambla. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen TV.

The guest house has vending machines for drinks, and there is a common area with a microwave for guests’ use. There are many restaurants and bars in the surrounding streets.

Staff at reception can provide information about what Barcelona has to offer. Pensión San Ramón is 5 minutes’ walk from the Sala Apolo Nightclub and Paral·lel Metro Station, which connects you with the rest of the city.

Descriptions: 4 beds (2 singles, 1 sofa bed, 1 large double)
Full_Descriptions:
Boasting air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony, Apartaments-Hotel Hispanos 7 Suiza is set in Barcelona. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a lift and luggage storage for guests.

The spacious aparthotel has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bidet. The unit has soundproofing and a bath. The aparthotel offers bed linen, towels and daily maid service.

A minimarket is available at the aparthotel.

Sightseeing tours are available within easy reach of the property. A car rental service is available at the aparthotel.

Popular points of interest near Apartaments-Hotel Hispanos 7 Suiza include Sagrada Familia, La Pedrera and Casa Batllo. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 15 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Habitat Apartments Bailén is a modern apartment located in Barcelona, 5 minutes' walk from Arc de Triomf and 280 metres from Tetuan Square. Free WiFi access is available.

The stylish, bright apartment features a furnished balcony and a living room with sofa bed, flat-screen TV and DVD player. The fully equipped kitchenette includes a dishwasher, while the bathroom has a hairdryer and a shower.

Bed linen and towels are included. There is a double bedroom and a twin bedroom.

Habitat Apartments Bailén is situated in a private building with lift. Transportation to El Prat Airport, located 18 km away, can be provided for an extra cost.

City sights like Barcelona Zoo or Ciutadella Park are within a 15-minute walk away.

Located in the Sant Martí district of Barcelona, Aspasios Poble Nou Apartments provides accommodation with a rooftop pool, free WiFi, a lift and a tour desk. The air-conditioned accommodation is 1.4 km from Bogatell Beach. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

Each unit comes with a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units have bed linen and towels.

Nova Icaria Beach is 1.5 km from the apartment, while Mar Bella Beach is 1.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from Aspasios Poble Nou Apartments.

Featuring free WiFi and two communal gardens with outdoor furniture, The Loft Hostel is located just a two-minute walk from La Pedrera.

Boasting a grand entrance hall with beautiful mosaic floor tiles, the property includes a well-equipped shared kitchen for guests. Free lockers, storage space, bed linen and blankets are provided. For a surcharge, guests may hire towels and make use of the laundry service.

There are many bars, supermarkets and restaurants around the property, and you can walk to Paseo de Gracia Boulevard and its designer boutiques in three minutes. The popular district of Gracia is 600 metres away.

The Loft Hostel is 400 metres from Diagonal Metro Station, and you can walk to La Sagrada Familia in 15 minutes. Plaça Catalunya is just a ten-minute metro ride away.

Please note that guests staying in rooms with shared bathroom have the option to rent towels with an extra fee.

Well situated in the Eixample district of Barcelona, By Rambla de Catalunya Rooms is located 1.2 km from Casa Batllo, 1.6 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.7 km from Plaça Catalunya. The property is situated 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 2.7 km from Boqueria Market and 1.8 km from Tivoli Theatre. The property is non-smoking and is set less than 1 km from La Pedrera.

With a shared bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the hostel also provide guests with free WiFi. The units at By Rambla de Catalunya Rooms feature air conditioning and a desk.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 3 km from the accommodation, while Portal de l'Angel is 3.1 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from By Rambla de Catalunya Rooms.

Offering free Wi-Fi, Be Barcelona Eixample Urquinaona II is located in Barcelona’s Eixample District, 600 metres from Plaça Catalunya. The property offers air-conditioned apartments with modern décor and private balcony.

Each 2-bedroom apartment has a living room with a sofa, flat-screen TV and DVD player. A ceramic hob, oven and washing machine are included in the kitchen. The bathroom comes with a bathtub and bidet.

A wide variety of bars, restaurants and supermarkets can be found in the area. The Mercat de Born food market is 10 minutes’ walk away.

The Ciutadella Park and the Gothic District can be reached within a 10-minute walk. Urquinaona Metro Station, 300 metres from the apartments, offers connection to La Barceloneta Beach and Barcelona Forum.

BacHome Barcelona B&B offers free Wi-Fi and features elegant rooms with street views. Paseo de Gracia, with its high end shops, restaurants and Gaudi's La Pedrera and Casa Batló, is just 200 metres from this bed and breakfast.

Featuring plenty of natural light and stylish décor, each air-conditioned bedroom comes with a seating area, flat-screen TV and a wardrobe. Fitted with parquet flooring, the spacious bedrooms also have heating. The modern bathrooms have a shower and they include a hairdryer and free toiletries.

BacHome Barcelona B&B has 24 hour coffee machine.

Gaudi's famous Sagrada Familia Cathedral can be reached by foot and it is 1.3 km away. Girona Metro Station, line 4, is a short 3 minutes' walk away. Plaza Cataluña Square and Las Ramblas Boulevard are about a 15-minute walk from the accommodation.

Barcelona Airport is a 25-minute drive away. Buses run regularly between Plaza Cataluña Square and the airport.

Hostal Argo is a modern guest house located Barcelona, 4 minutes' walk from Diagonal Avenue and 450 metres away from Passeig de Gràcia. Free Wi-Fi access is available.

Air-conditioned rooms at Argo feature stylish Minimalist décor in neutral tones. They feature parquet floors, a TV and a private bathroom with shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Bed linen and towels are included.

At Hostal Argo you will find a 24-hour front desk where luggage storage can be provided for free. An exclusive roof-top terrace with limited access is featured during summer season.

Modernist buildings like La Pedrera or Casa Batlló are 8 minutes on foot. Sagrada Familia Temple is 1 km away. The nearest metro station is Girona, 400 metres away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 20 minutes by car.

Situated opposite Paral·lel Metro Station, Stay Together Barcelona Apartments  offers stylish functional apartments with balconies, well-equipped kitchens and free Wi-Fi. La Rambla is just a 10-minute walk away.

Stay Together Barcelona Apartments are located in a restored corner building dating back to 1900. Each one is spacious and bright, with high ceilings and large windows.

All Stay Together apartments have a living area with an LED TV and 2 modern bathrooms. Kitchen facilities include a microwave, oven, ceramic hob and washing machine.

Various restaurants, cafés and convenience stores can be found directly outside the apartments, while the lively bars of the Raval district are just a 5-minute walk away. Barcelona Port is 800 metres away.

Ola Living Born offers accommodation within less than 1 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, a microwave and a toaster. It is set 1.4 km from Somorrostro Beach and features a lift. The property is close to popular attractions like Santa Maria del Mar, Plaça Reial and Picasso Museum.

The units in the apartment complex are equipped with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, all units at the apartment complex have a TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms also feature a terrace. At the apartment complex, units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Barceloneta Beach, Sant Miquel Beach and Cathedral of Barcelona. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Ola Living Born.

Set in a same building in the Eixample District, Lodging Apartments Eixample offers air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi. Sagrada Familia Cathedral is a 4-minute walking away.

Each apartment features a living room with a flat-screen cable TV; and a fully equipped kitchen or kitchenette. There is a washing machine, and cleaning products are also provided.

There are plenty of bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk of the apartments; and you can find fresh produces at a market located 600 metres away.

Lodging Apartments Eixample is well connected by public transport; the closest metro stations are Tetuan and Verdaguer, both 500 metres from apartments. Barcelona North Bus Station is within 10 minutes’ walk of Lodging Apartments Eixample.

The pictures at the top of this page are a selection of the different apartments located in a same building. Please select a date and click on the apartments to see the pictures of the individual apartments.

Featuring air conditioning, AB Paral·lel Spacious Apartments offers pet-friendly accommodation in Barcelona. Plaza Reial is 900 metres from the property.

Featuring a balcony, the accommodation comes with a dining area and seating area with a TV. All units include a kitchen equipped with a dishwasher and microwave. A toaster is also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. There is a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer in each unit. Towels and bed linen are featured.

AB Paral·lel Spacious Apartments also some of the apartments include a terrace

Montjuïc is 1.1 km from AB Paral·lel Spacious Apartments. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km.

Located 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Plaza Espanya Square, the air-conditioned apartments at Happy People Plaza España Apartments come with free Wi-Fi. The building has a rooftop chill-out terrace for all guests.

Bright and modern, the apartments feature a lounge with a flat-screen TV, and a kitchen with a dining area and microwave. Both apartments have 2 double rooms, 2 twin rooms and 2 bathrooms. Towels and bed linen are included.

Many restaurants, bars and shops can be found in the surrounding area. Hostafrancs Metro Station is 300 metres from the apartments and you can reach Plaza Catalunya in a 10-minute metro ride.

Barcelona Sants Train Station is a 5-minute walk from Happy People Plaza España Apartments and trains to Barcelona Airport leave from there.

Set in a charming 19th-century building, Anba Boutique is located 450 metres from central Barcelona's Plaza Catalunya. It offers elegant air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and private balconies.

Each room at Anba Boutique is decorated in stylish natural tones, and some have original hand-painted ceilings. Each one has Egyptian cotton sheets, a laptop safe, a minibar and flat-screen satellite TV. The bathroom includes a bathrobe, toiletries and a rain-effect shower.

The Anba Boutique serves á la carte breakfast with homemade products of seasonal local produce. There is also free tea and coffee at any time. There is also a terrace with a chill-out garden.

The Anba is just 400 metres from the beautiful Palau de la Musica Catalana, a UNESCO World Hertitage Site. You can walk to the famous Ramblas in 8 minutes. Urquinaona Metro Station is just outside the Anba Boutique, and buses to Barcelona Airport stop a 5-minute walk away.

A 10-minute walk from La Pedrera, Sonder l La Casa del Sol is situated in Barcelona and features rooms with free WiFi. Well set in the Gràcia district, this hotel offers rooms with balcony.

The units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with free-to-air channels. All rooms have a private bathroom.

Sonder l La Casa del Sol offers a beautiful sun terrace.

Speaking English, Spanish, French and Catalan.

Casa Batllo is 1.3 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Sonder l La Casa del Sol.

Housed in a reformed modernist building located in the centre of Barcelona, these apartments are ideal for enjoying a highly independent and relaxing break in the city.

MH Apartments Tetuan has a variety of apartments, all of which are spacious and charming in design. Relax in the tranquillity of this accommodation at the end of a long day of sightseeing or business in the city. The apartments boast free WiFi internet access and a TV with international channels.

The central location of these apartments means you can easily get around the city using the excellent public transport or on foot.

Situated in the charming Grácia neighborhood in Barcelona, Lodging Apartments Gracia offer free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV and heating. Gaudi’s famous Sagrada Familia is about 1.5 km away.

These modern departments with simple décor feature plenty of natural light and a spacious living-dining room. Each apartment has a kitchenette, microwave and coffee machine.

Fitted with parquet flooring, the bedrooms include a wardrobe. The private bathroom has a shower or bath tub. Bed linen and towels are provided.

Within walking distance from the apartments visitors will find a variety of restaurants, cinemas and shops. Joanic Metro Station is about 10 minutes’ walk away. Plaza Catalunya and the city centre are 4.4 km from the apartments.

Mambo Tango is a backpackers’ hostel located in Barcelona’s Poble Sec district, just 100 metres from Parallel Metro Station. It offers free daily activities and free Wi-Fi access.

Mambo Tango Hostel offers colourful dormitories and private rooms, all with air conditioning, heating and individual lockers.

You can prepare meals in the Mambo Tango’s shared kitchen, or enjoy a film in the TV lounge. The hotel’s free activities include photo exhibitions, music classes and city walks.

Staff can provide information on Barcelona’s many attractions, as well as help with ticket reservations and discounts. The property also organizes daily guided walking tours and night tours to bars and nightclubs. The famous Gaudí houses are within 15 minutes’ walk of the hostel.

Situated at the foot of Montjuïc Hill, the hostel is an ideal base for visiting Montjuïc Castle and the Magic Fountains. The lively Raval district is just a 5-minute walk away.

Set in a renovated modernist building, Close to Passeig de Gracia B&B is located in Barcelona. This bed and breakfast is located 150 metres from Girona Metro Station and offers free WiFi.

Fitted with tiled flooring and featuring high ceilings and large windows, this accommodation offers air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen TV, a seating area and a dining table.

Each room has 1 double bed and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a hairdryer, and shower.

Passeig de Gracia, famous for its luxury shops, is just 500 metres from Close to Passeig de Gracia B&B, and there are several shops and restaurants within a 5-minute walk of the property.

Gaudi's famous La Pedrera is 1 km from the property. Plaza Catalunya is 10 minutes away on foot.

Situated right on the corner of Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas, Hotel Monegal boasts a fantastic central location. It offers good-value rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV.

Staff at Hotel Monegal’s  can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona.
From the Monegal you can walk to Barcelona’s Gothic Cathedral and the modernist Palau de la Musica Auditorium in around 7 minutes. Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló are both within 20 minutes’ walk.

Buses to and from the airport leave from the other side of Plaza Catalunya, 200 metres away from the hotel.

Right in the centre of Barcelona, situated within a short distance of Passeig de Gracia and Plaça Catalunya, My Address in Sant Antoni offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as an oven and coffee machine. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station.

The spacious apartment has 2 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and dishwasher, and a living room with a flat-screen TV.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Tivoli Theatre and Casa Batllo. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 12 km from My Address in Sant Antoni, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Studio Hostel is set in the residential district of Sarrià, 50 metres from Reina Elisenda Metro Station. It offers free Wi-Fi, free breakfast, a roof terrace and rooms with private bathrooms.

Rooms at the Studio are brightly decorated. Each has heating and a desk.

The Albergue has a communal lounge with a TV and there is also a reading area. There are vending machines in the reception and guests can make use of the fridge, microwave and kettle in the shared area.

Set just off Passeig de la Bonanova, the hostel is within 10 minutes’ walk of a selection of restaurants, cafés and bars. The popular Gràcia district is just 5 train stops away.

Staff at the Studio’s 24-hour reception can provide information on Barcelona’s many tourist attractions. The city centre is 20 minutes from Reina Elisenda Station, and free on-street parking is available nearby.

Situated in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Park Güell and 3.3 km from La Pedrera, Unbeatable views and great location features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is located 4 km from Passeig de Gracia and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 3.6 km from Casa Batllo.

The spacious apartment has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with sea views. The property offers city views.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Barcelona, like cycling.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 4.1 km from Unbeatable views and great location, while Sagrada Familia is 4.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

Sonder l Vasanta is set in a 20th century neo-classical building, 200 metres from Urquinaona Metro Station. It offers chic, soundproofed rooms with free Wi-Fi and in some cases, a balcony or terrace.

Air-conditioned rooms feature modern design and include a flat-screen TV  and a private bathroom.

The Vasanta is a 4 minute walk from Passeig de Gracia and 400 metres away from Plaza Catalunya.

You can walk to Barcelona Cathedral, Las Ramblas and the Gothic and Born districts within 8 minutes. Hotel Vasanta is 20 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia.

Casa Gracia Apartments features air-conditioned guest accommodation in Barcelona, 300 metres from La Pedrera, less than 1 km from Casa Batllo and a 14-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. When staying at the apartment, guests can use private entrance.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom, while some feature a terrace or a balcony. At the apartment complex, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near Casa Gracia Apartments include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

Situated in Barcelona, 3 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 600 metres from Sagrada Familia, Sagrada Familia Gaudi features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is located 2 km from La Pedrera, 3 km from Passeig de Gracia and 3.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.6 km from Casa Batllo.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 3.4 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 3.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Sagrada Familia Gaudi.

Located 600 metres from Plaza Reial in Barcelona, Niu Barcelona Hotel features an outdoor pool on the rooftop. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property

Every room at this hotel comes with a flat-screen TV; while the private bathrooms come with shower and hairdryer. Rooms are air-conditioned in summer and heated in winter.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Guests benefit from a complimentary bottle of water upon arrival.

Portal de l'Angel is 800 metres from Niu Barcelona Hotel, while Plaça Catalunya is 900 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Niu Barcelona Hotel.

Located 50 metres from Las Ramblas and opposite Gaudí’s Palau Güell, Happy Apartments offers free Wi-Fi. Set in Barcelona’s Raval District, it features well-equipped apartments with stylish décor.

Each air-conditioned apartment at Happy Apartments has a spacious living room with a sofa, TV and DVD player. Kitchenettes come with an electric hob, fridge and kettle. Luggage storage is available free of charge, and towels and bed linen are included.

There is a selection of shops in the streets surrounding the apartments. You can find a range of bars, cafés and restaurants on Las Ramblas and the nearby Gothic quarter.

Liceu Metro Station is 400 metres from the property, and La Boquería Market is a 5-minute walk away. Buses to the airport depart from Plaza Cataluña Square, a 10-minute walk from the apartments. Paseo de Gracia Street, known for its exclusive boutiques and Gaudi's buildings, can be reached in around 20 minutes on foot.

Situated in Barcelona, in the Gracia district, 1 km from Park Güell, Sonder l Le Palacete features an interior garden and courtyard.

Rooms come with a flat-screen TV. Some units feature a seating area and a private terrace. You will find a coffee machine in the room. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom. Sonder l Le Palacete features free WiFi throughout the property. The property offers contact-free check-in and 24/7 virtual support which limits in-person interaction.

Sagrada Familia is 1.3 km from Sonder l Le Palacete, while La Pedrera is 1.4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Sonder l Le Palacete.

These stylish apartments close to the Torre Agbar and Glòries Metro station have free Wi-Fi and fully equipped kitchens.

The Barcelona City Apartments offer flexible accommodation for up to 4 people. They have TV and DVD player, and the kitchens have microwave, fridge, hob and washing machine. The apartments also have an iron, towels, and bed linen.

Barcelona City Apartment can be found close to Plaça de les Glòries, a transport hub in Barcelona. You have easy access to several Metro, bus and tram routes. You are only 10 minutes’ walk from the beach.

Coronado is conveniently situated 200 metres from Paral•lel Metro Station and 15 minutes’ from Barcelona’s famous Ramblas. It offers free Wi-Fi throughout and reception is open 24 hours a day.

Rooms at Coronado feature a simple design and come with a private bathroom. They also include air conditioning and heating.

Guests can enjoy drinks and snacks at the bar-cafeteria in the lobby area. There are also many bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk of the hotel.

The Magic Fountains in the Montjuic area are 15 minutes’ walk from Coronado while Barcelona’s port is 10 minutes away.

Meliá Barcelona Sarriá features a spa, a 24-hour gym and a restaurant. Gaudi’s major works, such as La Pedrera and Casa Battló are 2 km away. There is free WiFi available throughout.

The Melia Barcelona Sarriá’s rooms feature chic, contemporary décor with 42-inch TVs and bathrooms with marble finishing and baths or showers.

All Level Lounge Rooms offer superior services including exclusive private areas, a private reception area with personalized attention and 1 free access per stay to the on-site  Serena spa.

A welcoming international buffet breakfast, including gluten-free products and options and special dietary options, is served every morning. The Nonna Maria restaurant serves mediterranean and international cuisine.

The city’s upmarket Avenida Diagonal shopping avenue is just 1 block away; while Barcelona Camp Nou is within 10 minutes by car. Francesc Macià square is just 200 metres from the hotel and you can walk to the elegant Passeig de Gracia Boulevard in about 20 minutes.

Located in Barcelona within 2.9 km of Somorrostro Beach and 2.9 km of Nova Icaria Beach, Chic Apartments Barcelona provides accommodation with free WiFi, seating area and a kitchen. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment features family rooms.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a desk, a coffee machine, an oven, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, La Pedrera and Sagrada Familia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Chic Apartments Barcelona.

These bright and modern apartments are located in the quiet Sant Andreu district of Barcelona. They offer free Wi-Fi, and most have a balcony or terrace with city views.

The stylish Alguera Apartments feature cosy lounges with plasma TV, DVD player, sofa bed and dining area. Kitchens are fully equipped with a kettle, oven, microwave and hob.

There are several bars, restaurants and shops within 5 minutes’ walk of the apartments. La Maquinista Shopping Centre is 10 minutes’ walk away.

The apartments are 100 metres away from Sant Andreu Metro Station, connecting with Plaza Catalunya Square in 20 minutes. Buses to various locations around the city pass just 2 minutes’ walk away.

Alguera Apartments Sant Andreu are 10 minutes’ drive from the beach. You can walk to Sant Andreu Comtal Train Station in 5 minutes, connecting with Barcelona El Prat Airport in 35 minutes.

Hotels: My Space Barcelona Executive Apartments Center
Full_Descriptions:
These functional apartments are set in the Sarria district. They offer a spacious furnished balcony and free Wi-Fi, 5 minutes’ walk from Muntaner FGC Train Station.

These apartments feature modern décor and 1 double and 2 twin bedrooms. Lounge-diners have a spacious sofa and TV, while modern kitchens include a washing machine, dishwasher, oven and hob.

There are several bars, restaurants and shops within 5 minutes’ walk and the Galvany Market is 700 metres away. There are also a number of exclusive medical clinics within 5 minutes’ walk.

My Space Barcelona Executive Apartments have private parking for a fee and are 2 km from Park Guell. The historic centre is 3.5 km and you can catch a bus 100 metres away.  Muntaner FGC Train Station is 3 stops from Plaza Catalunya.

Set in Barcelona, 800 metres from Sants Railway Station and 1.1 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Loft Miro Apart Barcelona offers air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. The property is located 2.7 km from Passeig de Gracia, 2.8 km from Plaça Catalunya and 2.8 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.4 km from Casa Batllo.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bath. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

La Pedrera is 3 km from the apartment, while Boqueria Market is 3.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Loft Miro Apart Barcelona.

Located in Barcelona and with Mar Bella Beach reachable within 700 metres, Jacobs Inn Barcelona provides concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. The property is situated 700 metres from Bogatell Beach, less than 1 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach and 2.2 km from Somorrostro Beach. The accommodation features a shared kitchen, a tour desk and luggage storage for guests.

Guest rooms include bed linen.

Speaking Catalan, Czech, Greek and English at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help.

Barceloneta Beach is 2.8 km from the hostel, while Port Olimpic is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Jacobs Inn Barcelona.

Hotel España is situated in a 19th-century building in central Barcelona, within 100 metres of the Ramblas and Liceu Theatre and 200 metres from Boqueria Market. Its Mediterranean restaurant is run by famous chef Martín Berasategui. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout.

The stylish and elegant rooms include a flat-screen TV and air conditioning. They also come with a modern bathroom.

Hotel España offers a variety of drinks and cocktails at AlAire rooftop terrace bar. There is also a small swimming pool.

Liceu Metro Station is 100 metres away and the Gothic Quarter is less than 5 minutes’ walk away.

Sweet Inn - Avenida Roma has air-conditioned guest accommodation in Barcelona, 1.6 km from Sants Railway Station, 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.6 km from Plaça Catalunya. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Casa Batllo is 1.2 km away.

Each unit features a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with bidet and free toiletries. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, La Pedrera and Boqueria Market. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Sweet Inn - Avenida Roma.

Attractively set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Habitaciones acogedoras is located less than 1 km from Plaça Catalunya, a 7-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 1.4 km from Boqueria Market. It is situated 700 metres from Passeig de Gracia and features a shared kitchen. The property is less than 1 km from the city centre and a 3-minute walk from Casa Batllo.

All units in the bed and breakfast are equipped with a kettle. With a shared bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the bed and breakfast also boast free WiFi. At the bed and breakfast, every unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Tivoli Theatre, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Habitaciones acogedoras.

Boasting a terrace, Praktik Èssens is located in Barcelona and is 300 metres from Passeig de Gracia. The property is set 300 metres from Casa Batllo and 350 metres from Tivoli Theatre. The accommodation features free WiFi and an outdoor terrace, tea and coffee with free pastries corner and happy hour every day from 19:00 hours to 20:00 hours (free wines and snacks).

The rooms in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom, while certain rooms at Praktik Èssens also feature a seating area. All rooms have a desk.

Speaking English and Spanish, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the reception.

Plaça Catalunya is 500 metres from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from Praktik Èssens.

Set next to Rambla Catalunya Street, Ca La Maria Barcelona is centrally located in Barcelona. The bed & breakfast offers rooms in a stylish apartment with free Wi-Fi and air conditioning.

Featuring high ceilings and modern décor, each room has a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom comes with a shower and some of them also include a bathtub.

Guests have access to a large wooden sun terrace, including a garden and a covered area with a dining table. There is also a spacious shared lounge. A breakfast buffet is available, as well as a bar where guests can get drinks and snacks.

Gaudi’s Pedrera Building is only 5 minutes’ walk from the bed & breakfast. There is a large variety of bars and restaurants in the area. Guests can find Diagonal Metro Station 300 metres from the property and Plaça Catalunya is 2 metro stops away.

Located near the exclusive shopping avenue of Passeig de Gracia, these stylish apartments feature modern design, air conditioning and free Wi-Fi.

The Bonavista Apartments - Passeig de Gracia feature attractive wooden floors, plenty of natural light and contemporary furniture and artwork. Bed linen and towels are provided.

The well-equipped apartments feature spacious dining rooms and kitchens equipped with an oven, dishwasher and washing machine.

Nearby, in the Gracia District, there are many trendy bars and pleasant squares. Gaudí's La Pedrera and Casa Batlló can be visited on Passeig de Gracia.

Descriptions: 5 beds (3 singles, 1 sofa bed, 1 large double)
Full_Descriptions:
Rambla de Mar Apartments is designed to ensure you have a stay in Barcelona worthy of being remembered with your family or friends.

Newly renovated, well lit and equipped to make you feel at home, in Rambla de Mar you will get an excellent location and the freedom to organize your stay in the Catalan capital as it best suits you.

Let us share more with you: The spacious living room is equipped to spend the day to day with the greatest possible comfort, its kitchen will allow you to prepare from the simplest to the most sophisticated dish thanks to all its equipment, the rooms are designed for maximum relaxation and featuring a total of 2 private bathrooms per apartment.

Each spacious apartment at Rambla de Mar Apartments has free Wi-Fi, and a living room with a sofa bed, a TV and a dining area.

The entire common area is enabled for people with reduced mobility to move around. You will also have a common terrace/solarium for sunbathing.

The building is located next to the Ramblas, the Port Vell, the Palau Güell and the Liceo. The Cathedral and the Barceloneta beach can be reached on foot. The Drassanes stop on metro line 3 is less than a minute away; Plaça Catalunya is 2 metro stops away, Passeig de Gracia and Plaça Espanya are 4 stops away and Sants station is 6 stops away (among others).

Check in is from 16:00h and check out is from 09:00h to 11:30h.

We are a Pet Friendly apartment.

Set in Barcelona, 1.3 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia, Apartments Barcelona & Home Deco Viladomat offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is situated 1.6 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.5 km from Plaça Catalunya.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a toaster. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sants Railway Station, Boqueria Market and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 11 km from Apartments Barcelona & Home Deco Viladomat, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Habitat Apartments Barcelona Balconies is 10 minutes’ walk from Gaudi’s La Pedrera and from fashionable Passeig de Gracia. Diagonal Metro Station is 450 metres away and free WiFi is provided.

Housed in a modernist traditional Modernist building, the apartment comes with modern furnishing and parquet flooring. The kitchen is equipped with an oven, a dishwasher and kitchenware; while the bright living room comes with sofas and a flat-screen TV, and opens onto a balcony with city views.

There are plenty of bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk of the apartment.

A 10-minute train ride will take you to central Plaza Catalunya and Ramblas; Provença Train station is just 3 minutes’ walk away.

Located in Barcelona and within 600 metres of La Pedrera, Arc House Gracia features a shared lounge, non-smoking rooms, and free WiFi. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.7 km from Tivoli Theatre, 2 km from Sagrada Familia and 1.8 km from Plaça Catalunya. The accommodation provides a shared kitchen and a tour desk for guests.

Featuring a shared bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, certain rooms at the hostel also offer a city view.

Popular points of interest near Arc House Gracia include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

This family-run guest house is 500 metres from Barcelona’s Fira Exhibition Centre at Plaza España. It offers heated rooms with free Wi-Fi, 200 metres from Poble Sec Metro Station.

Spacious rooms at Hostal Elkano feature functional décor and a TV. Bathrooms are shared or private.

You will find numerous bars, restaurants and shops within 5 minutes’ walk. Sant Antoni Market is 500 metres away and the Arenas Shopping Centre, a former bullring, is 10 minutes’ walk away.

Elkano’s 24-hour reception offers tourist information. Montjuic Park, with the Olympic Stadium, its museums and outdoor swimming pools, is 10 minutes’ walk away.

The property is 10 minutes’ walk from the ferry port. Las Ramblas is 3 metro stops away and chic Passeig de Gracias, 5 stops away. You can catch a direct bus to Barcelona El Prat Airport from Plaza España.

Situated in Barcelona, 120 metres from Hostafrancs Metro Station, Habitat Apartments ADN offers air conditioning, heating, and free WiFi.

The apartments feature modern décor and include a living room with a sofa bed and flat-screen TV. Each also has a kitchen, equipped with a dishwasher, washing machine, and hob.

The apartments have 1 or 2 bedrooms, as well as a private bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. Toiletries, towels, and bed linen are provided.

Arenas Shopping Centre is 600 metres from the property and it includes a big supermarket and a number of rooftop restaurants with panoramic views of the city. Sants Train Station, where you can catch a train to the airport, is a 10-minute walk away.

Boasting a Burger Bar (consult schedules) and a Terrace., BCN Urbaness Hotels Bonavista is set in Barcelona, 400 metres from La Pedrera and less than 1 km from Casa Batllo. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The guest house has family rooms.

All rooms have a private bathroom, while some rooms also offer a balcony and others also have a city view.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Passeig de Gracia, Sagrada Familia and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from BCN Urbaness Hotels Bonavista.

Acevi Villarroel offers free high-speed Wi-Fi, a spa and a rooftop pool, open in summer. Located 400 metres from Urgell Metro Station, it is a 15-minute walk from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya.

Rooms at the Acevi have elegant décor and hardwood floors. All have a satellite TV.

Hotel Acevi Villarroel’s spa is available for an extra charge. It includes a steam bath, sauna, Hammam and gym. Massages are available on request. You can also relax on a lounger on the sun terrace.

Acevi Villarroel is within a 10-minute walk of Barcelona University and the lively Raval district. Hospital Clinic Metro Station is 600 metres away, and offers direct access to the Sagrada Familia and FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium.

Barcelona City Rooms is located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, just 5 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s iconic Sagrada Família.

The rooms at Barcelona City Rooms feature tiled floors. Each one comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Bed linen and towels are included.

Barcelona City Rooms is located opposite a supermarket.

The spectacular Hospital Sant Pau is a 10-minute walk away. Sagrada Família Metro Station connects you with the city centre in 5 minutes.

NH Collection Barcelona Pódium offers stylish, modern accommodation in a quiet area of central Barcelona. It has free WiFi, a sauna, gym and roof terrace with swimming pool and city views.

Bedrooms at the hotel are spacious and air conditioned. They all have a choice of pillows, a minibar and satellite TV. Each room comes with a Barcelona city guidebook.

NH Collection Barcelona Pódium combines a 19th-Century façade with modern interior design. It is surrounded by other Modernist buildings in Barcelona’s Eixample district.

The hotel is set 800 metres from Plaça Catalunya and the Ramblas, near the city’s Gothic Quarter. Ciutadella Park and the Olympic Port are also within walking distance.

The NH Collection Podium Hotel has good access to all parts of the city by public transport. Arc de Triomf Metro Station is just 200 metres from the hotel.

NH Collection Barcelona Pódium's restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine and there is also a lounge bar. A healthy breakfast is available in the mornings. The restaurant is closed during summer months.

Habitat Apartments Eixample Balconies. Offers accommodation within 1.5 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. This apartment features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony. It is possible for guests to sit outside and enjoy the property grounds.

At the apartment complex, units come with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a kettle. All units will provide guests with kitchenware.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Habitat Apartments Eixample Balconies. Include La Pedrera, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

Habitat Apartments Arc de Triomf is set just off Passeig de Sant Joan and within 5 minutes’ walk of Arc de Triomf and its Metro station. These apartments come with free Wi-Fi.

Each apartment has contemporary décor. They have a living room with a flat-screen TV, and kitchen facilities including a microwave, fridge, oven, toaster, hob and a coffee maker.

The apartments are within 15 minutes’ walk of Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas. Passeig de Gràcia and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló are just over 1 km away.

The charming Born district and Ciutadella Park are less than 10 minutes’ walk from the apartments.

Charming Flats by Aspasios offers accommodation in Barcelona. Montjuïc is 900 metres from the property. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property.

All units are air conditioned and have a seating and dining area. Some units feature a terrace and/or balcony. There is also a kitchen, equipped with a dishwasher and oven. A microwave is also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. There is a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer in every unit. Towels and bed linen are available.

Plaza Reial is 1.4 km from Charming Flats by Aspasios, while Plaça Catalunya is 1.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Charming Flats by Aspasios.

Located in Barcelona, 2.3 km from Somorrostro Beach, The MO House provides express check-in and check-out and free WiFi throughout the property. Popular points of interest nearby include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Passeig de Gracia and Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is 800 metres from the city centre and 2.3 km from Barceloneta Beach.

The rooms in the hotel are fitted with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, guest rooms at The MO House have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms are equipped with a balcony. At the accommodation each room is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near The MO House include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Tivoli Theatre and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 13 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Situated in Barcelona, 2.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach, 2.5 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2.5 km from Barceloneta Beach, Lodging Apartments Liceu G2 features accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. This property is set a short distance from attractions such as Cathedral of Barcelona, Plaça Reial, and Passeig de Gracia. The property is less than 1 km from the city centre and 2.4 km from Sant Sebastian Beach.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. A TV is available. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Santa Maria del Mar and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Lodging Apartments Liceu G2.

Located opposite Parc de la Ciutadella Park in central Barcelona, Ant Hostel Barcelona offers a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi throughout. Arc de Triomf Metro Station is 500 metres away.

Rooms at this hostel feature air conditioning and parquet floors. The private bathrooms come with a bath or shower. Guests can make use of the shared kitchen.

Ant Hostel Barcelona also offers luggage storage as well as lockers for check-in and check-out are chargeable

Barcelona's Born Neighborhood and its many bars and restaurants are in the surrounding streets.

Picasso Museum is a 10-minute walk away and Barceloneta Beach is 2 km from Ant Hostel Barcelona. Plaza Catalunya, with direct buses to Barcelona Airport, is 20 minutes’ walk, while Estación del Nord, with direct buses to Girona-Costa Brava Airport, is just 500 metres' walk.

Situated within the Sarrià-St. Gervasi district in Barcelona, Sarriá - Sant Gervasi has air conditioning, a terrace, and city views. With quiet street views, this accommodation provides a balcony. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a lift and free WiFi.

Boasting a DVD player, the spacious apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave, a living room with a seating area and a dining area, 3 bedrooms, and 2 bathrooms with a walk-in shower and a hot tub. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

La Pedrera is 1.6 km from the apartment, while Sants Railway Station is 2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Sarriá - Sant Gervasi.

Sant antoni apartment has a balcony and is located in Barcelona, within just 1 km of Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.9 km of Passeig de Gracia. It is set 1.8 km from Plaça Catalunya and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The spacious apartment features 1 bedroom, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Tivoli Theatre and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Sant antoni apartment.

Within 5 minutes’ walk of Passeig de Gràcia and Catalunya Metro and railway stations, Hostal Barcelona Centro offers modern rooms with free Wi-Fi.

Each air-conditioned room at Hostal Barcelona Centro has a flat-screen TV, heating and private bathroom.

Restaurants, bars and cafés can be found on Passeig de Gràcia and around Las Ramblas, 10 minutes' walking from Hostal Barcelona Centro.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera can be reached in 5 minutes by foot. Plaza de Catalunya and the Gothic Quarter are within 600 metres of the guest house.

Set in the centre of Barcelona, 2 km from Sant Miquel Beach, Cathedral Barcelona Rooms offers air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. This property is located a short distance from attractions such as Picasso Museum, Palau de la Musica Catalana, and Tivoli Theatre. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.1 km from Somorrostro Beach.

At the hostel, all rooms include a wardrobe. At Cathedral Barcelona Rooms every room includes bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Cathedral of Barcelona, Santa Maria del Mar and Plaça Reial. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Cathedral Barcelona Rooms.

Offering a garden with an outdoor swimming pool and BBQ facilities, Pool House Barcelona is set on the foothills of Tibidabo, in Barcelona. This property has impressive city views and free Wi-Fi.

Pool House Barcelona can be rented as an entire house, or alternatively is it possible to rent just a room.

The modern house offers air-conditioned rooms with simple décor. Towels and bed linen are provided. There is a furnished terrace as well as a common area with a TV lounge, large dining area and shared kitchen.

Pool House Barcelona is a 10-minute walk from a variety of Catalan restaurants. Penitents Metro Station is 10 minutes’ walk and Park Güell is a 20-minute walk away. Plaza Catalunya and the old town are 6 stops by metro. Barcelona Airport is 20 km from the property.

Diagonal 1 is set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, less than 1 km from Sagrada Familia, a 14-minute walk from Casa Batllo and 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia. The property is located 2.3 km from Portal de l'Angel, 2.5 km from Cathedral of Barcelona and 1.8 km from Plaça Catalunya. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and La Pedrera is 1 km away.

Towels and bed linen are featured in the bed and breakfast. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Diagonal 1.

Abba Rambla Hotel is set in the Raval District, 500 metres from Las Ramblas and Liceu Metro Station. It offers free Wi-Fi and a sun terrace.

The modern, air-conditioned rooms at Abba Rambla feature satellite TV, a safe and minibar. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities. Some rooms have a balcony with views.

There is a café-bar, where guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Room service and a pizza delivery option are available.

There is a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a bicycle or car from the tour desk. Parking can be reserved near the hotel for an additional charge.  Attractions including La Boqueria Market and the MACBA Museum are 5 minutes’ walk away.

Featuring air conditioning, Habitat Apartments Cool Jazz is set in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Sagrada Familia. Park Güell is 2.1 km away.

The accommodation is fitted with a flat-screen TV. There is also a kitchenette, fitted with an oven and microwave. A toaster and refrigerator are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. There is a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer in each unit. Towels are featured.

La Pedrera is 2.2 km from Habitat Apartments Cool Jazz, while Plaça Catalunya is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 15 km from the property.

Just 1 minute's walk from Passeig de Gràcia and Casa Batlló, Casa Consell Apartments offers stylish apartments with free WiFi. Some apartments have a terrace and others balconies.

Each bright apartment at Casa Consell has heating and a fan.

There is a range of cafes, bars and restaurants on the nearby Rambla de Catalunya and on Passeig de Gràcia.

Passeig de Gràcia Metro and Railway Station is less than 100 metres from Casa Consell. Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are within 15 minutes’ walk of the property.

Hotels: Holiday Inn Express Barcelona City 22@, an IHG Hotel
Full_Descriptions:
Holiday Inn Express Barcelona City 22@ is situated in the city’s 22@ District, 300 metres from Llacuna Metro Station. This hotel features rooms with satellite TV and a continental buffet breakfast included in all rates.

The Barcelona City offers simple, contemporary décor throughout. Rooms are spacious and air conditioned.Some amenities and high touch items such as kettles, pens, note pads, etc have been removed from guest rooms as per Covid-19 hygienic and security regulations. In any case, all of these items are still available upon request.

The hotel offer free WiFi access to the guests. There is also a computer and printer for their use.

The City 22@ is ideally situated for visiting many of Barcelona’s attractions and the beach is less than one kilometre away. Plaza de Catalunya and the famous Las Ramblas can be reached in less than 20 minutes, by Metro.

Atica Apartments - by Weflating has air-conditioned guest accommodation in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Sagrada Familia, 2.8 km from La Pedrera and 3.3 km from Casa Batllo. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The aparthotel features family rooms.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. Passeig de Gracia is 3.2 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 3.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 10 km from BBarcelona Fira Superior Flat, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Rooms Arago is located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 1.7 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, 1.7 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.7 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The air-conditioned accommodation is 1.4 km from Sants Railway Station. La Pedrera is 1.8 km away and Portal de l'Angel is 2.8 km from the bed and breakfast.

The units have a fully equipped kitchen with dining area, a microwave, coffee machine, and a toaster. Featuring a shared bathroom with a bath and a hair dryer, units at the bed and breakfast also offer free WiFi, while certain rooms include a balcony. At the bed and breakfast, every unit has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Casa Batllo, Plaça Catalunya and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Rooms Arago.

Hostal Felipe 2 is located in a Modernista building just off Diagonal Avenue, less than 5 minutes’ walk from Verdaguer Metro Station. This guest house offers free Wi-Fi in all areas.

The Felipe’s rooms have a TV and either a private, or shared bathroom. All rooms are bright and have wooden flooring. The majority of the rooms have air conditioning and heating, and some have a balcony. Bed linen and towels are included.

The property has an area with computers which are available in the afternoon. You can also leave your luggage at reception, and safes are available.

There is a selection of restaurants and shops in the streets surrounding the Felipe 2. The famous Sagrada Familia is just a 10-minute walk away, while Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard and Gaudí’s La Pedrera are less than 1 km from the apartments.

Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas can be reached in 20 minutes by Metro, while Sants Railway Station and Nord Bus Station are less than 3 km away.

BBarcelona Parallel Apartment is located in the Sants-Montjuïc district of Barcelona, 3.3 km from Passeig de Gracia, 3.3 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.6 km from Montjuïc. It is situated 1.9 km from Palau Sant Jordi and features private check-in and check-out. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1 km away.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with inner courtyard views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Cathedral of Barcelona and Plaça Reial. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 12 km from BBarcelona Parallel Apartment, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Set in Barcelona, 200 metres from La Pedrera, less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia and a 10-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Sweet Inn - Ethnic Eixample offers accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. It is located 1.5 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana and provides a lift. The property is 600 metres from Casa Batllo, and within 1.2 km of the city centre.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and slippers. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

There is a supermarket near the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Sweet Inn - Ethnic Eixample include Tivoli Theatre, Portal de l'Angel and Cathedral of Barcelona. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

Surrounded by views of the city, You Stylish Sagrada Familia Apartments is a sustainable apartment in Barcelona, offering guests an environmentally friendly accommodation close to Sagrada Familia. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation provides a shuttle service, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. There is also a dining area and a fully equipped kitchen equipped with a microwave, a toaster, and a fridge. At the apartment complex, all units have bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available in the area.

Nova Icaria Beach is 2.8 km from the apartment, while La Pedrera is 2.2 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from You Stylish Sagrada Familia Apartments.

Almanac Barcelona has an exclusive location, a few steps from the fashionable Paseo de Gracia Boulevard and from central Plaza Catalunya. This luxurious hotel has a panoramic rooftop bar and terrace, and an exclusive pool and sun lounge.

Housed in a stylish, traditional building, all rooms have a minibar and a seating area with a flat-screen TV and high-speed internet connection. The bathroom has double marble sinks, a walk-in shower and includes a bathrobe and slippers.

Led by Michelin-starred chef Rodrigo de la Calle, the on-site plant-based restaurant Virens offers local food and rice dishes.

The hotel include areas for fitness and wellness, a treatment room, a steam sauna and a relaxation lounge.

You can walk to Gaudi’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera within 10 minutes; while Picasso Museum is 1 km away.

Numa I Caja Apartments features air-conditioned guest accommodation in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, a 19-minute walk from Sants Railway Station and 2 km from Passeig de Gracia. It is situated 2 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and features luggage storage space. The apartment has family rooms.

Each unit features a balcony, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while some rooms have a terrace. At the apartment complex, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Plaça Catalunya is 2 km from the apartment, while Boqueria Market is 1.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from numa I Caja Apartments.

Descriptions: 3 beds (1 double, 1 sofa bed, 1 large double)
Full_Descriptions:
Featuring a shared roof terrace with furniture and city views, Picasso Suites is located in Barcelona’s Eixample District. The property offers apartments with free Wi-Fi and air conditioning.

Each apartment has a living room with a sofa, satellite flat-screen TV and DVD player. An oven, microwave and coffee machine are included in the kitchen. The bathroom comes with a hairdryer.

La Concepción Market is located next to the apartments. Guests can also find a large variety of supermarkets, bars and restaurants in the area. The property offers various services at an extra cost, including babysitting, car rental, private parking and airport shuttle.

Plaça Catalunya and Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia are located within 15 minutes’ walk from the property. Girona Metro Station, with connection to the Gothic District and La Barceloneta Beach, is 300 metres away.
